reviews: Although the game is fun it still glitches. For instance, if I were to die while going to the right without bringing my thumb off my phone, the ball in my next life would automatically move in that direction without me even touching the screen, but this only happens if there's a full-screen ad that pops up between the two lives.Also, the music and sfx will occasionally turn off (I haven't experienced that happening simultaneously though). One way to turn the music back on is to go to the main menu to mute and unmute the music (but I haven't been able to see if that works if the sfx turn off). And here's a way to turn ANY of the sound back on if it randomly mutes: just force quit the app and reopen it—it's as simple as that.Other than that, it seems to be flawless. Keep up the good work.Also, just in case this helps: I'm running iOS 9.3 on an iPhone 6s. This game is very deceiving.  In the beginning it seems new, creative, and interesting but as I progressed through the game a bit father the game got more and more repetitive.  This is a game that relies on the fact that the player can't see into the future.  Obstacles just fly at me from off the screen but one would think I can dodge them right?  Wrong.  I can't dodge because throughout the whole game the player is a bouncy ball.  The only thing I can do to protect myself in situations like these are move left or right which both will probably lead to my demise.  This is because the entire game is just moving from tiny platform to tiny platform so I either fall off a cliff or get hit by some image of a yellow ball out of nowhere.  Oh yeah did I mention that there are like no animations in this game.  This may seem insignificant but if a game is even at least trying to be good it should at least have some decent animations rather than just pictures of balls sliding around.  This game was cool but is now just another disappointment.  At least it was free. This game is really fun and addicting but is pretty impossible once you reach the 2nd level... That being said there is a way to skip levels by watching ads but that just brings you into a more difficult and complicated level! There is also no online reviews or anything about this game at all... I'd recommend waiting until they fix its problems and it becomes more well known.
keywords: A.P.E.X, Appsolute Games LLC, Games, Entertainment, Casual, Action, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

description: The country is perpetually under threat from terrorist powers and the common man walks unaware of the threats and the attacks that our Government controls and prevents. reviews: Ok let me just say all of the positive stuffs, the game is very fun and exciting. It is cool to best bosses and upgrade your weapons to be more powerful than before. For the negative stuffs, I was playing on this game 2 devices one device was lvl 9 other is lvl 13 than when I logged into the lvl 13 one it Suddenly turned into lvl 9 and my whole process was restarted to lvl 9. And lastly when every you play CO-OP your teammates always shoots at random skies and doesn’t actually shoot the boss but somehow the boss still takes damage? It is just weird fix that glitch please. Plus this game has low updates which is bad and isn’t fun so please update thank you. Hello, I'd like to reach out and ask the original developers of Oh My Heroes to please republish the game. I know it's selfish to ask, and you may have sold it to Shengwei-something- can't remember the name- however, despite the player base was quite small and not as successful as other games you've created, that game was my childhood. I've spent many hours, just sitting in my room and playing. I've even met one of my best friends from your game. Did you know how crushed I felt when this game became dead? All because the developers didn't feel like the game was worth anything? I'm angry and sad at the neglect of their own game that they spent TIME on creating only to delete it off the AppStore. I'm well aware of how biased this sounds, but many other players feel the same way as I do. Yes, it may be a waste of resources, however, the game could get bigger as long as you CONTINUE to update the game and bring more features in, like all your OTHER games. I would even spend money to help with the development of this game.It sounds like I'm contradicting myself, but I don't care about new features or game modes, just republish it and make it playable. That's all I'm asking. This is a very awesome game, but I really want the in-app purchases to work because the last version I tried to buy a few gems but I ended up losing money and nothing was given in-game so I had to get a refund. And that took a while.Another thing that lowers a star is that campaign is really hard and it is rare to find anyone in co-op . So is there a way that this game could get a major update and get a lot of people playing. Like what someone else said a Dino mode, where you would turn into dinosaurs maybe against A.I dinohunters. Another way maybe to make it easier to defeat bosses or lower boss lvl on campaign or co-op. One last request is to fix in-app purchases, but wait there should be a purchases for about $5-$10 that would give you infinite ammo or would double or triple your ammo forever. Please do my last request I would pay $10 for infinite ammo or doubling or tripling my ammo. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE

Current Features: • Defend against never ending hoards of ravenous ants • Meet new deliciously powerful friends • Battle against bosses and different ant soldiers  • Earn magical gems to upgrade your weapons at the Blacksmith Shop • Unlock exciting new weapons and specials • Jump to different locations on the screen for strategic advantage • Collect power-ups to temporarily boost your abilities.  Don’t let the ants get to them first! Cake Nana is brought to you by 3 1/2 Samurai Studio LLC. Any suggestions or feedback is welcome!
reviews: This game is just pure awesome! Unlike others games it's very fun and intuitive! If you're bored and looking for a fun, cute, and overall awesome game to play... THIS IS IT! Although this game is great... The replay ability is not so likely. Because once you finish every level, you're done! That is why this game needs multi-player support just to keep the replay value. I'm calling ya out devs!  My rating would have been a 5 if the replay value was likely but since it's not... 4/5! :) With multi-player mode like two sides fighting the ants defending their cupcakes or something like that online, worldwide would make the game's replay value so high! :D

name: ‎Dare the Monkey: Arena
description: Welcome to Dare the Monkey, a super casual, one-touch platformer where you can win cash prizes (where available) against online opponents. Grab as many coins and bananas as possible to outscore your rival. Beat the clock and travel as far as possible to earn huge bonuses across several amazing locations. Easy to pick up but difficulty to master. Do you have what it takes to win? Key Features: • Intuitive one-touch gameplay • Score more points than your online opponent to win • Each game lasts just over 2 minutes • Collect as many coins as possible • Collect all 6 bonus bananas found on each level • Get as far as possible before time runs out • Beat the clock for higher scores! • Powered by Skillz, earn virtual coins and cash prizes (where available) • Reach checkpoints to save your position • Stunning graphics • No ads • Collect coins to unlock new heroes If you have any questions about the Skillz platform please contact: support@skillz.com
reviews: I truly love this game. It’s so fun I play for hours and hours sometimes. Minimal glitches, I think I’ve only had it shut down on me less than a handful of times which is pretty great for a relatively new skillz game, and also pretty great with the amount of time I play it. It’s fun and easy to learn but difficult enough to keep you trying for better scores.My one main issue is I wish there were more levels. As of now I’ve only played 4 levels. I wish there was a bigger selection of levels and maybe an option to pair a specific character to a specific level, but the randomness adds to the challenge so I’m good either way. Just add more levels please! I feel that although I love the game and enjoy playing and trying to master it, it’s getting kind of repetitive too. It has great potential for more though!
keywords: Dare the Monkey: Arena, Hot Right Now LTD, Games, Sports, Action, Casual, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
description: Dave is a redneck on a rampage to reclaim his stolen trophies from the town bully, Clyde! Dangerous Dave is back in his classic adventure in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout. This recreation of the original 1990 DOS game is just as action-packed and difficult as the original! There are only 10 levels, but, wow, are they hard.  Play Dave as never before with an amazing soundtrack, high-def graphics, vibrant sound effects, and a hilarious storyline brought to you by Dave's nemesis, Clyde! This is the natural evolution of Dave – loud, funny, and lots of attitude.
reviews: It's almost an exact replica of the game I played on the computer over a decade ago which is AWESOME. But there's random things, like running into enemies no longer kills you both (just you) and the far right portion of the extra zone in level 6 doesn't have the little holes in the floor anymore, which means you are trapped there unless you lose a life. For the most part though I'm happy to be able to play again! And with the oh so familiar sound effects. =) In this game we have 2 variations of original Dave: “dos” and hd version. The main problem in “dos” is enemy’s-in original game they was programmed to shot in certain sequence, but in our version enemy’s “see” the player and shoot in him. The main problem in hd version-parallax background “jumping” when player move to the most right point in level.Because of those problems I didn’t want to buy this game. If you fix those problems, I be very happy. But, again, the main idea in original game-to accept the challenge and beat this game without saves, I’d like to have the opportunity to off this option if I buy this game. I really enjoy this game. It has a lot of memories from playing the original DOS game(s) and the upgraded graphics are a nice addition. I sure would like to see the additional entries into the series remade. This is also from the legendary creator of DOOM, which is a game I also played on my 1995 Packard Bell computer. Dangerous Dave is a great game for anyone. The buttons are sometimes covering up Dave on my iPhone 6, but if you move them down a bit then it isn't as noticeable.
keywords: Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout, Alfonso Romero, Games, Casual, Action, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎EarthNight
description: EarthNight is a painting brought to life and a love letter to classic arcade games.  Dragons have taken over the Earth, and humanity has fled to space.  You must help Stanley and Sydney skydive back to Earth while careening across the backs of massive, snake-like dragons as they soar high above the planet, all while an original chiptune soundtrack pounds away in the background. Every moment is intense and layered with intricacy.   Game Features: • Jump and dash your way across the backs of dragons on your way down to Earth in classic 2D side-scrolling action. • Unlock more than 25 gameplay-altering powerups that will aid you on your journey as you slay dragons and discover secrets. • Experience a unique run no matter how many times you play thanks to near-infinite variations of hand designed, procedurally generated levels.  • Explore five layers of the atmosphere with more than 40 enemies, more than 15 unique dragons and hundreds of scraps and items, all brought to life by artist Mattahan, who meticulously painted each of EarthNight’s 10,000+ frames of art and animation. • Enjoy an original, exciting soundtrack intertwined into gameplay, including more than 20 songs written and performed by chiptune musician Chipocrite. Engadget: “There's something special about EarthNight. It has all the trappings of a sleeper hit: It's gorgeous, unique and whimsical, and it feels fresh even as it embodies the nostalgia of classic platformers.” GamesRader: "The painterly art style and nuanced control of your character's momentum set it apart." PC Gamer: "EarthNight feels like a game with a fiery heart and formidable talent in every facet of development." Comicsbeat: “The level of artistic detail in the game is spellbinding. You can easily get hypnotized by the colorful beauty of EarthNight. The game is simply put, a painting that you can play with.” TechnoBuffalo: "Cleaversoft is making a runner that’s challenging, rewarding and, ultimately, very good. You’ll have to straight up get better in order to play better, and that feeling of accomplishment is what they’re after.” "Every moment is intense and layered with intricacy, from the look of the game to the glorious soundtrack, it's premise and how it controls.”
keywords: EarthNight, cleaversoft, Games, Action, mac apps, app store, appstore, applications, itunes

name: ‎GALAXIA 4
description: "Fun watch game that combines space invaders and Galaga. Cool game!!!!" "A lot like the one for the arcade machine!!!" GALAXIA - where Space Invaders meet Galaxian! This is the arcade game you have been waiting for on Apple Watch! After successfully defeated the aliens on the moon, you are now going to face the alien fleets in space! GAME DESCRIPTION • Use digital crown or gesture to move spaceship and fire • Some aliens can take extra hits before destroyed • Spaceship can take 2 extra hits before destroyed • Spaceship will be temporary invincible when hit • Enjoy sound effects in the game! • Companion game for iPhone INSTALLATION • Once downloaded to your iPhone, GALAXIA icon will appear on your Apple Watch's home screen. Tap and enjoy!  • If you do not see the icon after waiting for a while, open the Apple Watch companion app on your iPhone, and scroll down through the My Watch section to check for GALAXIA icon, make sure “Show App on Apple Watch” is toggled on.
reviews: I tried this game on my phone first.  Really like the concept and game but the controls need tweaking.  When using tilt you cannot control how fast the gun shoots.  When using tap you can rapid fire but the ship keeps moving in the direction of fire.  In other words I can’t momentarily hold one position and rapid fire.  I think directional buttons on the lower left corner of the screen with a “fire” button in the lower righthand corner would be ideal. Thanks for the feedback. Currently our implementation for phone control is to tap both sides for movement and fire, and tap center for fire only. We will see whether to change to other implementations based on feedback.We do hope you like our Apple Watch app - after all this is the main target this game is designed for, and iPhone game is designed as a bonus. This brings me back to my youth playing arcade games at a pizza joint. The developer has worked hard on this game for the watch and it shows. I’m not a gamer but this game I always play when I have free time and it makes me smile! FUN!
keywords: GALAXIA 4, Virtual GS, Games, Casual, Entertainment, Action, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Galaxoid: A Retro Space Shooter
description: Galaxoid is a fast paced retro space shooter based on arcade games of the 80's. It's all about high scores. 50 levels, 5 bosses and Game Center Scores and Achievements! Reviews ----------------------------- Touch Arcade - http://bit.ly/1hHVmga "Nearly everything about Galaxoid is awesome" "a perfect on-the-go game for mobile devices" Fabio at iphoneitalia - http://bit.ly/16zHvHl "A beautiful new game made ​​full pixel art style, a galactic war to the sound of pixels" "If you've been looking for a game in pixel art style , specifically a retro shooter game and more compatible with both iPhone and iPad, then stop for a moment and consider purchasing Galaxoid" Freddy at appgefahren - http://bit.ly/1fmwNIH "Neat retro fun" "We recommend the game to fans of the genre" Highlights ----------------------------- * Mfi/iCade/Gametel support * Universal App. Buy once, install and play on all of your compatible iOS devices * Crisp and sharp retro graphics on all devices!  * Ultra-Addictive gameplay * Amazing soundtrack by Joel Alcock! * 50 Levels * 5 Boss battles * Post your high scores to Twitter and Facebook * Game Center Scores! * Game Center Achievements! Support ------------------------------- http://retroplay.games galaxoidgame@gmail.com Compatibility ------------------------------- Ipad2 and newer Iphone4 and newer Optimized for iPhone 5 and newer, iPad2 and newer
reviews: I worshiped Space Invaders back in 1981 on Atari.  It may have been the only Atari game that I actually flipped or maxed the score on.  I also loved Galaga in the arcade and it would be coin toss between that and Ms. Pacman.  Galaxoid is obviously referencing those two games, but with a nice modern flavor.  I love the boss fights, which add another level of difficulty as the gameplay gradually ramps up after you defeat the boss.  The little touches of interactive power ups and laser beams are a great addition.  While, I can see how some may disagree with your spaceship staying at the bottom of the screen the whole time, I disagree about the touch controls being terrible.  they could stand to be a little more like Plasma Sky, but it's fine the way it is. Maybe the addition of an auto shooter could be cool, but it's not necessary.  Get this game if you love Space Invaders, Galaga, or modern iOS shmups!!  It will have a permanent home on my iPad, for sure. A great pewpew kinda game, sort of a mix of Galaga and Space Invaders, very fun. The graphics, music and gameplay will please devotees of the 80's arcade experience.The two things I DON'T like, however, are that there doesn't seem any way to save one's game, and if one is foolish enough to do something else on one's iPhone with a game paused, that game is GONE. Since a game can be pretty lengthy, this seriously compromises it's casual use, which is what makes so many games great. Also, it doesn't look as though there's any way to upgrade weapons or capabilities...and being a "retro" game that really isn't something that's expected, but I did find myself, after several levels, wishing I could change it up some.There IS an alternate weapon, the Laser, which is very powerful but a little clumsy to get to. Otherwise, the controls are exquisite!$1.99 seems a little steep for a game this simple, but I'm certainly enjoying it!
keywords: Galaxoid: A Retro Space Shooter, Jacob Davis, Games, Casual, Action, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Halloween Cool Games
description: This entertaining educational 5 Halloween games set for kids, that helps to develop motor and coordination skills, speed and attentiveness.  Halloween Ninja: Goal of the game to shoot down flying Halloween figures rather than bombs. The player have three lives that are lost when one of figure falls to the ground. You have to start the level over again with the explosion of the bomb. You get more points when you touch more than one game character during one shot. Try to get into the top ten!  Shooting Turkey: In this game you are Turkey and you are attacked by Halloween monsters. Your goal is to survive as long as possible!  Jumping Pumpkin: Your goal is to rise as high as possible and do not fall down. Catch Pumpkins:  Need to catch as many pumpkins in the basket. Catch only pumpkins. First pumpkin fall slowly but gradually accelerated pace of the game. Tap Fast: In the top row is a series of Halloween characters. The player must find as quickly as possible and click the selected character. To pass the level necessary to meet at a certain time and doesn’t make more errors than allowed.  With this learning exercise children will have hours of fun. Please watch our video that explain how to play each game! Happy Halloween! name: ‎Hadrian's Wall. The Roman Empire most imposing frontier - Virtual 3D Tour & Travel Guide of Denton Hall Turret (Lite version)
description: * TOP #5 TRAVEL APPS in the United Kingdom (all Virtual 3D Tours about Hadrian's Wall) * TOP #10 ENTERTAINMENT APPS in the United Kingdom,  New Zealand and Ireland * TOP #50 ENTERTAINMENT APPS in 45 countries including: the United States, Australia, Canada, Germany, France and Italy (all Virtual 3D Tours about Hadrian's Wall) Read what the critics are saying about * ...perfect mix between entertainment and education in the same time... BestNewEduApps * * ... have fun and learn about the Roman Army greatest fortification system... Best iOS Apps Magazine* ------------------------------------ Virtual Heritage presents "Denton Hall Turret. Hadrian's Wall", first from the series of virtual tours over the most interesting places along the Hadrian's Wall.  "Denton Hall Turret" app is powered by Unreal Engine technology and is an awesome new way to experience Hadrian's Wall, one of the wonders of the ancient world. By using Epic Games' award-winning, most advanced game engine, viewers can freely visit this 3D reconstructed monument in their own pace in engaging and educating way. Hadrian's Wall is the most important monument built by Roman army in Britain and was the most heavily fortified border in the Roman Empire. Roman emperor Hadrian came to Britain in 122 AD and ordered the construction of the most ambitious fortifications ever built by  Romans - a 120 kilometers long defensive wall across the entire country with front ditch, Military Way and imposing earthwork called  the Vallum. For almost 300 years, Hadrian's Wall was the Roman Empire most imposing frontier.  Denton Hall Turret (also called Turret 7B) is located east from Vindobala fort in Rudchester, and west from the roman fort in Condercum (Benwell). It was built by soldiers from the Second Augustan Legion (legio II Augusta) in 122 AD. "Denton Hall Turret. Hadrian's Wall" app is a real-time virtual tour over 3D reconstruction of the turret and adjoining stretches of the Wall as it may looked like in 164 AD. If you want to feel like one of the roman soldiers from cohors I Vangionum Milliaria Equitata  (part mounted auxiliary cohort from Upper Germany) patrolling the Wall, this app is for You. FEATURES: * Powered by Unreal Engine technology * Virtual, real-time walk over one of the turrets built by legio II Augusta * Detailed 3D reconstruction of Denton Hall Turret based on latest archaeological excavations * Animated movies presenting all four linear elements of Hadrian's Wall: the ditch, the  Broad Wall, the Military Way and the Vallum * Narrated, comprehensive information's about the Roman Empire most imposing frontier * Great for kids as supplementary history lesson (no Ads, no In-App Purchases) Just let Your child explore our 3D reconstruction as any other FPS game level

name: ‎I, Viking: Valhalla Path
description: "BEST MOBILE GAME" Finalist at International Mobile Gaming Award GLOBAL 2017   Play I, Viking Valhalla For Honor, a real-time PvP battle, and enter the epic Scandinavian world of the Vikings. Play with friends or battle with thousands of other players all over the world. Vikings battle action & strategy games have never been so close to real-time viking battles as I, Viking is. Immerse yourself into the epic atmosphere of brave medieval gladiators, conquer new territories from your rivals and build viking village. Make your name go down in history! You are the Viking, fight! I, Viking is a co-op multiplayer fighting and battle strategy game in a Scandinavian-themed world. Only bravery, war and magic rules here. Feel like the leader of the most powerful army, gather the mightiest warriors and war heroes and achieve glory of the battlefield beyond measure! Every day thousands of people who are passionate about viking games and warrior games pick up their smartphone to enjoy one more exciting viking battle and master their art of war. I, Viking fan base keeps growing and shows no signs of slowing down. In case you are wondering why…     - True viking history: I, Viking is an action RPG game based on a true historical events. Here we are trying to recreate an experience of viking empire to make you dive into its atmosphere   - Heavy viking fightings: Really dynamic viking battles make you fill in the center of the action. Sounds of slashing weapons, your teammates hue and cry, etc. Fight against millions of real players. Grab Mjolnir to strenght yourself and hit the enemies!   - Unique mix of your favourite game genres: It means you’ll always be entertained. Viking battles, elements of battle strategy games, action and viking village building – in one game.   - Stunning sound & graphics optimized for your device. Enjoy medieval picturesque landscapes, realistic viking weapons and magnificent dragon ships.   - Outstanding heroes: More than 8 types of viking characters with unique abilities and leveling system.   - Viking village building: A man’s home is his castle. In this vikings game there are 9 levels of each village building to unlock and upgrade.   - Tricky daily tasks let you win bonuses and rewards to continue viking PvP battles over and over again     Play I, Viking Valhalla For Honor to take part in breathtaking PvP viking battles, feel the spirit of authentic medieval world with dozens of territories to conquer. We know there a lot of viking games like battle strategy games and war strategy games where you should develop a strategy and think a lot. Here your focus is on action! Our vikings app makes you feel the spirit of epic battles and craft really unique weapon.
reviews: And download this game. This game is great. This is exactly what I’ve been looking for after so many games hit you with a paywall after about 2 days. Just a warning: at first it seems clunky and a bit confusing but give it a little bit of time and you will not be disappointed. Not even a lot of time. Maybe 30 mins. Don’t pay any attention to negative reviews on this game. They are dumb. If you like rpgs or mobas or cool games at all download this immediately. I just wanted to say that this game is really good and very enjoyable. Hopefully, the clan hall will get established soon. You can definitely compete with other players without spending money. Spending money just get you ahead of the game, but if is not an advantage. Those who think this game is hard just haven’t given this game enough time. They are either bunch of noobs or just want everything handed to them. - Lord Pogi This game seems really difficult to get into. Maybe if you spend real money a lot of these issues are mitigated but there is only one mode and that’s 2v2 PvP and you immediately come up against players that are much higher levels and gear. In order to progress you need silver and gold that comes very very slowly! Your stuck losing so many matches you instantly can’t win due to you opponents having progressed much further and even have more characters to bring into battle. So unless I’m missing something this is just so unbalanced I don’t see why I would sink any more time into it...
keywords: I, Viking: Valhalla Path, Mad Dog Games, LLC, Games, Strategy, Action, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎I.F.O
description: I.F.O is an old school LCD-style shoot'em up game.  You have to shoot UFOs using a classic aircraft and save the animals which kidnapped by the aliens. Let's save the Earth from the aliens! You are the last hero of the world. *Very simple controls - You can rotate aircraft by left & right buttons. and you can dash by pushing both buttons together. That's all. *The mysterious alien power - If you kidnap an alien, your classic airplane gets power up by the mysterious alien power. *Unique weapon & item - You can change weapon while saving the animals kidnapped by the aliens. And you can recover your life at the same time. Depends on the kind of animal, you can earn a heart piece which make your maximum life larger. *iMessage stickers - When you install this application, I.F.O sticker is added to "iMessage". Total Battery is Gon Lee - Code, Art and Title BGM is OTOnoniwa In game BGM is Skipmore
reviews: 8-bit throwbacks are all the rage these days, and I love 'em, but this LCD mock-up REALLY took me back, to the days of frittering away time on car trips or languishing in shoe departments or in waiting rooms biding the conclusion of some interminable maternal appointment. Of course, those old handhelds were limited to advancing through a finite set of Muybridgean tableaux lurching by at a frame or so per second to create the illusion of animation—which the present title is and does not, though part of me wishes it did. In any case, it's not a complicated game, in keeping with those it recalls, but it's a fun diversion. As I say, I do suddenly wish someone would flat-out emulate the herky-jerky grayscale of those gaudy beplasticked one-trick ponies, but I'm grateful for this little revival, trompe-l'œil shadows and scratchy screen and all.
keywords: I.F.O, gon lee, Games, Casual, Action, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

description: Support us and rate the game! A new and original arcade action game with a unique grindhouse visual style. "Featured in AppsGoneFree. Your daily free app resource" ------- PRESS QUOTES ---------- Apple’n’apps: 4 out of 5 Jake Escapes is a brilliantly designed iOS game that is a wonderful change of pace that stands out from the pack. The game perfectly suits iOS, and there are so many different aspects to enjoy. Jake Escapes is a should buy that is a thoroughly engaging and unique adventure that is begging for more content. Apptudes  (4 out of 5 - users 5 out of 5) If there’s one bothersome aspect of the App Store, its the lack of originality. Many developers are content with releasing tweaks on the same formula, which makes for a platform cluttered with cheap clones. Just Funny Games must’ve read my mind: their new release Jake Escapes (universal) is an original piece of work, both in its gameplay and its presentation. Appstorearcade.com (8 ½ out of 10) I’m just going to come out and say it, no clever paragraph transitions or anything like that. I’m exhilarated that Jake Escapes HD feels and plays like it’s conceived for touch devices! Jakes Escapes brings a remarkably new enjoyable experience over to the iPhone ad iPad. Smile. Appshack Graphics-wise, the game looks great. Each of the character models are well designed, and the buildings have plenty of detail....The music and sound effects also go along perfectly with the graphic look and feel of the game......it really is a nice flowing, highly entertaining game with fantastic cut-scenes, a nice story, and great gameplay. Mac-talks.com Jake Escapes is a great pick-up-and-play game that’s plenty of fun, and well worth its $2 price tag. ----------------- Meet Jake, the world's greatest thief. In fact he is such a good thief that he has become somewhat bored with stealing altogether and he is now desperate for the ultimate challenge. Then there's Doc, Jake's friend and clever scientist. Doc managed to crack the Echelon Network and discovered the existence of an alien artifact known only as the G.R.A.I.L., hidden away in Area 51. Stealing the G.R.A.I.L. is the least of Jake's worries; dealing with its awesome power is another matter entirely! Oh yeah, and the Crime Lords... When the news of Jake's daring heist - and the existence of the G.R.A.I.L. - is revealed it seems everyone wants to get their hands on the mysterious artifact, including the most dangerous and devilish Crime Lords across the globe! Then there's Bob. The U.S. Government is determined to capture Jake and recover the G.R.A.I.L. by any means, even if that entails unleashing the legendary and unfailing Secret Agent Bob! Watch out, Jake! 3d graphics - in stunning HD compatible with the New iPad retina display. A comic adventure - build your story by completing the jobs in any order you like and watch it unfold through colorful comic-style cut scenes. Unique gameplay - use intuitive touch screen controls to stay ahead of the chase! - complete jobs by collecting items and help solve the G.R.A.I.L. enigma. - tap on enemies to have Doc blast them. - defeat the deadly Crime Lords in challenging battles. - climb, dodge, jump and fight as you scale the skyscrapers of each Crime Lord. An original soundtrack - feel the world of Jake Escapes come to life! Think you can handle the chase? It's time to get in shape. The escape starts now!

reviews: This game is adorable and so addictive, and besides that it feels very rewarding every time I unlock a new Kaiju or break a record. This game is tons of fun AND I’m not forced to pay for it. I still get to have all these different and cute kaiju and still get to play even if I don’t have a subscription. I enjoyed this game so much that I even paid to have the ads removed and it’s my favorite app so far (and I’ve played LOTS of apps). Every time I give a different game app a try, I ultimately always come back to this simple, satisfying, adorable and fun little game.Thanks for the fabulous game and for all the events and updates you continue to add to it. I love the little references to other kaiju from movies and the animations are fantastic! Please keep it so the subscription is optional. Even though I can’t afford a subscription, I’ve paid what I can to help support this game, and I appreciate that your team has been considerate of its players and allows us to feel like we’re achieving goals and succeeding. The frame rate is poor. It drops to about 2 to 3 FPS while at my max speed. The advertisements are frequent and long, and cause the frame rate of the game to drop even more after a launch, which along with the lag after clicking the small x button on the corner of the ad has me accidentally launch again.Turning off my WiFi connection helps, but there is still some low frame rate as I get an in game pop up telling me there are no ads available. And without a WiFi connection, I don’t get any offline bonus and the timers don’t progress. Now, I know it’s kind of rude of me to be complaining about the offline gameplay, but I wouldn’t be if the frame rate wasn’t so low while online.So maybe try to raise the general frame rate, make the x button on advertisements a bit larger, and lower the amount of time unrewarded advertisements take until you can close out of them to about five seconds, even if it means an advertisement showing every round versus every other round. One more thing: there should be an option to pay coins for an upgrade instead of there only being an advertisement. To make up for the number of ads lost, maybe have the occasional pop up ad in the egg display that can be closed right away but won’t redirect you if you accidentally click on it. Out of all of that, the frame rate is the most irritating. The game is really simple to play, and if you find yourself bored or with some time to kill, this is definitely an entertaining way to spend it! You can’t unlock all of the eggs for free (and the ones you need to buy are pricy), but there are still plenty of free ones to collect each time you hit a new level. Overall, I’m enjoying it, but it’s got its issues.First, the ads. Holy crap, there are a LOT of ads. You’ll get ad prompts to reduce wait times on hatching eggs, double your coins after a runtime coins you earned, level up skills for free, etc. like you would most any game, sure, but you’ll also get hit by an ad following just about every single run. (Runs normally last a minute-ish, give or take.)The game also has a ton of bugs. Every time I want to switch kaiju, claim or start hatching an egg, or move on the map, my game goes pretty much unresponsive save for the play button. In order to actually do other stuff I have to close and reopen the app. Not a big deal, but tedious when it feels like I have to do it every few minutes. I’ve also had the game screen just go black on me in the middle of runs before, again forcing me to close and reopen the game.
keywords: Kaiju Rush, Lucky Kat Studios, Games, Action, Casual, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Karate Fighter
description: Princess Meri has been kidnapped by an evil gang! Unfortunately for them, you are a master of karate.  Fight through nine levels of intense action. "Karate Fighter" is a loving homage to 1970's kung fu movies and classic 1980's arcade beat 'em ups. "Karate Fighter" features story and an endless survival modes.  Tangle with grapplers, knife throwers, and their evil bosses. Features: - optional blood splatter - optional background music - multiple control schemes - three levels of difficulty
reviews: This game offers a well know, rock-solid arcade beat-em-up experience with some good controls well suited for the device. By separating the directions of movements and blows into separate keys, the game allows very fast reactions to enemy attacks, very much needed since it can get quite tough! However, a traditioanl d-pad with single contextual button is also available to satisfy who prefers traditional controls.The game has three difficulty levels and an online leaderboard in order to effectively increase the replay value. All in all, a great package well worth the price, possibly the best side-scroller beat-em-up on the platform. This is just a terrific version of the 1984 arcade hit "Kung Fu Master". The update includes a newer version which is just as fun as the very true to original retro version. My seven year old daughter loves it as much as her 42 daddy.  This game really brings me back to the golden age of arcade.  Kung Fu Master and Yie Ar Kung Fu are the basis for all the subsequent fighter games. GO BUY THIS GAME!! Well worth it at twice the price.

name: ‎Karateka Classic
description: A side-scrolling karate classic from 1984! The first game by the creator of Prince of Persia, Karateka arrives on iOS with all the challenge and charm of the original Apple II experience. Fight as the lone hero to save the princess from the evil warlord Akuma. His relentless guards and pesky hawk will challenge your skill whether you remember the original, have played the remake, or are experiencing Karateka for the first time.
reviews: Just played through it and won without any rewinds. This probably will never come to pass, but I'd love to see the C64 port as well. It didn't have the yell of the protagonist, but the music and bass were far better — especially awesome when it kicks in during the final battle. Consider it!  I'd pay another 99¢ for that version.My one complaint is that I cannot pull off a (full) walk/kick (or punch) combo, which completely changes how to play the game. Can you fix that? I had this game on my family's old Apple II as a kid, and I played it relentlessly. Relentlessly! I knew every sound, every movement. This, along with Conan, was my absolute favorite game. I did not expect to ever get to play it again (save for maybe a poorly executed remake on an emulator) but here it is! 😍The developers really went to task to recreate the exact, and I mean *exact* treasured little game from my childhood. They even simulated the physical sound of the old Apple's hard drive at work, loading up the game and the scenes. Nice touch.At a time where everybody's putting out little 8-bit games, and most are unoriginal, lazy replicas of each other... this stands out to appeal to the nostalgia-seeking gamers. It seems that most developers think that they can use any simple platform, dial down the graphics and present it as something special. But the truth is, the good games from the 80s and 90s were actually unique and creative (much like today); the movements and graphics were simply born out of limitations.Anyway, love this game! Especially running straight into the enemy on accident and receiving that mortal blow lol. Btw, if you're new to this game, don't do it!! Or do it to your first enemy to see what it's like and get it over with. Don't forget, like I did, and get far in the game just to carelessly run straight into your demise. Made my jaw drop, just like it did when I was a kid. Brutal. For the first time since I played 'Karateka' back in the 90's at Elementary School in the computer lab, I finally beat this game. True, adding the modern save feature and a touch of 'Prince of Persia' with the Rewind feature dampens the difficulty of playing classic, but those can easily be adjusted to taste. The sounds and screen styles of the Apple II interface immediately puts anyone familiar with the title in a comfortable atmosphere. For anyone looking to be told an epic tale, a challenge that's hard to come by these days, reconnecting with your childhood or all three combined, this is worth the dollar. I'm not ashamed to say this is in my all-time top ten of games and also easily one of my favorite apps for the iPad. For the Developer: Thank You!
keywords: Karateka Classic, DotEmu, Games, Family, Action, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

Enter the epic conflict between darkness and light and fight to control the fate of Land of Doran. With a fantastic and addictive gameplay, and excellent visuals make the game awesome and amazing to play and enjoy. >>>Land of Doran gameplay ▶ 3 various character categories: Warrior, Mage, and Archer, each of these three Classes has its own set of unique skills and abilities.   ▶ Cross-server battles: fight players in and around your server to dominate the Land of Doran.  ▶ Realm of Gods: transform yourself from a fledging warrior to an unstoppable God!  ▶ Boss battles: challenge epic world bosses  >>>Key Features ▶ Stunning Visuals  Immerse yourself in beautifully 3D graphics, grand battlefields, and a breathtaking fantasy world. name: ‎Laser Gun Shooting: Mega War
description: Are you ready for the action shooting game ever made? Laser Shooting Mega Battle invites you to fight in an ultimate scary arena in PVP mode. You are all alone in an unknown battle dungeon and you are handed your weapon. Fight for your survival and execute the rest. The Laser Shooting Mega Battle game comprises of many levels and number of shooter increase consistently. The battle arena is mysteriously designed with no hiding spots. You can only hide behind the large walls. The “enemy locator” will show you how far or near other shooter is. You have to be very clever with your controls and set the target exact on the shooter's face. When insight smashes the face of the shooter with a laser beam to make him lose control of his gun. Keep shooting until he gets eliminated. The more shooters you execute the more you score. In the first level, you have many shooter rivals. Find them, shoot them and kill them. You will get extra points for consecutive shooting. The rewards are so much fun, you can choose new skins, characters, and increase your strengths. Online games will provide you with a lot of free stuff. You can earn game money and spend it on new skins and increase power. Laser Gun Shooting - Free Mode : In free mode, you are free to play and experience all the laser beam shooting fun. Spot your enemies and kill them one by one. Hide behind the walls and wait for them to approach. It is an easy and fun level. You can explore the game at this level and prepare for the ultimate shooting battle. Shooting Arena Action - 1 VS 3 Mode: In this mode, you will be facing 3 shooters alone. It is a neon scary laser arena. You can upgrade your characters and buy new ones with high skills and strengths. Collect game money to buy skins. With every new skin comes a new skill set which will help you to win. Mega Battle - Multiplayer or 5 VS 5 Mode: Time to build your team. You now have 5 friends by your side killing other shooters. Arrange them in your best order. Fight with your laser beam guns and win the arena. You can get your friends online and play a multiplayer mode. Or you can let the Laser Shooting Mega Battle choose your team for you. Play with the best game player from all around the world. Laser Gun Shooting Mega Battle Game Features: - Neon scary battle shooting arena - Multiplayer mode - VFX sound effects - 3D and HD graphics - The game can be played offline - New weapons, bullets, and power level - Modern controls and addictive shooting game

Ai should also jump out the way when your car is near them, and maybe even be able to order something like an Uber! Make realistic missions, longer missions, and stuff like gta. It’s always fun to be more realistic, updated, and better. Please make the game better and all the things I said! Awesome game! name: ‎Mafia Empire: City of Crime
description: BECOME THE LEADER OF YOUR OWN MAFIA The battle over the city has begun, become the greatest Mafia Boss of all time in this action-packed multiplayer realtime strategy game. In Mafia Empire you are the boss that takes care of the power and growth of your mafia. You plan and decide which criminal missions your mafia members conduct. You have to act strategically and adapt to the different situations in the city. Attack other players or ally with them, raid banks and police stations or fight against the dominating gang Los Malos - it’s your choice! The strategic depth of Mafia Empire will fascinate you! LET YOUR DISTRICT GROW: As your influence in the city increases over time, so will your district. FORM A SYNDICATE: Find friends, get help from other players, trade with them and form the most powerful syndicate in the city. ALLY OR FIGHT: In this multiplayer game it is your decision whether you collaborate with other players in a syndicate or fight them as your foes. LEGENDARY MAFIOSI: Recruit legendary mafiosi that existed in real life! They they can support you in your mission. MANAGE YOUR MAFIA: Your guys need cash, drugs and ammo. Get resources from dubious sources to recruit new members, install defence works, and upgrade your district. REGULARLY EVENTS: Prove yourself in regular events to acquire even more resources so your influence in the city can grow even faster.
reviews: First, this is not a game where you get relatively quick results. It takes time. Second, you do not need to spend large amounts of money. $5 every 3 to 4 weeks should be enough. The problem I’ve seen in the reviews is players want quick results. If you want quick results, you can spend a lot of money if you want to. Third, most of the players I have communicated with are helpful in explaining the game. A lot is trial and error, but a lot is intuitive. Fourth, joining a Syndicate is necessary. This game is not meant to be played alone.Relax and enjoy the game. No need to get up tight!The only issue I have is the shield system, I have not figured out how to keep my district shielded for a long time. But that’s part of the fun, trying to figure 5 things out. If you get on the game contact me, my player name is Tony Lipp. Good game just maybe have a how to button for any questions, more room to expand like maybe using stations troops to start new bases like up to three. And fix the instant construction bug because mine should be 8 minutes but won’t let me till 3 minutes because I am in syndicate. Also fix all the toxic people on global chat some please it’s a bit out of control. Also about the time thing it was allowing me to instant finish on that time with NO vip status and now I have to wait till three minutes! That’s less than when I started the friggin game. Please fix cuz that’ll drive me to deleting the game at one point When I first got this game, it reminded me of the other strategy games. There was a significant difference, however. You almost never know what to do, and the gameplay is boring. While there are many games like this that restrict new players in other ways, this one advertises over and over again for you to buy packs. Syndicates are one of the best parts of the game, but getting invited into a big one so you can be protected if someone attacks you is extremely hard. The game also glitches and bugs out a lot, sometimes not allowing me to get new units. It may take a month to actually get anywhere in the game, which is still hard. If you attack an enemy raid thinking you’ll rob it with them, you’re wrong. And if you accidentally attack a better player, you’re dead. No matter how much you don’t want to attack another player, retreating costs 40 gold and trying to tap the transport is hard.All in all, this game is very limited and disappointing.
keywords: Mafia Empire: City of Crime, Farbflut Entertainment, Games, Strategy, Action, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

reviews: I thought it was one of the best games I have ever played on my phone and iPad. It was such a good game but there is some things you should add. You should bring in new maps because there was only 3 if I recall, and you should also be adding new guns every update or let us be able to upgrade are guns to make them more efficient in their stats. Lastly you should fix those big bugs like that one on the desert map where if you go up in that tower you can shoot through the walls but no one can shoot you through the wall. You really need to upgrade this game to iOS 11 because when I was young I would always play this game when I got done from my home work or done with school. Just please bring this game back! Before I start the ideas I just want to say that the matchmaking isn't very balanced. I am a level 30 sniper and I am matched up with level 1-5 scouts. Now onto the ideas!1.) a friends system so u can add friends by searching their name it adding them after a round so you can tell when they're online and can invite them to join a room2.) a single player mode, sort of like a campaign mode 3.) a "free tcrystals" button to watch ads or complete offers to earn free crystals (unless there already is one and I am too stupid to notice :P)4.) more maps cuz most players have played every single maps and would want new ones5.) fix a bug in the al-omeni stage that allows people to shoot through the walls of the central tower (the one you can get on the roof of) by going into the corner and adjusting their angle (it makes people be able to shoot thru walls but they can't be hit thru the wall) 6.) add an ability to upgrade weapons and armor to increase their stats7.) add a way to turn coins to crystals and vice versa. Not all of these ideas have to be added but it will be appreciated if they were. This is probably the best shooting game I've played batter than halo and call of duty and crises well maybe not crisis that's the only shooting game I like better love the graphics the cartoony graphics make it so much better and love all the guns and classes but needs more guns and more items armor and classes definitely more guns and a story would  rate 4 and a half stars if the App Store would let you Requires iOS 5.1 or later. name: ‎N.Y.Zombies
description: There are now nearly 2 million people addicted to N.Y.Zombies! Thank you to everyone enjoying the game!! New York City is in ruins, the streets are filled with zombies, and it's up to you to fight your way out and find safety. Blow away zombies with an incredible arsenal of weaponry in a stunning variety of locations including the streets of New York City, underground subways, abandoned highways, rural farmlands, broken down suburbs, mountain caves, and more! Or, try your hand at endless mode, and see how long you can survive -- make sure to submit your score to the global online leader board! How to Play - Drag your finger across the screen to look up, down, and 360 degrees around you - Tap zombies and other incoming creatures to shoot them - Save survivors - Switch between up to 6 equipped weapons and abilities (make sure to use the right weapon at the right time!) - Earn money to buy and upgrade new weapons and abilities after each level - Blow away zombies and have fun! Features - Unique mix of casual, yet strategic game play - this is not just a mindless shooter! - 2 game play modes: story and endless - In-depth story line - Global online leader board - Over 20 completely different, dynamic levels; fight in places you've never experienced in an iPhone game - the inside of a subway car, cornfields, Central Park, rooftops and more! - In your face action: fight dozens of zombies at once coming at you from every direction - Over 20 upgradable weapons and abilities including mini gun, shotgun, sniper rifle, proximity mines, medpacks, machete, chainsaw, and more! - 11 different enemy types, from giant zombies standing over 10 feet tall, to lumbering fat zombies, to cop zombies, and tumor zombies - Over 20 achievements, each with its own highly detailed trophy - Hours of game play and tons of re-playability! To watch a game play trailer and check out more screen shots, visit http://foursakenmedia.com/?portfolio=new-york-zombies --------------------- Follow us on twitter @FoursakenMedia
reviews: A played this way when it first released and I couldn’t begin to describe the sense of dread and horror I felt on my first playthrough. The soundtrack and sound design pull you in for a charming and spooky experience. In a world full of easily monetizeable garbage, NYZ flicks the middle finger and tells the player that everything you own in the game is bough VIA the in-game currency. If you so choose to invest yourself into this game, the story opens up via dairy-like excerpts from the main character’s point of view as they make themselves through the city. Each weapon and item has its use. From using stronger caliber guns for bigger foes, to saving your Molotov cocktails for crowd control. I heavily recommend this game. It’s unlike any ive ever played. And I’ll keep coming back to it because there’s just nothing like it on the AppStore. Sure the graphics are muddy, but barring that, the muddiness and darkness of the color pallet only makes the game all the more terrifying to play through. This game is amazing this is how the game is you go on a level you pick your weapons and head out when your killing zombies you haft to touch the screen. you get to fight all types of zombies. I rate this game 5 out of 5 trust me that’s how good this game is. One problem can the creators of this game can you make it where you can walk around and also can you add more blood when you bust a zombies head off. Other than that this game is very good. Buy this game now.

name: ‎Offworld Tactics
description: From the two guys that made ShipmatcH and Zombies of the Dead.  With almost 3 years spent in development, comes their most ambitious project yet. OFFWORLD: TACTICS! When covert deep space technology needs repairs, a team of highly trained specialists are sent to perform just such task. What the team didn't know is WHY everything on the Wandering Star needed repairs... Now, surrounded by hostile aliens, and mercenaries sent to keep you from the truth, the team must fight their way back to safety, and hopefully to some answers!   GET TACTICAL: Play the game in two completely different modes! Action mode for fast paced 3rd person shooter action, with gameplay straight out of a console game, complete with cover system! Or play Tactical mode, a top down squad based RTS where you control every action of your team of four! NO GAME IS EVER THE SAME: Battle your way across varied locations including cramped spaceship halls, secret facility bunkers and vast planetary surfaces! Every level layout is randomly generated, creating almost infinite possibilities within the nine campaign missions. Monster placement and reactions will be different every time you play for more variation and replayability! TOO HARD? TEAM UP: Play through the entire campaign with up to four players in co-operative mode! Customise your player colours to stand out locally with wifi or globally thanks to Game Centre, in both Action and Tactial mode! ARM UP AND MOVE OUT: Collect 20 different weapons, starting from the humble pistol and working your way through SMG's, Assault rifles, Sniper Rifles all the way up through Flame throwers to the devestating Rocket launcher, and Maintainence Spiker! And if a single gun isn't your style, you can always dual wield! TAKE ON YOUR FRIENDS: 6 different styles of randomly generated arenas await players who like to make things personal! Prove who is the best in Death Match, Blaster Master, or the co-operative Horde Mode! FIND THE SECRETS, UNCOVER THE TRUTH: With two different endings and plenty of hidden packages delivering bonus artwork to players, there's no reason not to play this game with friends again and again! Can you keep your entire team alive long enough to find out what has happened? Have you got what it takes marine? Download OFFWORLD: TACTICS today!
reviews: Hi,Your game is not too bad, but I'd advise that you fix all the glitches and big within the in- game, but also update it so it can support IOS 9 & below, why because it would help people to like Offworld Tactics a bit better. Thanks😊 Glad to see you guys finally update the game and especially the controls. When will online play be returning though? I’ve been waiting for a good 2 years for it to return. I hope you guys didn’t abandoned this and Zombies of The Dead.

name: ‎Off Road Police Bus Driving - Transport Cops with Protocol in Extreme Weather Conditions
description: Let’s begin the adventurous bus driving with realistic controls and awesome simulation. Off road police bus driving is a 3d simulator where you play as a bus driver appointment of hill climbing roads to transport police officers to their require destinations. Some police officers need to be transported to the coffee shop, some of them need a ride to the prison so be quick and move to the desired location of time. Bus simulator games will make you realize your bus driver duty and join the city police. Be careful with landslides, dangerous turns and thunderstorm environment. Police cops are on duty at the hill side and your duty as the hill climb police driver is to transport policemen to different check posts, other stations and prison. Be quick in your duty to drive the police bus on the desired spots. Driving a bus off road is never an easy task. Steep paths, dangerous turns, mountain tops and uncertain weather conditions. Police officers are waiting for their pick and drop service. Hill side drive will showcase your driving skills. Moving traffic will be a big hurdles while driving on these hills and mountains. Enjoy hours of non-stop fun with this hill climb racing bus simulator. Get ready for off-road hill driving in this 3d bus simulator with hill climber adventure. Ensure safety but have fun too. Your duty time begins with you hired as the police bus driver. You have been appointed on the hill side to fulfil your duty as the police bus hill climbing driver. Pick up police cops and drop them to their destination. Off road driving is an adventure so play it now! name: ‎Octagon 2: Extreme Evolution
description: "Sequel of the very successful Octagon game from 2013 is pulling you back to the megaplex of hallways, platforms, obstacles and gaps. The Octagon has grown up and become faster, more complex and very challenging. Can you survive the maddest of mad races? Octagon is a minimal arcade game where you have to move fast or be left behind. As the floor moves beneath you, spin your world around to dodge speed bumps. An energizing soundtrack by award winning Jessica Kelly keeps you in the zone on your race to the finish. But with each round over after just 60 seconds, only super-fast reflexes will beat this very challenging game. Features: - 3 game modes that pull in everyone, doesn’t matter if you are an experienced player or new to this game - Procedural design and graphics are offering unlimited number of levels - Original soundtrack by Jessica Kelly - Universal App with iCloud syncing - Pure challenge for free with no ads or buy premium version via in-app purchase and enjoy all features Tell me if you love it or hate it at info@lukaskorba.com or follow me at @lukaskorba."
reviews: This game is really fun to play and adds new challenges to the original game. I enjoy it, but is becoming increasingly difficult to enjoy because whenever i make turns or jumps it just moves me through the wall and meakes me fall for no reason. I think this bug will likely be fixed soon, but other than that this is a good game. Super big fan of Octagon 1 and was stoked when this new version came out. Same general idea as the first one, but with a bunch of new fun obstacles and color scheme. The moving obstacles are so much fun and make the game even more challenging and trippy than before. Super fun that going to new levels not only increases the speed but unlocks new obstacles as well. A bit buggy but it just came out so I'm sure it will only get better. Also, for someone who played 50  levels of Octagon 1, the beginning levels of this are painfully slow; it would be cool to skip levels or increase the speed if you've already played Octagon 1. I've been playing Octagon 1 for years and was incredibly excited to play Octagon 2, but I was truly dissapointed when I downloaded it. The game is far slower than the original and I feel like most of the time I'm only waiting, and not playing. Much more than this, I feel like the game's new obstacles that alter the world, such as moving platforms and switching blocks, change the game in a bad way. I've always enjoyed how in the original you know exactly what you have to do. There aren't any surprises, you always can see where you have to go, but now with these obstacles the game is much more reaction based instead of skill based. I am very disappointed by this game, especially as a sequel to an amazing and simplistic game.
keywords: Octagon 2: Extreme Evolution, Lukas Korba, Games, Action, mac apps, app store, appstore, applications, itunes

reviews: I loved office jerk and you guys need to figure out how to make the game better I wish that you could add a Christmas update for OfficeZombie and have more stuff to throw you guys need to put guns into the game I like it already but we want more improvements in the game I think your games are amazing so thanks for making my childhood a lot better from Braden D. :) Suddenly I’ve become very disappointed with this game. I used to be able to watch videos to earn free eyeballs, except now, for the past several weeks, I watch a video until the end but then I cannot “x” out of it and lose the eyeball credit. The “x” becomes a dead link. Also, another problem I’m having is that the screen turns either white or black. I’m becoming very frustrated with this. I watch the videos until the end but am not credited an eyeball because the screen freezes and will not let me “x” out when the video is finished. That’s a very big waste of my time. I’ve loved this game since middle school, and I can honestly say that it has next to no issues. The one bug I’ve noticed is that the “Anvilled” checklist item can’t be filled out. It would be nice if scratch cards were added to this game, like in Office Jerk and Holiday Jerk.

reviews: I really enjoy this game. So much so that I paid to go as-free. However, I do wish the game was more challenging. Love that you added a daily challenge but make it more challenging. After playing for so long I have gained so many coins that I can’t even spend on anything. Raise the coin balance required to purchase different rods, characters and such. It’s too easy to gain all the coins to “buy” everything available. Maybe even add something where you must spend coins to get a second try at a level. Something, anything... I have 100k coins and nothing to do with them.  Drives me nuts lol I think that this game is sooo fun and seriously addictive. I don’t understand how people are like “oh the ads ruin the game and it’s just not fun because of the endless ads” Well almost everything has ads so... better get used to it. If you are worried about ads I honestly don’t think there are to many maybe every 4th time you do something (but I’m not to sure so don’t quote me on it). To me ads are things you can overlook when there’s a good game and to me this is a good game. This game is fun, visually appealing, and I like the colors, characters and different options you can choose... with that being said however, it gets a bit boring after a while. It seems to be somewhat repetitive and that can get old really quick. I’m not sure what the “ultimate goal” is, other then to just keep going and going. I feel like I’ve beaten the game already. I’ve got all of the characters, roads and colors. At this point it’s just the same thing over and over. Also, there are way too many ads... I don’t mind an ad once in a while - but after every level?  Come on, that’s a bit ridiculous.

reviews: I like this game and the idea. Each unlocked character has unique maps a special power it uses to help you against the ghosts. I must be a bit behind because I paid $1.99 per unlock which I thought was expensive. I see that they were charging $6.99! Yikes! I thought the two bucks was high. There are six levels with each unlock...then you’re done. TLDNR: Cheaply made game with bad controls and graphics that costs $100.  (UPDATE: They lowered the price to a total of $20. Better than $100, still overpriced for what you get. Rest of review still stands. Increasing rating by 1-star). Long version: This is a simple pac man game with Ralph and Felix “modifying” the basic mazes by wrecking and fixing walls. The walls they break/fix don’t fit in with the maze graphics and just look horrid, as do Ralph and Felix. To make matters worse, the controls are really bad. You swipe in the direction you want to go, with no precision or responsiveness at all. This looks and plays like it was a HS programming class homework assignment that the student got a C on. To make matters even worse, each and every new 6 stage maze is $7. Yes.. this costs $7 PER MAZE. For a total cost of $98. Hello there,Thank you for taking the time to write us! After hearing out the players' feedback, we’ve decided to lower the prices for the Maze unlocks! If you purchased mazes with the old price, please send a ticket to the dedicated support team and ask for assistance: http://bit.ly/2d5qzmk.Sincerely, The PAC-MAN Team It’s super addicting and I suggest it for anyone that likes 8-Bit, Pac-Man, or Wreck it Ralph. The only thing that I don’t really like is that you have to buy the other characters mazes. If I get an explanation on it maybe I would understand. If you ever decide to change it I think earning the mazes could replace it. I know I sound whiny and bratty after saying that. But I’m not rich and don’t have thousands of dollars. Still a great game though.
keywords: PAC-MAN: Ralph Breaks the Maze, BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment America Inc., Games, Entertainment, Action, Casual, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Quick Flick Reactions! - Reflex Test
description: Quick Flick is an addictive game requiring extreme concentration and lightning quick reactions. Simply swipe to flick the disc over to the matching coloured edge as quickly as you can. 3 Modes of play: • Survival - You have 1 second to flick each disc to the matching coloured edge, keep going for as long as you can. • 30 Second Challenge - You have 30 seconds to flick as many discs as you can.  Accuracy counts here. • Survival Spin - Survival mode with an added 'twist'! Compete with your friends and other Quick Flickers on the Quick Flick leader boards. If you have any issues or requests for enhancements just let us know by emailing support@chrishopkin.com. Thanks for playing.
keywords: Quick Flick Reactions! - Reflex Test, Martian Storm Ltd., Games, Action, Board, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Questy Quest
description: Time your taps to attack silly monsters! Unlock custom gear, then upgrade it to make your hero better! Take on quests at the Quest Guild, or traverse the endless Wilds! Tappy tap for looty loot in the epic Questy Quest - the adventure with so much slice that it's named twice! Journey through the Charming Mines, the Wailing Woods and the Perilous Plains on your adventure. Simply time your tap to vanquish your foes, but watch out - there's always a tougher monster out there for you to defeat! • Meet skeletons, slimes and dragons - oh my! • Powerful potions let you freeze, shock or set fire to enemies! • Hit each target to defeat monsters! • Loot enemies for their coins! • Gear up with axes, clubs, and... dead fish?
reviews: I friggin love this game! It's awesome! It also increases your focus by having to perfect your timing. It's really interesting how this game works. It works like a RPG, but better! I love this game 5/5 and I hope you make more like this. Actually, I don't because then I would have to choose which is better and which I should play more, XD. I like this game, it helps keep my reflexes nice and sharp when I'm on the road for months at a time. Also I hope to see more areas for exploration, timed events, and of course new baddies!My game was glitched and after reporting the problem the guys at questy quest responded back to me after a day or two, not only very helpful but fixed my issue. This game has my respect and went from 3 to 4 stars after the all the help and the new update, which you know can do more damage from each consistent stack of perfect taps. I hope to edit this review and change my 4 stars to 5 one day. Keep up the great work! First of all, this game is really good. Other than the gameplay, this game also trains your reflexes! I just downloaded this game yesterday, and I already have HOURS of gameplay! This game is really addicting and fun to play! I would recommend this game to EVERYONE! It’s Free, so go ahead and download it!
keywords: Questy Quest, Mighty Games, Games, Casual, Action, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Quarter Loop Ball
description: Small ball bird jump over quarter circle color wheel, avoid to crash with other birds.   Quarter Loop Ball is a simple free game but extremely hard to get high score. The main actor of this funny game is a cute bird (or chicken ball - if you call that). He can flight and jump when you touch on screen, and his mission is to cross as much as obstacles as he can. One obstacle is a quarter circle cage, a colorful wheel, with a small gap, always rounding to catch our bird hero. And our flappy hero bird does not have only one difficulty, he also has to flap and rush to avoid other birds - that fly cross over his way. You have to touch on screen to make our bird to flap, jump up to go inside a colorful circle wheel via its gap, then jump out when the gaps turn at the top position. This cycle loop again and again, inside, out, inside, out, nonstop. We call this  new game Quarter Loop Ball, and it is so crazy and funny. Quarter Loop Ball is not like Flappy Bird when you have to make the bird fly on a horizontal side, and  avoid clash with green pipe. It is not like Angry Bird when you have to think too much to damage as  much as possible. This funny game use some colorful wheel, quarter circle and vertical side of moving.  Very simple, tiny, light , and total free game. These jumpy birds and circle wheels would make you to be happy and funny every time you play it. Don't dash your phone when playing it, keep calm and enjoy every funny moment with this new game - Quarter Loop Ball - with flappy hero.
keywords: Quarter Loop Ball, Ha Dong, Games, Casual, Action, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes
