name: ‎Cadenza: Music, Betrayal, and Death HD - A Hidden Object Detective Adventure
description: Play the trial for FREE!  Pay once & complete the adventure! It’s 1941 and you’ve just returned from school to visit your father at his famous Jazz Pepper Club only to find that everyone has been petrified in a trance. Have they heard the wrong note? • LISTEN FOR THE SOUND OF BETRAYAL When a local sax-playing legend died, your father replaced him in the Dixie Peppers Band. Has he now been resurrected as a zombie with a thirst for revenge? • DELVE INTO A DARK MURDER MYSTERY Dig deep into this mysterious case and hunt down the undead musician that may be behind all this madness!  • EXPLORE THE WORLD OF JAZZ IN NEW ORLEANS Take in the sights and sounds of the French Quarter as you hunt for clues within challenging hidden object scenes and interactive mini-games! Follow the evidence that leads to a darker side of New Orleans to solve this tantalizing mystery! • UNCOVER THE VILLAIN’S PAST IN THE BONUS CHAPTER Keep an eye out for collectible music notes and morphing objects throughout your adventure!  Enjoy exclusive extras such bonus mini-games, beautiful wallpapers, and intriguing concept art! *** Discover more from Big Fish! *** Check out our entire game library with our Big Fish Games app absolutely FREE here: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishGamesApp Sign up for our newsletter and never miss a new release or promotion again: http://bigfi.sh/iSplashNewsletter Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. You can enjoy our virtually endless selection of games anytime, anywhere — on your PC, Mac, mobile phone, or tablet. Learn more at bigfishgames.com!  Become a fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/BigFishGames Follow us on Twitter: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishTwitter
reviews: Fabulous game. Gorgeous graphics depicting the New Orleans of the 40's, exciting cut scenes, instantaneous load between scenes. It was a very long game with a bonus chapter. There was a journal and you kept getting updated and clearly stated objectivesYou got a teleport map and labeled inventory. The HO scenes were very unusual, including pairs, putting objects back in place, silhouettes, and many other types. They were not boring at all! You had plus items to work with, and I like those because they are so interactive and different. The puzzles and mini-games were incredibly varied, and very unusual. You really had to wrack your brain, which some of the reviewers actually complained about. Then don't play, you morons! These games are supposed to make you use your heads!The only reason it didn't get 5 stars was that I had a bit of trouble following the story at times, and some of the games were so hard to manipulate that I had to skip them. But all in all, BigFish, a fabulous game! Keep them coming. You have been doing great as of late!Dream Team, this was a must play game! Oh yeah, NO RATS either!Love to Snooper, Moonbeam, Nambr, Dracyy, Bunkie, Hossie, Blueflier, and lil' Jo! Hope you all are doing great! Update:  Wow. That was a long game.  So bonus points for long playing time. And the same amount of points deducted for persnickety tapping spots (like on the candles in the tomb).  And a few more deducted for a storyline that quite frankly, just fizzled out like a wet firecracker.But still -- for the change up in HOP games, for the challenging yet fun mini-games, for the different location and theme-y music, for the long playing time and just for its uniqueness, I will sick with 4 stars on the review, and recommend this game as a "buy."What a pleasant excursion from the castles, fairy lands, deserted towns and snowed-under villages.  We're in New Orleans, in time for Mardi Gras.  Laissez les bon temps rouler!!Okay, so I haven't yet done any more than the trial, and I'm off to purchase it shortly -- but Mad Games/Big Fish made magic with their last game (albeit some glitchy issues towards the end, which I hope hope hope doesn't happen here).  So I write this to say -- lovely HOPs, mini games, graphics, voice overs, music, and music notes to find. If there are issues, rest assured, Blueflier will let you know.I will be back soon to finish the review, but so far -- why, darlin'...it's better than jambalaya and hush puppies... :)Personal update:  hi and hello and good juju and blessings to all the reviewers.  hope you are doing well.  i'm getting stronger every day... xoxoxo I am not a person to rave, but there is nothing about this game I didn't like, from the music (which I ALWAYS end up turning off, but not this time), to the storyline, to the twist on the HOS and puzzles, to the details the developers included in the game, including the ability to tell at a glance whether or not you have located the hidden musical note in each scene. This game had everything I look for in a game, plus a lot more! And am I the only one who totally loved the fact that the landlord's name in the bonus round is "Stanley Roper"? The few minor annoyances are virtually of no consequence, so I won't bother to mention them! Kudos to the developers and Big Fish for a clever and witty, beautiful game. This was the most fun I have had in a long time playing one of these games, and I have played hundreds of them!
keywords: Cadenza: Music, Betrayal, and Death HD - A Hidden Object Detective Adventure, Big Fish Games, Inc, Games, Adventure, Puzzle, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Cadenza: The Following
description: Continue the journey of the most famous hidden object puzzle adventure musical series! In Cadenza: The Following, a world of forgotten tunes awaits the person who can free a legendary rock band from a terrible place. You begin the game as a bright-eyed rock magazine reporter, ready to follow the reunion tour of the Velvet Whisper. The same rock band reached a legendary status decades ago but has since then been on hiatus. Now, they are coming back together and setting off to their first venue. However, on the way there a strange woman appears in the middle of the road. In a blink of an eye, the band as well as yourself is transported to a place called only the Downbeat. Once in the Downbeat, you will need not only fight to stay alive but also face a seemingly impossible task: freeing the band from this place of gentle horrors where countless other musicians have perished for good! Your time is running out and you feel the mist closing around you.  Will you hear the quiet notes of freedom? Can you reach all those to whom you’re the last chance? Do you have what it takes to learn who is behind the Downbeat?  BLEND OF MUSIC AND ADVENTURE Through a perfect combination of classic rock musical themes and amazing HOPA gameplay opportunities, Cadenza: The Following takes you to a place, unlike anything you saw before. Can the right tunes free you and the Velvet Whisper band from it? TAKE ON IMAGINATIVE HIDDEN OBJECT CHALLENGES The Downbeat and the real world offer a huge range of gorgeously designed hidden object challenges with a strong musical flavor. reviews: For a free game, the dev(s) packed a lot of content. The levels have the right amount of challenge, and the different weapons are fun to use. Getting coins is satisfying, and leveling up your weapons is also a nice mechanic. It's an entertaining platformer that is great to play in short bursts. That being said there isn't any revolutionary difference with this and most other platformers, so it is probably just what you expect. Nevertheless, it's definitely worth a download! I used to play this game and it was tons of fun, but now it has ads, enemies stay still when they hit you, sometimes Cally gets stuck in the wall, the map doesn’t work anymore, I’m pretty sure there were better things to buy in the store, and a few other stuff I’m sour about, but even with that it’s still fun, still plays and runs smoothly, and still has awesome music.

name: ‎Dark Mysteries: The Soul Keeper - Collector's Edition
description: Charles Dexter Ward has summoned you to the island of Pawtuxet to stop a renegade spirit that is murdering the townspeople. The spirit is using human souls to become immortal, and you will be next if you can't stop him. Based on the novel by H.P. Lovecraft, this Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game will test your investigative skills as you solve the mysteries of Ward’s family and complete the ritual that will banish this evil spirit once and for all! This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras: • Revive the lost souls in the bonus chapter! • In-game strategy guide • Exclusive behind-the-scenes video • Concept art gallery - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ALSO CHECK OUT THESE HIDDEN OBJECT ADVENTURES: • Mystery Stories - Mountains of Madness (http://bit.ly/12iS9vY) • 100% Hidden Objects (http://bit.ly/1aN2qa7) • Ancient Spirits - Columbus' Legacy (http://bit.ly/19SoW3N) AND OUR MATCH 3 GAMES • Jewel Legends Atlantis (http://bit.ly/1aN2uXa) • Jewel Legends - Tree of Life (http://bit.ly/1ay519Z)
reviews: These games are all fairly similar with lots of lists of items to click on room by room. Often the items are a bit obscure, leading to click-on-everything mode. But gradually they get easier as you get used to the game. The help along the way is excellent. The graphics and music are terrific. The stories are fun. In this case, it's not exactly the HP Lovecraft story, which adds some unique suspense. There is clearly an avoidance of the seriously scary. These are kid friendly games.The 'Collectors' Edition' extras are enjoyable. I liked the bonus chapter. I played through the entire game within the equivalent of an afternoon, albeit with a headache and aching button clicking finger. But that's my problem. IOW: I found it to be very good fun that kept me interested to the point of not wanting to stop until I'd solved everything. I did find the help provided to be essential during the first play through. But what a great help system! I never needed to touch the walkthrough provided. The help didn't spoil anything but kept me on track with the quests and games without having to waste time running all over to find the next goal location. There are three game playing modes. Start with easy and move up a notch each following play through.The team's obsession with HP Lovecraft is greatly appreciated. They have a lovely series of related games and often toss in a few Lovecraftian obscure references for fellow fanatics. I got this because I’m an H P Lovecraft fan, so this is my first ever hidden object/puzzle game. Got to say, I’m hooked! The game looks and works great, with just enough dramatisation to keep the story clear without getting in the way of the hidden object and other puzzles. Atmospherics are great, including the perpetual rain outdoors and the authentic look of a 1920s fishing village, albeit with a slight art deco twist. The Lovecraftian vibe is a bit more subtle here compared to the Cerasus Media’s ‘Mountains of Madness’ game (which tracked the source material rather closely). That's presumably to make ’Soul Keeper' work as an adventure game, so rather than overtly following the ‘Case of Charles Dexter Ward’ story, the player tries to stop Joseph Curwen stealing the souls he needs to become immortal. This is the special edition version of the game and comes with a whole extra level to be played after the main game is finished, as well as a walkthrough manual and even a copy of the original HPL novella.
keywords: Dark Mysteries: The Soul Keeper - Collector's Edition, cerasus.media, Games, Puzzle, Adventure, mac apps, app store, appstore, applications, itunes

name: ‎Dandara Trials of Fear Edition
description: The world of Salt hangs on the brink of collapse. The citizens, once free spirits, now stand oppressed and isolated. But not all is lost, for out of this aether of fear arises a heroine, a ray of hope. Her name is Dandara. Welcome to a unique 2D metroidvania platformer full of mystical creatures and boundless exploration. Defy gravity as you jump across floors, walls, and ceilings alike. Discover the mysteries and secrets hidden throughout the world of Salt and its diverse array of characters. Empower Dandara for combat and survival against enemies bent on oppression. Awaken, Dandara, to bring freedom and balance to this directionless world. ENTER THE HIDDEN REALMS - The Trials of Fear Edition* adds 3 new areas to explore, a new big boss, new powers and mechanics, new music tracks, a new secret ending, as well as many quality of life updates and more! UNCOVER THE SALT - The Trials of Fear Edition adds a whole new focus on story, fleshing out the lore of the Salt and its inhabitants. Find new descriptions, dialogues and cutscenes for existing characters and environments! INNOVATIVE CONTROLS - Built natively for both touchscreen and gamepad input, movement and combat interact smoothly and seamlessly.         BOUNDLESS EXPLORATION - Traverse across the esoteric world of Salt through fast and fluid jumps off any surface, unhindered by gravity, in lovingly crafted environments. CHALLENGING PROGRESSION - Use a combination of speed & skill, wits & reflexes, to solve puzzles, earn power-ups, and access areas previously unreachable. BEAUTIFUL AND IMMERSIVE WORLD - A visual and auditory wonderland comes to life through gorgeous handcrafted pixel art and original soundtrack compositions. * Dandara: Trials of Fear Edition content is free to download to all existing owners of Dandara.
reviews: Dandara is full of fascinating movement. Everything from weapon effects to subtle background details are beautifully animated. Swipe to launch yourself from platform to platform, and with practice, darting past obstacles while blasting enemies can be achieved with almost poetic precision. Impressive level design offers thrilling, almost puzzle-like combat and hides plenty of secrets for more patient adventurers to pursue. This is not an easy game, but for those willing to learn its intricacies, Dandara is immensely rewarding. Dandara clearly draws heavy inspiration from many of the core classics that have shaped the staple mechanics and ideas we have today! The side scrolling genre can get old quick lacking originality. But the way this game is constructed through exploration, and platforming it kind of takes away from the focus of beating “bosses” so to speak to progress. Though there are plenty of bosses that are beautifully crafted with difficulty. Speaking of difficult, the skill cap on this game is demanding but fair. I never felt like I couldn’t overcome The obstacles set before me. Mechanically speaking the feeling of jumping from wall to wall was ever so satisfying. It feels great. I feel like I’m shooting a rubber band across the room with this super jump. Makes me feel like a hero! The only complaint I have is the combat it’s self with the shooting mechanics. I just don’t like that I have to charge my shots. Though it does add a layer of difficulty that is cohesive with the game. Lastly the world building and overall vibe, BRILLIANT! The world is an aesthetically pleasing array of eye candy and eloquence. It draws clear inspiration from games like “The Legend of Zelda”, “Metroid”, and even alittle like “Mega Man”. All in all though it’s own piece of magical art! I ADORE this game. So fantastic. And I recommend it to mobile and console gamers alike. I've never really written a review but here it goes.  No matter how often I play iPhone games they're always lacking the feel of a portable handheld game made by Nintendo for their new 3DS or even their older handheld consoles.  That finally changed with this game.  The feeling I get when playing Dandara is a cross between symphony of the night (castlevania) and super metroid.  The movement is unique to the game as Dandara flies from jump pad to jump pad, otherwise the weapons, music, graphics and overall feel to the game does not feel like an IOS touchscreen game. I truly think this feature could make Nintendo worth. Because, if games like this continue to be released there will be no point for a 3DS anymore.  Amazing job guys.  My only thing I would like to see is the ability to switch the movement joystick and the gun joystick as I feel like for left / right handed people this could make a difference. I won't rate you down a star for this as the game was just released.  If I could do more than two thumbs up I would. Again great job and thank you
keywords: Dandara Trials of Fear Edition, Raw Fury, Games, Action, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

description: Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases! After spending years tracking down dark dimensions across the country, you’ve finally returned to the dreaded Whispering Hollows, the site of your parents’ strange disappearance. Now your sister has also been taken and it’s up to you find the truth behind your family’s greatest tragedy before it’s too late! • UNTANGLE THE TWISTED WEB SURROUNDING BARTON MANSION This place hasn’t been very good to your family in the past, but now you have the chance to right the wrongs of history and save your sister from a terrible evil! • CAN YOU FETCH ALL OF THE CLUES? Partner up with your faithful pup Rocky and explore ghastly hidden object scenes.    • SLICE THROUGH A MAZE OF SINISTER DESIGN Decipher challenging puzzles and clever mini-games to free your family from the grip of terror. • SILENCE THE GHOSTS THAT PLAGUE MARTHA BARTON Stop the evil force behind this haunted mansion and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectibles, an integrated strategy guide, and bonus games! *** Discover more from Big Fish! *** Check out our entire game library with our Big Fish Games app absolutely FREE here: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishGamesApp Sign up for our newsletter and never miss a new release or promotion again: http://bigfi.sh/iSplashNewsletter Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. Become a fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/BigFishGames Follow us on Twitter: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishTwitter
reviews: Here's what worked for me: I tapped on a note piece, moved it over the main sheet of paper and then tapped the bottom of the window. This would rotate the note by 90 degrees. I would then try to fit it to the main sheet. If it was the correct orientation, it would snap into place. Otherwise I would rotate again (By tapping the bottom of the window) and try again. Hope this works for folks!So my review: The good: love Rocky, my helper dog. Story is OK. Seems that the house has a taste for the entire family.The bad: graphics are not always the sharpest and some scenes are quite dark. Slow transition times when changing scenes. The ugly: tricky to maneuver some objects, seems a little picky on placement in the hidden object scenes so you aren't sure if you are doing the right sequence of movements or just not tapping the right placeNot the best game out there right now. Highly recommend the five-bn games, especially the newest Lost Lands 3 game. Always high quality game play! I've just started it, so I might miss some stuff, but I love the graphics, music, sounds. Interactive map & Strategy Guide which so far has been a bit confusing sometimes on games, but you can figure it out. The HOPSCOTCH are varied - so far mostly finding something then using it to get something else. Custom Difficulty is available & I always like that. Storyline is good & creepy as is the music & voices fit characters. My least favorite thing  - & I realize that it's picky, but you'll be surprised how irritating it can be - the Guide button is in top left corner so it gets covered up with text & you can't get to it a lot of the time.  If you don't use it, it won't e a problem, but I use it to find collectibles & game help. My favorite part so far is the game construction. They're different than anything I've experienced before. Like one has paintings you have to put together piece by piece & paint each piece. Bother has a town that you have to put together & a house you put everything in. Fun to me. I'd recommend it for sure & it seems like it isn't as short as many are lately! Gotta go play - have fun!

name: ‎Eden - World Builder
description: Explore a world of limitless possibility. Build your own personal Eden. Unleash your creative and adventurous spirit! Eden is a game that lets you do awesome things with blocks.   The game engine enables crazy sandbox fun.  Build, destroy and explore your way through endless worlds.  What will you make? Fun for all ages and played by millions; Eden is a best selling game on the App Store and has just received its biggest update yet! Features:  * Huge worlds to explore, build, and destroy  * All kinds of materials to build with * Colors * Fire and explosives * Fireworks, portals, paint bombs, lights, doors and treasure cubes * Lovable creatures, including new aggressive ones * Community: share your builds with friends and explore new worlds * Millions of user created worlds
reviews: Eden is a fun game to play when your bored, but it needs some upgrades to make the game a little but more fun. One upgrade that would be cool is if you build a car and get in it, then the car would actually move. And you could steer the car with tilting the screen. And when your done riding in it, them jump and you can walk again. Another cool improvement is if you can fly, cause in this game you can't jump that high. Another good improvement would be changing the color of the red animals skin. Because the rest of the animals skin color you can change, but not the red ones. And the last cool thing that would be fun to have on this game is fake people or real people. Like if someone else happens to be playing in the same world as you, then you should be able to see them and chat with them. And fake people, if no one is playing the same world as you, then fake people driving cars or inside of buildings can be great. Thanks for reading my review and I really hope one of these choices can be added in the game! This game is great despite it mainly trying to be a knock off of minecraft. It handles well, but I have a few nit picks. Number 1: I think you've abandoned this game. You haven't updated it in a year! I wouldn't imagine it to be to hard to add in a few more game mechanics. Try to make it seem less minecraft knock off-y and make it like an actual game. Number 2: This game seriously needs to be debugged. Now I don't know if it's just me experiencing these problems but I'm gonna say them. One major glitch a came across about a year ago was that you couldn't search any world and after that bug was fixed, I think every world before that bug just died, except for the featured worlds. Now, there is one big I'm currently experiencing. Whenever I name and upload a world, it's name doesn't change. You need to fix this bug right now because it's making a lot of worlds lost in the abyss of being named World 6 or World 372. That's all I have to say about this game. It's a really good game for a knock off. It does have problems but they can be easily exterminated if you look at this game as a game. That's all I have to say. Thank you for this game. I've had this game since I bought my ipod touch 4th gen. When it was still pretty fresh in the app store I often played it more than minecraft just for the feature of posting my worlds to the game's server. As minecraft keeps adding new features, I find less of a need to play this one which is a shame. I love this game but it feels forgotten not only by the ones who played it but by the creator/s themselves. Although I admire the simplicity of Eden, here are the key features I think this game should obtain to become relevant again: more block shapes (but not alot just keep it simple) and features, more colors, MULTIPLAYER, fix the bugs, improve the lighting dynamics, higher resolution graphics, add clouds and sun to add some life and improve the home screen layout so I dont have to click an arrow to choose a world, instead I can just swipe through the menu to make it easier. So in conclusion keep the theme of simplicity in the game but also keep it updated and inprove it as other technology improves.

name: ‎Easter Party Food Cooking
description: Easter is coming! Our princesses are going to hold a party. So there are many things waiting for them, can you help them? Decorate the egg and cook delicious food. Happy Easter! Preparing for Easter by cooking up one of her favorite holiday recipes. Every year, this talented chef invites her family over for a day of Easter egg hunts and eating great food. All of her eggs have been painted and hidden, so now all she has to do is hit the kitchen to whip up a batch of hot cross buns for this colorful holiday. Your progress is timed, so hurry up and follow the instructions and prepare the hot cross buns within the time limit to earn a high score in this fun online cooking game.

name: ‎Earth And Legend®
description: The most advanced full-scaled multiplayer 3D RPG for iOS has arrived. Join the battle in this epic RPG adventure delivered in stunning 3D.  FEATURES: MULTIPLAYER Earth And Legend features multiplayer mode as well as single player. Team up with friends and experience full worldwide online multiplayer. The multiplayer system allows players to tag team creatures and fight alongside each other while solving quests PETS Earth And Legend features the ability to own pets. Not only do pets make great companions but they also are trained to fight alone side their owner in combat COMBAT SYSTEM Earth And Legend features 3 skill lines (Melee, Bow and Magic), which include a new and innovative combat system with real-time live action melee attacks and spell casting REAL NIGHT AND DAY Earth And Legend features a true in-game cycle of night and day on a 24 hour based time system. For every 24 minutes that the game is played, a full night and day cycle of 24 hours passes in the game world WEATHER SYSTEM Earth And Legend features a highly advanced weather system. Depending on weather conditions, from time to time it will rain. In high altitude places it snows. A very strong rainfall will even produce thunder and lightning, which can be used by magicians. Some spells draw power directly from thunder and lightning, making the caster very powerful when it rains ADDITIONAL FEATURES * Customize your character * Over 40 hours of gameplay * Variety of weapons, armor and items to choose from * Free roaming RPG * Shop for food or go fishing and catch it yourself * Challenging bosses to defeat * Detailed side quests * Multiple languages: English, French, and German
reviews: First off, I want to say that I am not here because the game promised me 500 gold.  So, I'm not being paid, even virtually, to give this app five stars.  This is a rare occasion I come to the App Store out of gratitude for a great app. I'm a huge fan of Elder Scrolls.  I love the apps Ravensword and Aralon.  This app is along the same grounds.  Although not perfect, it achieves a similar experience in its own way.  The absolutely best feature is Multiplayer mode, something similar apps have yet to achieve.  This feature alone made the app a hundred times more fun.  It became a family game.  I have been playing with my daughters.  We battled together, shared discoveries, helped each other overcome monsters that challenged us, and just laughed together.  We have also enjoyed meeting other players from outside our home. Okay, the Multiplayer is not perfect.  Sometimes it doesn't work quite well.  And there are always a list of things in a game like this that you wish they did better, but that can be true of any app.  I'm really glad they made the attempt even if it's not perfect.  It have given us loads of fun.  My thanks to the developers. I'm going to give this game a bit of my time I can see already. I just got started and they offered 500 coins to get me started. Just to write a review about a game that I'm sure is going to be what I wanted. The iPhone version for the iPad with multiplayer. Now how can we improve? I'm going to go find out.I have to say I didn't notice you guys stopped updating EarthLegend but if you don't update it then I will not be able to play it! It's a great game for IPhone. Update it please. 5/7/17 It would be nice to play an hour or two before being ask to rate a game!!! Heck I've been on about 5 min. Now they want a rating shucks it seems to be a great game but until I play some moe I'll give it a 4 star and be back after I'm sure of any kind off rate.! Does it have to be 5 star to bet the 500 gold cause it ask agin and I didn't get any gold yet? Beware I tried to do a delete and reinstall and lost my game. I did the quest to scare the boy back to town. When I checked with his dad he rewarded me with a sack of fish. But my inventory was full and didn't get it. That's why I tried to delete and reinstall. Lost my 10,000 gold I bought and pearls. I hope they can give me or restore my purchases back!!! Needless to say I'm starting from the very beginning of game😁
keywords: Earth And Legend®, DVide Arts Inc., Games, Adventure, Entertainment, Role Playing, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Early Worm
description: Are you the Early Worm that catches the apple?  Early worm is family friendly physics based platformer about a worm that wants to collect all the apples.  Sling your worm around 80 levels full of surprises:  - Stick to walls and ceilings with honey, bounce on the mushroom beds! - Dive into the deep waters with diving bell!  - Jump around and solve mechanical puzzles!  - Thumble up and down in a rotating cube! - Fling into the mysterious blackstuff and float around in the antigravity!  - These and many more crazy things await you in Early Worm.   Wake up early and start jumping now! Can you make it to the end? FEATURES: • Colourful graphics • Family friendly gameplay • 80 levels • Physics! Game has advertisements and a No Ads purchase.
reviews: I’m usually partial to logic based puzzles, not any kind jumper/platform/action. I prefer calm & tranquil vibes, since I’m anxious enough as it is lol. But the simple, clean graphics & frankly super adorable lil worm won me over. I’m so glad! Gameplay is kinda like a pinball machine meets non-timed logic/physics puzzlers. Challenge builds up steadily to acclimate, quick enough to keep interest, & puzzle variation to keep you thinking. It’s not timed, & there hasn’t been any kinda enemy/threat that’d put you on edge. There’s been levels that have frustrated me, but nothing a brief break didn’t fix 😊I’m grateful I gave Early Worm a try, it’s been fun, exciting, & it’s been a great stepping stone out of my comfort zone! A big thank you to the developers for this awesome game! Bonus: it’s free!!! PS. Yes, since it’s free, it does have ads. Yes, there’s an ad between levels. I do not hold this against the game. Plus, longer ads have a fast forward! I thoroughly believe people have been spoiled by so many ad-free options, & lack patience. I fully understand that a free game must earn revenue, & it’s beyond unfair to knock them for doing so w/ ads. As long as they’re not distracting or  mess/outweigh w/ gameplay, which isn’t the case here. Is a 10-15 second ad between levels that bad, people? Now I know the title my sound over exaggerated but, with recent shut down and everything I have way more time on my hands. Which is fine because it’s important in keeping others safe. But I’ve downloaded so many games and either I finish all the levels in two days or I get stuck on a level and quit. But this game is a perfect balance of enjoyable yet challenging, I absolutely love the squishy worm. I will say I’ve only downloaded this game yesterday, or today? so I know very little about how everything plays out and how long you can play it. I really enjoyed playing this game. Levels were so simple, yet challenging. There were so many different dynamics and mechanics to the game which made it really fun to try and figure out how to not only beat a level but get all three stars. Most mobile games coming out lately don’t have a lot of time put into them and are just repetitive or clicker style games. This game stands out and it shows you guys really put a lot of time and effort in. Hope to see more from you guys soon.
keywords: Early Worm, Oddrok Oy, Games, Puzzle, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Fallout Pip-Boy
description: From Vault-Tec and RobCo Industries comes the Pip-Boy: America’s finest, easiest-to-use personal information processor.   CREATING AN ELECTRONIC BOND! This app lets your portable device interact with Fallout 4 on your Xbox One, PlayStation 4 or PC.  Away from your game system?  No problem!  Pip-Boy will remember your status and allow you to access your data while on the go.   SYNCHRONIZED TO YOUR TERMINAL! Improve your life by integrating completely with Fallout 4.  Check your Stats, Inventory, Map, Radio and even play your holotape games all from the convenience of your Pip-Boy application.   MINI GAME MANIA! Thanks to revolutionary advances in emulation technology, you can now play holotape games on your Pip-Boy.  Atomic Command included free!   MADE JUST FOR YOU! Designed for both new Vault Dwellers and those already familiar with the dangers of the Wasteland!   FALLOUT 4 PIP-BOY EDITION COMPATIBILITY! Did you purchase the Fallout 4 Pip-Boy Edition for your favorite game system? Make sure to snap in your phone device for the complete Pip-Boy experience!
reviews: My pip boy for some reason in game will not display a screen, no clue why. But the mods i had downloaded never caused this problem, i only started noticing this when i downloaded this app, the app actually freezes anytime im outside of power(which thank god i always use power armor) and therefore my in game pip boy screen doesnt display when im out of power armor, but does when i am in power armor. Im able to leave and go back to the pip boy without issue, but it just shows up as a blank screen besides the very bottom row, to drop, favorite, etc. Im sometimes able to use the app to change gear out of power armor but that usually doesn't last for long. I’ll submit a ticket to Bethesda's website, so this has a greater chance of getting solved but anything you guys could do would be appreciated! I love the app and it works perfectly, but I have an idea that can improve it for the (Actual) pip-boy owerns, sorry other users. I noticed that there are light up features on the pip- boy including the on off switch and the screen itself but there is something that I think that could be lit up, the radiation counter. So I realize that this update might affect people that use iPhone 6, iphone5 or Samsung galaxy S4 and S6. The older generation of phones might not work(iphone4) because they're too small, sorry older generation. My idea for the app would have a small light directly under the radiation counter illuminate to illuminate the radiation counter, to give it the illusion that it was working. This light could be toggled on and off from the settings menu. My foam cut out for my Iphone 6 was cut in a way so that, the phone on its back with the home button facing the radiation counter, the screne is able to reach the radiation counter to be able to illuminate it. I hope you might take this idea into consideration.Sincerely: Campbell I was really excited to use this app but just like most things these days it doesn't work. I have tried everything. In fallout 4 settings I have the pip boy enabled. In the Xbox settings I have SmartGlass enabled for anybody. I checked the account that I'm logged into in the Xbox settings. I tested that my password was correct by logging into SmartGlass. I am able to connect to my Xbox using the SmartGlass app. When I try to connect on the pip boy app I select "Xbox one" and my Xbox appears with the correct IP address. I select it and login but it says it's unable to connect. I tried restarting the game like it suggests. I tried restarting the app. I tried restarting the Xbox. Unfortunately the troubleshooting is SmartGlass troubleshooting, not pip boy app troubleshooting. It only suggests to restart the router and if that doesn't work to default to factory settings on the router. I know it isn't the router because I am able to connect on SmartGlass, the networks are the same (my 5ghz ssid is different than my 2.4ghz ssid), and the IP address is correct. I really wish it worked but it doesn't so I can't give it more than one star. Please fix it Bethesda before I have moved on from this game.
keywords: Fallout Pip-Boy, Bethesda, Games, Role Playing, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Fairy Tale Mysteries 2: The Beanstalk
description: "Excellent graphics and creative gameplay" – Allaboutcasualgame.com "Brilliant game" – Big Fish Games user   FANTASTIC HIDDEN OBJECT PUZZLE ADVENTURE GAME FROM THE CREATORS OF ENIGMATIS AND GRIM LEGENDS! Delve into a wonderful fantasy adventure game inspired by the classic Grimm's Fairy Tales! Find your way to the magic land in the clouds and vanquish the last of the giants before he destroys the world! TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! A long, long time ago the world was the stage of the struggle between the sinister giants and the noble race of peace-keeping guardians. After a fierce battle the giants were vanquished, except for one, whom the guardians overpowered with powerful magic and banished to a mysterious land above the clouds.   Thousands of years have passed and the world is once again on the brink of extinction. All thanks to a boy who got hold of some magic beans powerful enough to open a path to the cloud world and put humankind in grave danger. Taking on the role of a fledgling detective from the Brothers Grimm Institute, you’ll embark on a journey through magical worlds to find the castle of the last of the giants, and face him using your wits, magic spells, and the protection of the guardians. The fate of the world is in your hands. Are you up to the challenge? • Solve 83 unique tasks related to 15 hidden object scenes! • Explore 52 locations in 5 diverse worlds! • Find 400 items hidden in various locations! • Test your wits in 29 mini-games! • Find 41 collectible items! +++ MORE ARTIFEX MUNDI GAMES ! +++ Persian Nights: Sands of Wonders Scarlett Mysteries: Cursed Child Ghost Files: The Face of Guilt Queen's Quest 3: The End of Dawn The Secret Order 5: The Buried Kingdom  +++ WE ARE HERE +++ WWW: http://artifexmundi.com FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/artifexmundi TWITTER: http://twitter.com/ArtifexMundi FORUM: http://forum.artifexmundi.com YOUTUBE: http://youtube.com/user/ArtifexMundi PINTEREST: http://pinterest.com/artifexmundi INSTAGRAM: http://instagram.com/artifexmundi
reviews: It’s not perfect and there are some mini games that I absolutely hate but using the ‘skip’ button fixes that. I wish that the game had been a little longer but I might just be feeling greedy because, after speing $7, I didn’t feel cheated when it was over. I just wanted it to keep going. The game play is fun and a little different than what I’m used to but in a good way. It’s not a terribly complicated game but I enjoyed that as a change of pace. There are just the right amount of hidden object scenes that you want when you buy one of these games mainly for the adventure. The solutions to some of the searches are suprisingly straight forward; Find the objects, place them together, boom! You’re done. That was different, but it didn’t ruin the game for me. The times that it happens it’s almost a relief to not have a puzzle embedded within a puzzle for a change.Never boring and well worth the money. Recommended! I’m having such a great time playing this game. i love finding a game that is not too scary for the kids to play and is still great for adults. Too many games now are all geared towards  older teens and young adults that I find younger kids left out. This a shame because they are the game players of tomorrow. This game is great for them to learn on and to play. I also like to get away from the gore. So thank you Artifex Mundi for picking great one. I really enjoyed this game, it was different than many of the HO games.  I liked that you only had to hunt around in each scene, meaning the rooms within the scene.  …..Spoiler Alert for casual players (personally when I figured this out I had more fun - go figure)  They give you a hint to help you find the object you’re looking for…. Worth the $7-

reviews: Excellent. I rarely ever spend money on games for my phone, so I kind of begrudgingly hit the purchase button out of boredom. So glad I did though! You get a LOT of game for the price and I thoroughly enjoyed all of it. The puzzles are clever and tricky and super satisfying to solve. The ~only~ thing I was wishing for (mostly toward the end) was an option to fast travel with the maps. Other than that, my expectations were overwhelmingly exceeded. Great job, devs! I had no bug issues on my iPad (6th gen). Loved the game. Just The right amount of difficulty. Good hint system. Long gameplay worth 4.99 easy. if you like rusty lake, forever lost, etc I highly recommend this. I will be downloading all their other games now. Requires iOS 10.3 or later. reviews: First off to Lynx, I pray you get better soon you mean a lot to us gamers. Thank you for all your hard work. Now to my review this game was fabulous it had a map that transports you to where you need to go and you can customize your settings. The story ran smoothly and I had no problems at all. First, Thank you to Lynx Minx for all the hard work and continuing to communicate on behalf of gamers even when under the weather. You are much appreciated!Now for my review.  This could have been a great game except for a couple of ongoing issues.  The touch sensitivity is terrible, and extremely annoying.  Also, as in the previous game, placing some pieces in the puzzles is almost impossible.  They just do not stick.  I finally was able to manage one puzzle by double tapping the piece as I carefully placed it, but this is not acceptable.  Finally, there is a problem in the map view where some locations are off the right side of the screen and not accessible. Not yet my review yet but I thought it important to send a message to Lynx Minx...thanks a million for everything you do!! Thanks so much for keeping us updated with new games to look forward to, and for all your dedicated, time consuming work in working with the developers. You and your team are phenomenal and the developers are fortunate to have you assist and to collaborate with...and we are all lucky as well. You are simply amazing and VERY much appreciated! Please get well soon! 🌺

name: ‎Galaxies of Hope
description: Galaxies of Hope enables players to explore the worlds of neuroendocrine cancer patients, through the flight of a hot-air balloon. This is a reflective journey where players travel beyond their world, discovering the stories of other patients. Galaxies of Hope features 3 different galaxies, from the perspective of the patient, caregiver, and physician. About Novartis Pharmaceuticals Corporation Novartis is a global pharmaceutical company based in Switzerland that seeks to develop therapies to address the needs of patients worldwide. For more information, visit: https://www.pharma.us.novartis.com About Numinous Games Numinous Games is an award-winning independent video game studio that invites players on a journey of renewal, through meaningful interactive experiences that explore the heart of interaction. For more information, visit: https://www.numinousgames.com 3/20 NET-1228500
reviews: I couldn’t get through this game because it was so heartbreaking. My father died from the effects of cancer, but getting to hear the words of people in his shoes was very unique. This is a truly unique, special, and much needed app. Being able to be celebrated, supported and acknowledge as part of the team and experience, even if you aren’t the patient is something that needs to be more widely acknowledged and accepted. Not just the person with cancer is along for the journey, the family, doctor and whole team suffer, hurt, pray and go through the whole experience. I wish I could have finished this game, but it just hurt too much. Thank you to the creators for making this game. I hope you go on the create more beautiful works of art that continue to build bridges and bridge gaps in this world. Wow. Numinous Games does it again! Much like their game, That Dragon Cancer, Numinous has created an extremely powerful experience that will truly resonate with anyone who has been on the cancer journey. I would even recommend this to anyone who is friends with a cancer patient or caregiver so they can get a slightly better idea as to what kind of emotions they are likely dealing with. Beyond that, the artwork is simply gorgeous. Truly a beautiful experience. I loved this game. It amazing to get to hear the stories from those who had this cancer. It so heartwarming that these people had fought for their lives. This game Is being there for those who have net cancer and I appreciate that please make more of these kind of game. Thank you
keywords: Galaxies of Hope, Novartis Pharmaceuticals Corporation, Medical, Adventure, Games, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Gachaverse: Anime Dress Up RPG
description: Gachaverse Early Release is here! We are testing out the customization & studio aspect of Gachaverse. The battle mode has been disabled, but will be added in soon. More features will arrive soon as we update the early access version. There won't be a wipe unless a major exploit is found. Thank you for playing the Early Release version of Gachaverse!! - Welcome to the Gachaverse - The World of Gacha has expanded throughout the universe, but corruption has resurfaced once again. Take control of a new Gacha Summoner as you try to restore peace to the kingdom! Continue the story of Gacha World in this hit sequel and discover over one hundred new units! An advanced version of Gacha Studio is also available!  Create your own anime styled characters and dress them up in your favorite fashion outfits! reviews: I honestly think that gacha life is amazing one of the best games I’ve played I have a few suggestions about what we can change and add to the game. One thing I think we should add to the game is more characters for the skit maker I think about four would be fine but at least if you add more because it would be amazing. It is really hard to keep switching characters at times, also in the studio where you can add multiple characters is a bit hard for me since I’m not really sure I understand how to use it, that would be an amazing to change so if you don’t mind do it(not in a commanding way or anything).Another thing I think you should add to that game is the ability to have more characters well like slots kind like gacha life and I’m not saying you should change the whole game into Gacha Life or something that would basically make no sense but like about a few more slots would be great but not 30 like gacha life just saying. OK this is getting too long so I’ll say one more I think you should add more boy clothes because there’s a lot of clothes and accessories for the girls but not too much for boys and I also think you should I am more girl stuff too because it’s kind of fair and that’s it I hope you read this and take some of these in,I love gacha life it’s amazing so yeah bye! p.s sorry for the Misspelled stuff I did a voice text thing! So, I really love this game, and the way that just not just a dress up your character(s), but also the way that you can make stories for them. I do have some suggestions though So, I really do love the clothing options, however, there are some things that I really wish were there. First, there really aren’t many guy clothes, making it so all the males that I make are not really unique like the girls are. To be fair, girls in real life do tend to have more style options, but it’s just difficult to do. I wouldn’t mind some more for the girls as well though. I think adding in more clothes like gatcha studio, even if they need to be taken apart into different categories, which brings me to the next problem for clothing. It is really annoying how the skirts are put under the belt category, as sometimes I like using a belt and skirt at the same time. There should be a different category for just skirts, and you should add a dress section too. There should also be skirts that can indeed cover a character’s feet. It makes it very hard to make formal outfits without them, and I don’t mean just one long skirt either. Hair is also an issue as there are no hairstyles that are buns, nor a normal curly kind. Many of the characters I make have curly hair, but I can’t bring my stories to life without them.

reviews: Note to all players: you are all complaining about the sound issue, which I caught immediately and it was fixed in a very timely manner. The only other issue is that the touchscreen sensitivity is lacking and the programmers need to increase the sensitivity of the gameplay interface. Other than that, the game is lengthy, colorful and a real hoot to play. So kindly update your reviews! Note to lucygirl: gaming can be subjective but Catalina is a very valued member of the DTE, and as such must weigh in on quality assurance issues. She must look at each game objectively instead! She is my Chief Operating Officer and I understand how she feels. The quality assurance issues have been ongoing and we are tired of problems in every single Domini release! So kindly do not attack a member of MY team, who ensure you the best experience possible. You rarely review, anyway, so your comments mean nothing! Because of our diligent work, DTE, Oleg is adding 200 new staff members next year so that should mean more games. We did what we set out to do. Basically we restored the genre, and once we start getting EIPIX, it will seem like a real genre. So be patient! My true rating is 4.5 stars. I deducted a star for the poor touchscreen sensitivity. I did not play when there was a sound issue anyway. Happy gaming to all!Note to Catalina: please write to me. I’m sorry you’ve been so ill. I really would like to give this game a five star rating, but because of the extremely poor touch sensitivity I am unable to do so.  It was an interesting game otherwise, but having to repeatedly select an area to get a response is extremely annoying and detracts from the overall game experience.

name: ‎Hakuoki: Premium Edition
description: Hakuoki: Premium Edition “Hakuoki”, the otome game that gained popularity not only in Japan but in the whole world, is now available in Englishl! The whole story fully-voiced in Japanese by popular voice actors, and the beautiful illustrations are perfectly ported right from the PSP version! In addition to that, it features a new scenario and new illustrations specifically created for the original app. This version includes all the scenarios, as well as the new one, and gives a better value compared to the Normal Edition. ------------------------------- *If you already bought the Normal Edition of the app, please be aware that save data are not transferable. *Wi-Fi connection environment is required to download this app. [STORY] It is the end of the Edo Era, and the 3rd year of the Bunkyu Era...  The protagonist, Chizuru Yukimura, was raised in Edo and is daughter to a Rangaku scholar. Having lost contact with her father in Kyoto, Chizuru decides to visit him.  There, Chizuru witnesses a Shinsengumi soldier killing a bloodthirsty monster. By strange happenstance, Chizuru finds herself connected to the Shinsengumi, and the assassins desperate to kill them. As time progresses, Chizuru will discover their terrible secret...Furies. Tortured by their own thoughts, the men of the Shinsengumi wield their blades in defense of their faith and ideals, in an era torn apart by chaos. Hidden in the riots that defined the passing of the Edo period, a dark battle within the Shinsengumi begins: A battle that will never be recorded in the pages of history...  [SMARTPHONE VERSION EXCLUSIVE SCENARIO “A Sweet Opinion”] In February 1867, Chizuru is asked to attend a tea party on Kondo’s behalf. She accepts to go accompanied by the Shinsengumi warriors. What’s hidden behind that sudden invitation? What awaits her...? Find out by spending some sweet time with your favorite character! *This scenario is mobile-exclusive! It’s fully voiced (Japanese) and includes six new illustrations. *The scenario is available upon purchase of all main episodes. [CAST] Toshizo Hijikata（CV:Shin-ichiro Miki）/Souji Okita（CV:Showtaro Morikubo）/Hajime Saito（CV:Kohsuke Toriumi）/Heisuke Toudou（CV:Hiroyuki Yoshino）/Sanosuke Harada（CV:Kouji Yusa）/Isami Kondou（CV:Toru Okawa）/Keisuke Sanan（CV:Nobuo Tobita）/Shinpachi Nagakura（CV:Tomohiro Tsuboi）/Kodo Yukimura（CV:Ryugo Saito）/Chikage Kazama（CV:Kenjiro Tsuda）/etc *Japanese Only.
reviews: Played this on a few platforms and the game is great but tried playing on new iPad and there’s no sound.  Haven’t tried with a headset yet and plays all other sounds/music outside this app.  Not compatible maybe? I'm a fan of the $4.99 voltage stories, and I expected something like that when I bought this. However, I didn't enjoy this as much as I would have in the other games. This game is VERY long and focuses on the historical and fighting aspects of the game, with very little on the romance aspect. I've been playing for 3-4 days and just today I got a hint of romance from the character I was playing with. If you like a large and in-depth storyline with romance as a side story, this would be great for you. If you're like me, who plays a lot of voltage games that focus much on the romance aspect (though storyline is an important aspect, just not as much as this game), then DO NOT get this app. It is too much money for a game that could be spent on a similar app for a much lower price. This game is excellently made, with a lot of thought put into it, but it's definitely not intended to be mainly about romance. Ever since I played Hakuoki on my psp, I've been completely ruined. No visual novel, no romance game, no dating sim, no otome, nothing can compete with the absolutely beautiful characters and setting of this game. The story is so deep, the choices feel like REAL choices, and the historical depth is fantastic. Did I mention it actually has a full translation that makes sense - unlike every single other otome that pushes its greasy paunch onto the Apple Store. That being said, it won't be for everyone. If you want the depth, but samurai just don't tickle your fancy (blasphemy) check out Amnesia, also on iPhone.
keywords: Hakuoki: Premium Edition, IDEA FACTORY CO., LTD., Games, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Ice Scream 3
description: The ice-cream seller has come to the neighborhood! He has kidnapped your friend and neighbor Mike and you've witnessed it all…    He has frozen your best friend using some sort of superpower and has taken him somewhere with his van. Your friend is missing, and worse… What if there are more children like him?   This terrifying ice-cream seller's name is Rod, and he seems to be very friendly towards kids; however, he has an evil plan, and you need to find out where is it. All you know is that he takes them into the ice cream van, but you don't know where they go after that.    Your mission will be hiding inside his van and solving the mystery of this evil villain. To do this, you will travel through different scenarios and solve the necessary puzzles to save the frozen child.   What can you do in this game?   - Rod will listen to all your movements, but you can hide and deceive him, so he does not see you. - Move to different scenarios with the van and discover all its secrets. - Solve puzzles to rescue your neighbor from the clutches of this horrific enemy. Action is guaranteed! - Play in ghost, normal and hard mode! Can you complete them all? - Enjoy a horror game without bloody scenarios, suitable for all audiences!   If you want to enjoy an experience of fantasy, horror, and fun, play now "Ice Scream: Horror Neighbor". The action and the shouts are guaranteed.   It is recommended to play with headphones for a better experience.   Each update will bring new content, fixes, and improvements based on your comments.   This game contains ads.   Thanks for playing! =)
reviews: This is a really cool game with a pretty good story. However, I think the player should be able to look around the house more. Every room is locked and I feel it could be a good idea to open it more as hiding spots or something. I was confused as to why the player can go fishing. I did it and then tried to give it to the crocodile but it’s not enough time to get it there and he still tries to attack you. The motorbike gives me MAD anxiety buts it’s really fun maybe just make it easier to drive. Same thing as ice Scream 2, Liz is very annoying. Having to persuade her and Charlie is an interesting choice but goodness it takes forever. Especially if Rod is chasing you so maybe allow J to hide so he can talk to them and be able to get them a little easier. The guy at the information desk at the shopping center is cleaver and funny but I would click the button and the same paragraph would be said even though I already heard the first one. Other than that it was really cool! I like how it sets up the Evil Nun I love these Ice Scream games a lot! I am excited for what the 4th one would be like. I know that in those trailers that we have to destroy Rod’s house so we could stop him once and for all. I think maybe what the 5th one could have maybe where he is back and he still wants to freeze us all. And maybe even has a second scar on his mask, that would be cool. Idea: maybe the 4th or 5th one could have where it’s every single location and we have to hide from Rod and The Evil Nun. And maybe Rod gets a second pet to stop us. And what if Rod makes a robot version of him? Maybe Rod decides to make an army of robots of him... Robo-Rods... Maybe they have glowing red eyes? And maybe where we have to save our friends before he turns them into ice cream.Idea for Episode 4: We get sent to a secret lab location that Rod has to keep us and we need to get out of it and help each friend and try to stop Rod. Maybe Episode 4 is when we burn his house and Episode 5-7 is when he is back and isn’t giving up. What if he kept his ingredients for his ice cream in his truck so he is able to try again. I hope these ideas can get you some ideas of what to do with Episode 4 and maybe even Episode 5. I do not want this game series to end, it’s a masterpiece. This is a really great game!!! I love the story, the plot, the characters, the graphics, everything!!! I know it just came out two months ago, but there’s some glitches I wanted to let you know about! When I would try to move my screen slightly up, it would make my screen look all the way up as well as when I would try to look around it would do the same. Another thing is, when I would try to use the crowbar for the wood in the stall, it wouldn’t work. I don’t know if that’s what you use it for, but if it is then it wasn’t working for me. Now, I’m not mad it’s just that I would like for it not to do that please! There’s also something I kind of was wondering if you could take into consideration too. When Rod is chasing you and you try to run behind something, he already knows to turn around and go where you’re going, which I might sound like I’m just trying to make it easier but, it’s kind of unfair. In real life, he probably wouldn’t do that and yes, I know this is a game but you know what I mean! I’m sorry if I’ve made anyone upset or anything and if I made the creators scoff or laugh at anything that sounded stupid!! Thank you for reading this!!!
keywords: Ice Scream 3, KEPLERIANS SL, Games, Action, Entertainment, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎I Am Innocent
description: I Am Innocent is an original detective game with puzzle elements. Use realistic in-game phone calls, a messenger, computer hacking, photographs, and documents to investigate a series of murders with teenage victims. The game’s many characters, with their complex personalities and skeletons in the closet, plus its ethical dilemmas and emotional scenes create a realistic atmosphere and weave an involved, mysterious story that’ll keep you engrossed to the very end. Main features: - Investigate a complicated serial killer case. - Realistic phone calls, photos, documents, and computer hacking. - Communicate easily without needing to deal with huge paragraphs of text. - Your answers affect your relationships with the characters. - Multiple ending options, depending on your choices and your relationships. - Many days of gameplay. This game is completely free but might include some optional in-app purchases that make it easier to finish.
reviews: I love the idea of this game and how realistic it is. And it’s really exciting when you get a call. My dad had previously downloaded it so I wanted to try it myself. Like I said I LOVE playing this app, but I have to give it 3 stars. ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️ I know it’s not just my issue, every review I saw said the same thing, the puzzle. Now I get why they put it there, but why the same one, over and over again? I really hope the developers see this and plz try to change it. Not for me but for all the people that will download this app and for those who have and will delete it if it’s not changed. Once again great app but this really needs to be changed.Update- Ok so I spent a whole day trying to get all the stars I needed. I got them all and was very excited. I got to send TWO texts and now I have to get 12 more stars. I’d much rather have like an hour wait so people don’t just speed through the game, instead of the puzzle games. I’m getting a feeling the developers don’t care to change any of it, I’m not trying to be rude but this is getting very annoying. I’m not sure I can take it anymore. I’m only keeping it cause I really want to see the end but I’m not sure I’ll keep it anymore. Plz plz plz fix this I’m not sure how to feel about this app. I’ll start off by saying it’s truly a creative, interesting, unique and overall great concept. I’ve never come across anything like it. The developers did a great job with coming up with MOST of this game. But like everyone else, I’m OVER the block/Tetris type game. Some other reviews said it forces you to spend money Bec sometimes it doesn’t even give you enough of the right color blocks you need to pass a level...that may be true, but it also may be completely random every time you start a level. Either way, it’s annoying. You have to spend so much time trying to pass these puzzles that I end up forgetting where the story line last left off. I would have given 5 stars, but it lost 1 due to these annoying block games and how many you have to pass in order to continue, and it also lost 1 Bec it seems EVERYONE has the same complaint and it’s like the developers haven’t done anything about it. They could easily make the recharge time faster, or the coins replenish more often. Or even figure a way to get free coins by watching an ad or something. But then again maybe everyone was right....that they know people will get so frustrated that they end up spending their money. Kinda shady imo. It’s annoying Bec it can really be an amazing, one-of-a-kind game. But these block levels take away from the creativity. The mystery part is good but you can’t progress without solving a puzzle game similar to Tetris.  The problem with the puzzle game is that it seemingly gives shapes at random.  There are games that no matter how well you play it, it is impossible to win because the shapes or colors you need don’t appear.  It’s possible to create a game that gets progressively difficult without having it be literally impossible at times.  They need to work on that.  Also a little variation between puzzle games would be nice.  Overall it is fun though.Update:  I have now been playing this game so long (seems like about a year) that I have forgotten what the plot is even about.  I’ve forgotten who each of the characters are or what relationship they are to me because all I have been doing is the same puzzles over and over.  Maybe every month or two I will get a nugget of information, but then after continuing to play the puzzles for another month or so I don’t even recall what the nugget was about.  This isn’t really a mystery you need to solve so much as it is a puzzle game that stays the same from the start with the exception of the puzzles becoming more complex.  I’m lowering my rating to 2 stars just because they should throw me a bone every now and then.  I would like to see anyone who has finished this game in a reasonable amount of time.
keywords: I Am Innocent, Guts United, Games, Puzzle, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Idola Phantasy Star Saga
description: The classic RPG series, Phantasy Star finally comes to mobile! Experience thrilling turn-based battles with two-party mode, world-class artwork, an unforgettable musical score, and an epic fantasy through a fully-voiced story campaign. Save the land of Vandor from the threat of Dark Falz. ※ GAME FEATURES CLASSIC BATTLE SYSTEM Return to the series roots through a command style system of battle. Release your ultimate skill, Elemental Blast to defeat your enemies by consuming elemental values. TWO-PARTY MODE You can deploy and switch between two party modes, Law and Chaos during battles. Switching parties unleashes an all-out attack called Reverse Rush, so take your chances and change the tides of battle!  FATE DIVERGENCE Face each characters’ fate, and choose the ultimate upgrade for each, changing the conclusion to a character’s story! Not only will it change the characters’ appearance, but also their skills and Elemental Blast as well. IDOLA BATTLES Join forces with friends and other players to defeat the IDOLA. You can also become an amazing IDOLA yourself and battle other adventurers! There are various kinds of IDOLA available within the game. PVP ARENA Two teams enter – only one leaves. Battle with other adventurers’ teams to become the ACE of the Arena! PLEASE NOTE: - This game is free to play. - Items are available for purchase within the game. - A network connection is required to play.  Feel free to contact us on Discord and Facebook. Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/IdolaEN Discord: https://discord.gg/Ku7rDxH
reviews: *overall great game,  combat is amazing, and a strategic masterpiece as well as questing/ Idola battles/ arena/ and continuous events are all well done. I just feel like the UI needs some tweaking but little things like the things below would make our lives easier and a much more pleasant experience*Equipped items should have a icon of the user on the bottom right corner of the item“Inventory” should not have to take like 3 buttons to reach it same goes for “party set up”.. we want to be able to across them quicker Optimization.. every button I press has practically almost like a loading it’s stressful when you accidentally press the wrong button or when you want to do something quickly but you have to deal with going through several button presses to get to your destination Total “Combat Power”.. when I auto set up the game knows which characters are stronger than others I ask myself what’s the difference of power from specific heroes.. Showcasing stats with equipped weapons  base stats are useless, let’s see how much stronger they are with their equipped symbols and weapons Destiny Divergence, before reaching destiny divergence we should be able to see their skills from Law and Chaos so that we can pre plan our new set up team, I have to go back forth to try to see their skills comparing it to other heroes to figure out if they would be better of at Law or Chaos In a vacuum this is a decent enough game to occupy some time. Compared to other options -is quite confusing what they’re reaching for here. To start it seems as if they’ve put more work into making it impossible to reroll than into any other aspect of the game. Beyond that there’s no redeeming qualities that I’ve been able to find. Story is yawn-worthy, graphics/char movements are jerky & dated to put nicely, progress system is relitively uncomplicated which is nice, but the split banners which include gear, weapons & characters often results in never getting what you hoped for nor anything even close. Have done upwards of a thousand summons so far and through multiple accounts only once got a 5* unit the remainder being identical low tier units over and over. Like I said, in a vacuum it’s a decent enough game, but there’s no apparent draw to this game over blindly choosing from a long list of others within the same genre. All and all I guess I would recommend just b/c it’s something new, but after my experience with the summoning system I see absolutely no way to avoid the inevitable buyers remorse from spending real money in this game. I think if the devs chose to improve even one aspect of this game it would easily be 3-4*’s. Perhaps a selector ticket or removing the reroll restrictions. The battle system in particular reminds me a lot of the battle system used in the Genesis Phantasy Star games, and I’m all for it. Needless to say, the gacha elements do sour it a bit and outside of actual battle, there isn’t a whole lot going for it. I like the concept of switching between two different parties, it really helps spice up the battle system, but at the same time the very small amount of skills that each unit has really takes away from the complexity. If anything, this is both a step forward and backward for Phantasy Star, I’d love to see this battle system improved on for a single player title because I feel that the fact that it’s a free to play mobile game really takes a lot away from what this game can be. All in all though, this is a very enjoyable game if you’re a Phantasy Star fan. Requires iOS 9.0 or later. name: ‎I Am President!
description: == I Am President == Decide the fate of your people by swiping with your Almighty (and Totally Not Small) Fingers to make Super Important Decisions! "You are the commander-in-chief of the world's greatest country, and your people need you to keep things that way! Appease your citizens by passing resolutions that maintain the powers of state, combat internet trolls and fend off alien invaders of the extraterrestrial kind! Do you have what it takes to lead the nation to greatness, or will you run the country to the ground?" == Features == - Over 150 funny, satirical scenarios based from current events and pop culture - Includes 15 unique characters to interact with, 6 special events and 12 possible endings - No complex controls. Simple A or B decision done by either swiping left or right - Simple gameplay, no tutorial needed - Choose your own adventure style with every decision will affect your ending - Highly replayable I Am President will test your wits to see if you are fit to become a leader of the country. How long can you stay in power before you are overthrown by the people. Even if the people love you, can you avoid some “accidents” that will cut short your presidency reign? Have any Trump stories or scenarios yourself?  Submit them to the Facebook page where yours could appear IN THE GAME: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IAmPresidentGame/
reviews: I got this game because I saw a YouTuber play this game, and it looked like a lot of fun, having a similar mechanic to a game called Reigns, which is my personal favorite game of all time. When I got the game at first it seemed pretty cool, but after only a few minutes dialogue started repeating, and then after about 20 minutes I had already done literally everything you can do in the game. This game completely lacks of content. It feels like it should be free, not 2 dollars. And all this wouldn’t be so bad if their was actually any challenge. While Reigns has a perfect amount of challenge, and it becomes quite hard at times to balance all four bars, in I am President it is always obvious exactly what you need to do at any given time. Even if you start a zombie apocalypse, there still isn’t any challenge whatsoever. If the developers would add more content and make it harder to balance all four bars, then I would increase the rating.
keywords: I Am President!, FredBear Games LTD, Games, Adventure, Entertainment, Card, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Jelly Jellies
description: Once a very long time ago, the ocean was very clear, so clear that if you were flying over it in an airplane, you could see to the very bottom of it. The jellyfish that lived in that clear water were jealous, because they were barely visible, unlike the colorful sea creatures. This made the Jellyfish King devise an evil plan to pollute the water with different color jelly to paint the ocean, which would make the jellyfish unique in their environment. Each type of jellyfish began to use a different color, and the ocean became polluted with purple, green, red, orange, pink and yellow jellies. The Game features 3 Distinct modes: - Single player campaign - Competitive Multiplayer - Your own 3D Environment called Jellyfish Sanctuary, which unlocks an entire new way to play Jelly Jellies  The single player mode focuses on a narrative, which unfolds with each passing level. The player is the hero, who needs to help get the ocean back to its original clear blue state, by ridding the ocean of polluted jellies, caused by the jelly jellyfish and their king.  These levels will be presented on a colorful and adventurous map, which with each passing chapter in the story changes in atmosphere. Players have the ability to compare their score with their Facebook friends via use of leaderboards. They can also request certain items like oxygen from their friends. Claim daily rewards when connected to Facebook Unlock secret levels! Defeat Bosses Beat your friends in the Multiplayer mode and increase your win rate and unlock special rewards. & Take care of your pet jellyfish in your own customized 3D environment We hope we can bring you along on our journey! :D
reviews: Since I started playing this game, I have started walking the beach with a basket and cleaning up the beach during my walk back which I place in recycling bins. I noticed also I bought a wetsuit to start snorkeling and cleaning under water. The game has truly engaged me in realizing that our oceans are being polluted by ourselves. I am looking now for ways to start reducing my plastic waste. This is must game for everyone to open up our eyes and while I play it while queueing and waiting I get reminded to try to minimize my plastic imprint. And it is super fun to be able to create my own underwater scenery. I rate this game a full five! This match 3 game is more original than most. There are many ways to play the game and different tasks to complete on a daily basis. There is even cross-platform multiplayer😝 The game will keep you entertained for many hours of gameplay!Hope to see more levels coming soon!!!! A very well designed game with lots of fun, new features! Colors are very pretty and bright and the characters are well designed. Game play itself is fun and highly addictive! The jellyfish sanctuary feature is also very fun, especially to play with friends! Highly recommend 🎉🎉😄
keywords: Jelly Jellies, Primal Studios, Games, Puzzle, Adventure, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes
