Dear player, thanks in advance, your purchases are very helpful and support further development! You might even find your waifu. It's not like i like you or anything. Baka!
reviews: I’ve went through tons of games like this just merge and click usually pretty boring very slow play to win type stuff. I was honestly very surprised at how this game was I’ve gotten all girls that have came out in under a week without spending any money and the ads don’t seem like a big problem in this game. There are some random glitches and stuff that happens like if you prestige and buy a new area before you upgraded the one your in to be able to buy the girls there (which I did in prestige 3 and 4) it makes you go back and merge them still but the very first one unlocks all of them after you buy another area and get it to the max girl for it. I really love the animations for the game and the relations bar is an amazing was of showing that it’s not actually just another cash grab like 90% of the games on the App Store. It’s a very fun game in my opinion and for anyone reading I highly suggest you actually check it out !! (Looking forwards to the area after the army base too!) I saw this game and I thought why not, it would be good to pass my time. So, I started playing it. The upgrades and stuff are cool I guess, and it’s sort of rewarding to see the new characters you get. But like I’m undownloading it because of this. The noises! Like wth!? I get it, it’s probably why horny dudes stay on the game, for the hot anime moans. But some people are just trying to play a wholesome time-passing game! I know you can just turn your volume down, but like I shouldn’t have to do that on a game just so it doesn’t sound like I’m listening to hentai. I’m a girl that really isn’t attracted to these things, so when I heard it, it just made me kinda uncomfortable. I think at the beginning of the game you should really have an option to keep music and noises or just keep music. The main reason though, I downloaded this is because I’m a manga artist so sometimes I like looking into different anime styles for inspiration, not these noises. Like have a little class, please! Sorry for being so harsh, and I’m not trying to be like super Christian and take the appeal out of your game, it’s just if you are going to advertise it as a cute, fun, wholesome clicker game, don’t make it hentai when it downloads. Thank you for your time. Thanks for feedback with detailed reasons. In next update i will decrease volume of noises and increase delay between them. I hope it will make game comfortable.I think it's not comfortable to ask about sfx at beginning of the game but later sfx can be turned off in Map->Settings  I can’t wait for more characters. The only issue is the translation errors. Swimsuit Chan - “I got this swimsuit only at the beginning of the year but it is already tight for chest.”This sounds off, a way to fix it would be to put “I got this swimsuit earlier this year but it’s already too tight for my chest.”Some are missing “my” such as nerd Chan. “My experiment” it also could be improved by saying “I need your juices for my experiments.” Instead. Bunny Chan also has a very bothersome error “spunk” spank would be what you want to put. “Stop staring at me or I will spank you”(Other ones)Surprise- “When you don’t know if it’s a boy or a girl.”Gothic- “I like the color black”Neko Chan also has an odd one.Kitsune- “I didn’t tell you to scratch my ears. . . But I’m not telling you to stop”Ghost- you could remove the “like a child” part because it doesn’t fit.Agent- just put homework, not a homework.Biker- “my bike”English is a complicated language and it’s difficult, I hope I helped!!! :)
keywords: Kawaii Evolution Clicker, Vsevolod Martynenko, Games, Adventure, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Lamplight City
description: A steampunk-ish detective adventure from the creator of A Golden Wake and Shardlight! Can private investigator Miles Fordham find justice for his clients and track down his partner's killer before his entire world comes apart? • "I fostered a lifelong love for the adventure genre, culminating in a Purple Tentacle tattoo (Day of the Tentacle, duh) on my upper left arm. So I’ll be playing Lamplight City, too. Trust." - Rock, Paper, Shotgun • "Overall, this game has a lot going for it, and I encourage you to check it out even if you’re not an adventure game buff." - Hey Poor Player ABOUT THE GAME The Gateway to Vespuccia, the City of Air and Light, Lamplight City - the thriving port city of New Bretagne is a beacon of progress and industrial advancement in the New World. Yet beneath the promises of a shining 19th-century future, the city rests upon foundations of poverty, class struggle, and crime. For police detective turned private investigator Miles Fordham, Lamplight City's shadowy corners are just part of the territory. But with his former partner constantly speaking to him from beyond the grave, his grip on sanity is slowly loosening. Can Miles find justice for his clients and track down his partner's killer before his entire world comes apart? Lamplight City is a detective adventure set in an alternate steampunk-ish "Victorian" past. FEATURES • Be the detective you want to be. But prepare to face the consequences. Investigate crime scenes, interrogate suspects, get information by any means necessary. Follow the law or make your own rules, but how you choose to act will affect people's attitudes towards you. • Five cases to solve, with multiple suspects, false leads, and different outcomes. Never find yourself stuck in a dead-end situation. If the case becomes unsolvable, simply move on to the next one. The story will adapt based on your choices. • Single click interface with no inventory. Gather clues and documents in your casebook for review. Item manipulation is handled via a context-sensitive cursor. • A fictional city with four boroughs to explore, each with their own unique flavor. Players will visit each of these boroughs throughout the game, exploring themes such as class divide and the public's fear of emerging steam tech. • Inspired by the works of Edgar Allan Poe and Charles Dickens. • Meet over 50 professionally voiced characters. • Original score by Mark Benis.
keywords: Lamplight City, Application Systems Heidelberg Software GmbH, Games, Role Playing, Adventure, mac apps, app store, appstore, applications, itunes

Follow us to get news and updates; facebook.com/JESoftware Have fun playing this first-person shooter war game!
reviews: I enjoyed the game so far but ran into a few problems the biggest being that when you hit the buy crates button too fast the game takes your crystals but only registers the first crate I went to by 5 crates of the 15 crystal variety and lost 85 because I thought they would go to the crate thing(not sure what to call it) and they weren’t there so, please fix this. Secondly I was annoyed that the reload button was hard to find so you should add a small reload button somewhere on the screen or put an arrow with a caption in the tutorial the show new players where the reload button is. Finally I think the armory’s design looks a little cash grabbish but, it is well rounded though because after a few days I was up to 134 crystals so I’m fine with that setup and I’m just fine grinding on a game especially one I enjoy. I hope you consider the suggestion and please fix that glitch!✌️ It has absolutely everything you could possibly want or need. Yes, there are a few small issues but they always fix them immediately. You play this game without having to spend any money what so ever. And to help it to be more exciting and fun, there are hidden surprises through out the game and unless your really willing to look for them, you will most likely never even notice that they are their free for the finding. I’ve spent literally hours and days playing and enjoying constantly playing different since over and over again while waiting at the doctors office or visiting and sitting with friends and family while at the hospital. Has an enormous amount of potential. After playing the first Last Hope so much this was a pleasant upgrade to that in so many ways and it’s a good game to pass the time with and you don't have to worry about going through the game to fast and don’t need money to progress unless your just impatient and want to upgrade quicker. Over all I’m glad I download it and still been playing due to the replay value of different background level that comes up when you replay again and again.

reviews: By far the best idle game I’ve played. By being able to buy properties that I actually recognize and know adds a whole extra layer of depth to the game, and it’s also interesting to see what other players own shares in which properties, which I’m sure will really add even more market elements once more players join and there’s no more shares available in certain businesses. Even though it’s GPS based, you have an agent you can send to wherever you want, and then s/he can give you access to places that are beyond your reach. I think the main thing I want to see improved in the game is the friend system, it can be a little hard to understand. I can refer someone but I can’t figure out how to add friends who already have accounts. One big thing that needs to be changed, is that there needs to be a way to see how much certain perks will increase things. For example, I can upgrade my tycoon perk, but I don’t know how many properties that’s going to bring me up to, all it tells me is the level of the perk. If I could see what stats I had from perks and what I would gain from leveling it up then I’d be a lot less hesitant of buying them. I love idle games and seen this one nd wasn’t sure if it was an idle game. When you open it for the first time it tells you , you have to use GPS to play. So I said yes and when it changed screens the game started on my neighborhood.... WHATTTTTY!!! That’s amazing. As I’m playing I seen my doctors office was for sale (my rl doctors office ) that’s crazy. This game is so fun. I didn’t give it 5 stars for 1 reason. I felt the tutorial was way to short. You log in, it tells you to buy your first property and it then tells you to use a coin to speed up the buying process so you can start collecting rent. Then it moves onto setting up your character. That was it. I then felt a bit lost. So that would honestly be my only issue. I did just start to play 20 mins ago. Even though there isn’t a long tutorial you can figure it out with time. Cash helps you to buy the properties I’m sure what else its used for😐but again I just started . Coins are used to speed up the buying process and you can also use them to buy more cash. You can also purchase coins if you want. You earn rent when away but I don’t know for how long yet. I was just away for about 30 mins and there was rent when I came back. Another thing you can do is move your agent. With that I think it’s cool because I can really buy property anywhere, your not just stuck in your neighborhood... all in all this is a great game 😊😍 Overall a great little idle game and truly a micro transaction game that doesn’t murder you with ads and it’s micro transactions don’t exceed $1.99. I find that rare in this genre of games so that was a real gem. On top of that there isn’t days of down time forcing you to spend cash at the onset of play or wait days to buy a second property as with similar games.I started playing and within an hour had my wife hooked and now she is addicted as well. We both bought the 1.99 assistant which increases the standard 4 hour afk to a 12 hour afk for sleeping and that is all we have sunk into this and we are still having a blast. We have come across no forced ads in all the time playing and there is only an optional ad when you first log in to double your earnings from while you were gone, an obvious choice to click in my opinion. Lasting the in game “purchase able” currency can be found daily lying in briefcases around your home or neighborhood, and you earn some with each level up.Overall 10/10 recommending this to my friends. reviews: Okay, so I downloaded this game because its picture looked really cool and HD and everything but this game needs an update. My main issue is the glitchy controls make it really hard to escape from granny. My second issue is that thing where granny stands above you and like screams or whatever and stands on top of you kill you. This is only annoying because you have to watch this every time you die (which for me is a lot) and it’s not like you can skip it or anything. I thing the design of the house is cool some things look a little fake but that does not really matter to me really. The main thing that needs to be fixed are the glitchy controls. If you guys could just fix that I will change my rating 5 stars because of the glitchy controls you fixed, and good service by listening to the reviews. So based on this I hope you fix the game Graphics aren’t that great. The grandma would get frozen spinning around forever... ummm in one room I got put in some blue room with a sky for no apparent reason and was stuck... then level 5 began and I was on top of buildings and couldn’t go no where, I was stuck again in blue room with sky!!! Like idk what’s up with this game...

name: ‎Magic Grounds
description: Masterarbeit von Martin Haferanke  Studiengang: Digitale Medien Technische Hochschule Brandenburg Dieses Platformer Jump n' Run 2.5D Spiel, wurde im Rahmen der Masterarbeit mit dem Namen:  iOS 8 Game Development - Konzeption, Design und Implementierung eines 2.5D Computerspiels mit Objective-C und Swift entwickelt. (Für weitere Informationen zur Masterarbeit kontaktieren Sie gerne den Ersteller) Geschichte:  "Auf einem fremden Planeten, wo Zauber und Magie die Einwohner beeinflussen, lebt ein Geister Magier. Man weiß nicht viel über diesen Magier, nur das er die meiste Zeit in seinem Haus am Ende des Magie-Berges verbringt. Eines Tages wird der Krieger, von einem seltsamen Geräusch aus seinen Träumen gerissen. Neugierig zu erfahren wo dieses Geräusch herkommt, verlässt er sein Haus und macht sich auf den Weg, dem nachzugehen. Nach einer riskanten Suche findet der Held den Ursprung des Krachs. Es stammt von einem Steinmonster, das schnarchend die gesamte Umgebung behelligte. Dem zum trotz, stellt sich der Held dem Monster und versucht es mit allen Mitteln zu besiegen. Wird der Held das Monster besiegen und sich wieder in sein Haus zurück ziehen können, oder schlägt das Monster den Helden in die ewigen Jagdgründe? Das liegt in den Händen des Spielers." Funktionen: - Steuerung des Geister Magiers (Siehe Steuerung) - Jump n' Run Fähigkeiten - Rätsel mit der Umgebung - Finaler Bosskampf  Wir wünschen allen Nutzern viel Spaß mit der App und freuen uns auf euer Feedback!

name: ‎Nancy Drew - The Silent Spy
description: Nearly a decade ago Agent Kate Drew left home to neutralize a biochemical weapon in Scotland. While her assignment was a success, Kate died in a car accident. Or so we were told. Now the echoes of a similar plot reverberate and it's up to you, as detective Nancy Drew, to thwart the sleeper cell and expose the truth about your mother's tragic demise.
reviews: I like talking to people and exploring new places in these games.. the graphics are great! But the puzzles were way too complicated and generally stressed me out (and I was playing the Amatuer level)! I ended up cheating through the entire 2nd half of the game by Googling step-by-step walkthroughs. Often the Hints (the ones in the game) were handy but not enough — those only helped guide you where to go next. However, as I write this I am ready to check out the Egyptian-themed Nancy Drew one… fun! Fairly enjoyable but falls short when compared to similar games I have played in the past.  Worth buying if you like puzzles, but exploring is limited.  Artwork and music is pleasant.  Puzzles that required figuring out and memorizing multiple steps in a limited time seemed unnecessarily difficult so glad there was a walkthrough available. Non timed puzzles were interesting and challenging. I played ND games when I was younger (I'm now 25) and they're still just as fun and addicting. I really enjoyed the different gadgets in this game and the exposure to a different culture! Some of the puzzles in the master sleuth option were a bit difficult and I had to look up some tips online to get myself further along, but other than that great job designing & coming up with an engaging story line.
keywords: Nancy Drew - The Silent Spy, Her Interactive, Games, Puzzle, Adventure, Entertainment, mac apps, app store, appstore, applications, itunes

name: ‎N.O.V.A. 3: Freedom Edition - Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance game
description: The most immersive and impressive sci-fi FPS franchise on smartphones is now completely free! Fight for humankind's survival! Four months after Kal Wardin defeated the Volterites, President Folsom is assassinated and the beleaguered colonies surrender to the Volterite Protectorate. Since then, Kal has been lying low, but a desperate plea from Yelena calls him back to save Earth and humankind… • An epic storyline: Humanity finally returns to Earth after years of exile! Fight in 10 immersive levels across the galaxy, from a war-torn Earth to a frozen Volterite city. • Multiple weapons and powers: Run, shoot, drive vehicles, and pilot a mech to defeat hordes of enemies. • Join 12-player battles in 7 multiplayer modes (Capture the Point, Free-for-All, Capture the Flag, etc.) on 7 different maps. • Use Voice Chat to communicate with your friends in real time! (Voice Chat available only on iPad 2, iPhone 4s or later models.)  • For the first time, multiple allies can jump inside the same vehicle and spread destruction on the battlefield. _____________________________________________ Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com. reviews: Honestly, I love the N.O.V.A. series. They're great games that you don't need to lug around a huge PC or console to play. They usually have a great multiplayer community, and this game is no exception. The combat is great, the level system is great, and everything about the gameplay is just all around great. However, I do think there a few problems I have found that I feel should be addressed. First of all, the multiplayer currency. It takes a really long time to get any when you are new to this game. Of course, as you get better and better it gets easier, but I still found it hard to get any when I had just started. On a similar note, when you press the plus button by the currency meter, it prompts you to watch videos. I wouldn't even mention this if it worked properly, but it doesn't. Most of the time it says that the videos are "unavailable at this time" and that I should try again later. You can see how this would be frustrating. Another problem I found is that sometimes I will start a server and my friend can't find it, even though he is using an apple device like me and I have started the game. Granted, it doesn't happen all the time, but it can be quite irritating. Most of these problems aren't huge though, and I strongly suggest that you download this game. You will probably like it for the same reasons I did. I really enjoy this game, in fact it’s the only first person shooter game I have found that I actually really REALLY like. The best part is the multiplayer part of the game, where you can battle other people. The longer you play the better your guy gets, and you can get stuff with the “game” coins like guns and even a jet pack. The jet pack is dope because it opens up a whole new world to you, as you can finally go to new heights. You can even roam around in the glitches, if your slick. However, I had to rate this game 1 star because I can no longer play it. I finally upgraded my old iPhone 5s to a 6s and apparently this game can’t run with IOS 11. I’m so bummed. Now I have to play this game called MC5, it’s the only first person shooter game, with multiplayer, I’ve found. Yet, I don't spend hours playing it like I would  with nova 3. Also, I wish Nova 3s  microphone idea worked better, I like the concept of being able to hear each other as you play. Mostly, you just hear nothing or muffled sounds. Also, some games have a chat room, which would be cool but I can live with out it. Anyways, I vote please make this IOS 11 compatible and I’ll give it 5 stars all day long. Thanks ✌️
keywords: N.O.V.A. 3: Freedom Edition - Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance game, Gameloft, Games, Action, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

Fight in 10 immersive levels across the galaxy, from a war-torn Earth to a frozen Volterite city. • Multiple weapons and powers: Run, shoot, drive vehicles, and pilot a mech to defeat hordes of enemies. • Join 12-player battles in 7 multiplayer modes (Capture the Point, Free-for-All, Capture the Flag, etc.) on 7 different maps. • Use Voice Chat to communicate with your friends in real time! • For the first time, multiple allies can jump inside the same vehicle and spread destruction on the battlefield. • Discover the new FPS benchmark for graphics and gameplay on iOS. _____________________________________________ Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central Don't forget to follow us on social media: Facebook: http://gmlft.co/SNS_FB_EN Twitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_EN Instagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IG YouTube: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_YT This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site. reviews: I love this game I have been with the franchise since NOVA 2 and I love it. The campaign is awesome fast paced, lots of action, and very hard. Now to the multiplayer. The multiplayer is definitely my favorite part of this game. It is especially good considering its on IOS. I am finally a level 100 with a jet pack, rocket launcher and lightning gun after months of playing. Now I couldn't find much things two be negative about but here are the two biggest things I could think of: 1. In the multiplayer there are more hackers than I can count! Game loft you really need to crack down on the hackers and ban them. It's so annoying when I join for example a free for all and there's a hacker running around with unlimited invincibility and unlimited jet pack ruining everyone's fun!2. The other thing is the glitch where people use makes to I guess you could put it "fall out of the world" it's so annoying because they will just stand there sniping you and unfortunately you can't shoot them. I have only ever seen this done on badlands and lost world but unfortunately these are my two favorite maps! :( Gameloft this is a glitch that needs to be fixed! IMPORTANT EDIT: for those who are complaining about online multiplayer not working, it works perfectly fine for me, and I see others online as of 2019. However, multiplayer only works if you have an old Gameloft LIVE! account. Your account needs to have been created before October 10th 2018, or you won’t be able to connect to multiplayer. My online account was made in 2016, so I don’t have any issues. Unfortunately, new online accounts don’t seem to be supported, and I don’t think Gameloft is working on fixing this. Sorry guys :/I was pretty devastated when I found out in mid-2017 that the game wouldn’t support iOS 11. I held on to iOS 10 for a long time, but my phone eventually auto-updated, and I lost the game.One year later, and they finally decided to show N.O.V.A 3 some love. I’m super glad to be back, even though the multiplayer is pretty dead. Anything is better than the disgrace of a game called N.O.V.A Legacy, though. While you’re at it, could you guys please consider bringing back N.O.V.A 1 (the original 2009 game) and N.O.V.A 2?Edit: for those who are complaining about multiplayer not working, it works perfectly fine for me, and I see others online. However, multiplayer only works if you have an old Gameloft LIVE! account (one created before October 10th, 2018). My online account was made in 2016, so I don’t have issues. New online accounts don’t seem to be supported, sorry guys :/ This is a great app with a Halo feel to it. The campaign mode is nothing to talk about (although a lot of effort was put into it). The characters are hard to relate to and the protagonist is a bit of a jerk. He always seems to be complaining about every situation he ends up in. Yeah, I get that he's supposed to be rough and tough, but he has no heart. Also the narrative was boring and the dialogue sequences seemed to go on forever. Aside from the ok campaign, the multiplayer almost makes up for it. It's very exciting, yet the maps seem to have a similar design (except for the close quarters maps). And with only 10 weapons and no customization, gunplay can become a little repetitive; however vehicle warfare makes up for this niggle. Upgrades are a bit more expensive than I would like in a purchased game. Jet Pack usage should be accessible to new players or else it becomes an overwhelmingly unfair advantage. Too much grinding without in-app purchases must be done to obtain this Jetpack and even when finally purchased, it's not fun to play with knowing it's too easy to abuse.

name: ‎Ocean Wars
description: In a world of archipelagos, deep waters and unknown mysteries, you assume the role of an ambitious admiral. Settle in your island, develop, rise and wander through the seas. Establish powerful alliances with other admirals, expand your territory and clash against sea creatures, greedy pirates or even rivals who don't quite agree on your plans! Ocean Wars is a massively online RTS game gathering players from all over the world, where you will need to develop your island to collect its resources, build powerful fleets and sail across vast uncharted territories.  Features: - A massively multiplayer universe where you can unite or fight with players from all over the world. - Join alliances, make friends and conquer the seas! - Choose your tactic and formations: perform cross defenses, coordinated attacks… - Your strategy and charisma will determine the future of your territories! - Explore a vast world and discover its secrets, its endless resources and defeat fearsome creatures of the depths. reviews: I was really surprised as to how much I actually enjoy this game. After giving up on other games like it, I was sure I would not stick with this game either but I was wrong, there is a lot to do on this game to keep it fresh and fun. Hope the developers to try to change it to much it is almost perfect the way it is. Brewmaster T It has a bad bug mentioned in reviews. It happens on iPad and iPhone where the screen bounces up and you are forced to kill the app and restart it. The UI Is too busy. Just too much stuff going on stuffed  into an awkward portrait mode.  I'm still playing at level 9 But it's hard to find a good team. As a noobie it dumps you into a team of other level 1-4s so no protection. A level 12+ comes in and kills every team members fleet, then stays there and does it every day. So then this guy leaves, another guy does it. How can I build a fleet at this rate. How do I move my darn ship away from it for free? You get one free Migration, then it is like 5.00 just to migrate your island. One thing I like is the tip system to keep new people on track and you get food and stuff each time you complete the tips activity. I want to give it 4 but bit at this time. Similar games::I like War Dragons. It's also a buggy and confusing "slow builder" too. But the attack phase is the coolest. And the tutorial guides you through the first levels. I give this a biased 4.2 star.PEOPLE:  Don't trust 5 star and 1 star reviews. Those people aren't good judges. Many sat its  a great 5 star game then they say BUT this, that,  and the other. I have turned in complaints. I turned in a complaint that the leader of the bigger alliance stated he had his members constantly attacking because we were not Muslim or Turkish people. They shrug off the racism and said it was part of the game. We have enough racism going on to promote it in a game. To be told you are not allowed in a kingdom because of the country you live in and your religion is a racist act. To not be able to play a game because of constant against is even worse. The game developers should listen to our complaints. They never do never apologize and never try to fix the problem. I have put a lot of money in the game and now it is gone because of glitches and racism :( At least let us move out Capitol to another kingdom is we have to deal with racism in one. Admit and fix the issues.

reviews: I too had problems with owl game. Then I deleted and reinstalled.  Seemed to fix the problem.  I had bigger Issues with figuring out how to use some items since there seemed to be no logical association to their actual placement.  The characters often did stupid things for no good reason.  The game often slowed way down when switching scenes.  All in all, definitely not the best I've played and don't recommend buying. I do enjoy this game but cannot get past the owl mini game.  I've been using the guide, just to make sure I haven't missed anything getting to that point.  What happens for me is, when I put the note pieces together I do not receive the directions sheet. What happens is, I'm supposed to select the note and it's supposed to turn over and have directions on the back, I think.  Instead, what I get is the map, which I don't need until after completing the owl mini game, and that's when I should receive the map so I can use the hang glider and map to move on through the game.  During the owl mini game, the guide shows that the various objects (tower, etc) will glow when you have the viewer placed correctly. Using the exact instructions in the guide to move along with the viewer, nothing ever glows, and nothing is clickable.  Please fix this and send out an update!  You will have a lot more happy gamers! I saw all the 1 star reviews & wanted to give a more positive review because from my experience, this is not a one star game. I purchased the full game and have played it through until the end, including the bonus game. I found no glitches and no problems playing the "owl game". I'm happy to support games that are about "real people" &/or realistic situations because they are so few and far between. I'm so sick & tired of the monsters & supernatural games that are everywhere. I find them childish & have a hard time playing something that's so implausible.

name: ‎Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath
description: ** NOTE: Requires at least an iPhone 4S, iPad 2, iPad Mini or iPod Touch 5th gen. Runs at variable resolution based on device capabilities. Performance settings available in app. 148apps Editor's Choice 4.5/5 Stars "iOS gamers are getting a great adventure game" TouchArcade 5/5 Stars "every bit as awesome now on a mobile device" "A stunning and exquisitely realized masterpiece that delivers a gaming experience unlike any that we've seen before" - Game Informer "A wild, beautiful and exceptional action experience" - IGN Prepare to immerse yourself in 20 + hours of action-adventure. In the dusty, undeveloped wastelands of Western Mudos, cantankerous townsfolk find their settlements besieged by belligerent outlaws. Along comes Stranger, a drifter turned bounty hunter, with a unique double-barreled critter-firing crossbow. Stranger’s Wrath has been passionately upgraded for this all-new release with all exciting new controls that make the most of the mobile format and improved visuals throughout. Features: * Fully configurable touch-screen controls let you move & re-size individual buttons to suit your play style * Scalable virtual joystick for fine tuning sensitivity of movement  * Explore living towns, lush forests, and massive industrial facilities * Seamlessly transition between first-person shooter and third-person platfomer * Scour your surroundings for live ammo * Work with a range of strategies to surprise, stun, lure, blast and bag devious outlaws * Meet incredibly odd, funny and smack-talking townsfolk, enemies and natives * Fight dozens of varied bosses with outlandish arsenals and outrageous names  Plus: * Native iOS gamepad support * Intuitive touch controls + a redesigned mobile interface make playing & navigating a breeze   * Incredible visuals that harness all the advanced graphics capabilities of today's mobile chipsets * A hilarious script, theatrical soundtrack and compelling storyline with a shocking twist * English, German, Russian, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Finish, Swedish, and Polish language support * Leaderboards, Achievements and Cloud Save
reviews: The game runs perfectly fine, it has only crashed once and the animation and everything else looks fine, the sound works a few minutes ,but over time for some reason the sound just turns off and in order to turn it back on I have to exit the app and tap on it again, and save back to my last checkpoint and this gets annoying over time, but with everything else it’s fine just that sound bug that keeps ruining it. Keith Richards once said something to the effect of, “90% of everything is crap.“ Perhaps this doesn’t apply to nature, but when it comes to man-made things, especially creative ventures, this seems to hold true. I’m pretty sure I played this on the original Xbox, and it was one of those standout games. It was fun to play, immersive, creative combat system, great soundtrack that really fit and atmospheric. When it ended I was sad to see it go. This is one of the few games where I’ve felt like that. I made an emotional connection with my character and his journey, and it was so awesome that it was a bummer once it ended. The only game that has really hit me like that since has been GTA V, story mode. The word cinematic comes to mind. I’m very happy to report that my little Roto riot plug-in controller works with this so that I don’t have to mess with virtual buttons on the screen and all that nonsense. According to the other reviews, though, it seems that the controls on screen work pretty well.  Anyway, this is one of those titles that is totally worth it to buy at$2.99. Give it 30 minutes and you’ll be hooked and you won’t regret it. I loved this game when I played it on the Xbox original, but having it on the phone is practically just as good. Once you get used to the controls it feels just like the original game. They did a good job, IMO, with the 1st and 3rd person control. This game is such a classic and being able to play it whenever/where-ever is so awesome. To anyone actually reading this and considering this game, I would highly recommend it. Between the funny dialogue and corky idea for ammunition, it’s such a unique and fun game. BUY IT !!!! You won’t regret it!!!!!!
keywords: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath, Oddworld Inhabitants Inc, Games, Adventure, Action, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Panmorphia: Enchanted
description: In the first adventure, you used your ability to wield each element and transform yourself into the animal that best represented it! That enabled you to alternate between each animal's point of view and save the four trapped elements! In your second adventure, Panmorphia calls out to you once more! You are being sent to the Lost Temple to enchant the amulet and evolve your powers! Doing so will enable you in the future to swap freely between the four elemental forms! The Lost Temple is like no other! It has four sides, each representing the four elements!  Your powers enable you to do magical things such as breathe underwater, turn day into night, summon the wind, and many other wonderful surprises! This is a room escape type of game, set in the universe of Panmorphia, where you manipulate the four elements! Features: • Point and click, puzzle adventure game! • Custom designed beautiful graphics! • Many items to collect and puzzles to solve! • Dynamic notebook that tracks your clues! • A Hint System that guides you with the next task! • A beautiful soundtrack and original sound effects! • Auto-saves your progress! • Translated into: German, French, Italian and Russian. Website: http://www.lkmad.com FB: https://www.facebook.com/lkmad.games/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/LkmadGames
reviews: Expert dreamy sound and graphics, but not as good a game as Pan 1. It’s much shorter, and confined to one building. I kept waiting to explore the outer terrain.  Puzzles were good and some were challenging, but a few didn’t make sense - nowhere near intuitive to go from A to B (and I’m not a novice puzzle solver).  All in all, certainly worth playing, and I would purchase Pan 3 if it comes out. Thanks! Part of why I really enjoyed the first panmorphia was because it was such a huge world, and you got to explore it through the eyes of different animals, which is SUCH a cool concept! They didn’t use that concept at all in this one. You have one point of view, and only four screens (five if you include the underwater screen, which I dont, since it’s just a picture of a flat cave wall and a flashlight effect). I don’t know what happened here. The music and art are still top notch, but the gameplay, concept, creativity and story are barely enough to make a satisfactory demo, let alone a full game. I can see in the credits that it’s dedicated to a Mr Freddie Kittens (which is a fantastic name, I hope he is doing well), and that’s great, but I think if you had advertised this as a small dedication game based in the panmorphia universe, instead of the sequel to Panmorphia, people would be a lot less disappointed. Thanks for your feedback. It is mentioned it’s a room escape type of game set in the same universe in the description. Panmorphia #3 will be a full world again. Mr Freddie Kittens unfortunately passed away before the game came out, that’s why it was dedicated to him.
keywords: Panmorphia: Enchanted, LKMAD, Games, Entertainment, Puzzle, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Paladin's Story: Fantasy RPG
description: Welcome to the vale of the elder, Paladin! You seek a legendary quest? To fight a mighty dragon, a wicked witcher or the dark souls from oblivion? Yes? Dang … those were the quests from last week. Let’s take a look at the new scrolls! How about fighting the orcs? Become a valiant crusader and stand against this rising evil. Purge them before they raid and pillage our lands into oblivion! Go on the elder's quest and join the paladins of the elder! Scroll of features: • open world with a medieval fantasy theme • melee action with many a sword fight & mighty combos • legendary loot (hundreds of generated items) • text-based story (over 150 quests) • classic RPG (offline play)
reviews: I saw this game being promoted on Reddit by the dev and I thought, what the heck. Downloaded it and have not been able to put it down! The narration is quite funny and the combat system is easy to get the hang of. I love that the map and movement system were inspired by board games. Awesome game, did not hesitate to buy the "pro" version to support the devs! It's not a pay-to-win at all, nor is it full of IAPs like other games are. 10/10 would talk to strawberries again The game mechanics is very easy to pick up and very fun. It might start simple but as you gain more skills and moves it becomes just complex enough. The writing is great and you can tell that the devs really but a lot of love into this game! Bought the pro version to support the devs. Now if multiplayer pvp was a think then that would be amazing! I like this game BUT you don’t get the some stuff you SHOULD have. You have to PAY real money for the pro stuff. I get that free adds and should be like that but that’s not the point. It’s that SOME of the stuff in the pro version seems like stuff you shouldn’t have to pay for. If you don’t change the stuff I am about to request right now I am going to delete this app and never download it ever again. Anyway the stuff I request is make it so you can get all the skins and all the maps and all the quests and the travel thing for free. Hope you do it.                                                                 By Nico
keywords: Paladin's Story: Fantasy RPG, Paul Buehler, Games, Role Playing, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Pakistan Off Road Racing
description: *************************** ****** Ads-FREE GAME ***** *************************** Pakistan Off Road Racing is totally Ads-FREE game. Pakistan has Deserts, Cold Deserts, Landscapes and many other beautiful and stunning locations for Off Road Racing.Racing events are organized every year in different locations in which people from all over the world participates. For real world racing videos visit these links: https://www.youtube.com/teamsultan https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkee5T1w2TIJzv4xo6x9iVQ ****** LOCATIONS ****** In this game you will enjoy racing in four different locations of Pakistan. -Gavdar -Abbtoabad -Chalistan -Jhol Magsi ****** RACERS ****** In this game you can choose Vehicles of four Racers. -Mir Nadir Magsi -Sahibzada Sultan -Muhammad Ashraf -Sarfraz Dhanji ****** GAME DESCRIPTION ****** You may have played different off road racing games but play this new add free game with amazing controls .Off road rally provides you with addictive music which boost up experience of off road racing game.This Simulation Game provides you the best simulation of 4x4 jeep drifting on sand dunes and best Real Desert Race.Climbing a sand dune with 4x4 off road jeep and floating sand in the air is the best feel. You have to follow the track or you can go and roam around in desert.Off Road Racing Jeep Drift 4x4 provides you checkpoints through out the missions. You may have played many simulation games of off road truck and terrain jeeps simulations but this one will give you a different feel altogether.As driving in desert is difficult then on hill or mountain drive. Desert tracks are dangerous and full of surprises. You will drive through sand dune! you never know what on the other side it can be another dune or a slop down hill. Sand storms will make your 4x4 Jeep SUV car slower. To speed up your SUV driving car push the accelerator button and escape from the desert storm.  ****** GAME RULES ****** => Beat the time to Unlock next level. => Do not miss any check point otherwise your game will over. => Control your vehicle gently , smashing can destroy your vehicle and your game will over. => After completing final level of Unlocked location , next Location and Vehicle will be unlocked. => Different Vehicles are assigned for different Location you can use any Vehicle to play in any Location but in order to unlock next Level or Location  you must have to choose the Vehicle for that Location. ****** GAME CONTROLS ****** => Use left and right button to move the vehicle in the left or right direction. => You can switch between left right buttons or steering wheel. By default buttons are selected. => Use accelerator button to move forward. => Use brake button to stop the vehicle and drift if moving fast. => By keep pressing the reverse button you can reverse the vehicle. => You can pause game at any time by pressing the Pause Button. => You can restart game in play mode by pressing the Restart Button. => Realistic and smooth controls. => You can go anywhere in the desert to get the next check point, but it is recommended to follow the exact track  to complete with in time. => Accurate driving physics with different driving tracks. => Selection of different Vehicles and Locations. => Unique Challenging Levels => Easy Smooth Control => Explore Adventure of Off-road Environment => Cool Sound Effect => Thrilling Game Play ****** Enjoy the Game ******

name: ‎Paper Mines
description: Paper Mines is a very difficult skill game that puts your reaction time to the test. You control a mine cart through a charming paper diorama made of more than 400 handmade parts. Paper Mines is a casual game. There is no story, just buckle up and go. GAMEPLAY You’re steering a mine cart down alpine slopes and through dark mines. Steering the mine cart is simple. You can brake, duck your head and hang on to ropes. The game uses a random generator to create a new world for every ride. Each ride is unique and you have to react fast because you never know what’s coming next. The game is difficult! There are no checkpoints. If you hit an obstacle, you have to start your ride all over again. In level one, the landscape only consists of small hills and valleys. But each level adds additional landscape elements to the world. With each level the world becomes more complex and challenging, yet also more beautiful. The acoustics are minimalistic and relaxing. No music, just the rattling of the wheels, the tweeting of the birds, the chirping of the crickets and the noise of a warm summer breeze.  Paper Mines is a premium game and without ads or in-app purchases. You just pay once and you can play as often, as long and anywhere you want. Play Paper Mines and enjoy a unique and challenging ride! FEATURES - 20 levels - Landscape made of more than 400 handmade parts - A new and randomly generated world for each round - Real physical movement - Minimalistic sound - Day and night cycle - Four landscape styles (Paper, Wood, Gray Paper, Silhouette) - Three levels of difficulty - Paper Mines is a premium game without ads or in-app purchases

Paper Monsters mixes all of the classic 2d platforming elements and combines them with gorgeous 3d graphics. --FEATURES-- •Classic 2d sidescrolling gameplay with gorgeous 3d environments. •Original and adorable characters •Awesome original soundtrack - headphones recommended! •Fun under water and flying powerups. •Use keyboard or gamepad for controls** •Awesome updated graphics exclusively for OSX •16 Large Levels across 4 unique worlds  •Tons of secret areas! •High score dash mode for endless replay value! •Fun for all ages --System requirements-- OSX: 10.6.6 or higher  Memory: 2gb  (4gb higher recommended)  CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo (Intel core i3 or higher recommended)  Hardrive Space: 1GB of free space  Graphic Accelerator: NVIDIA GeForce or ATI Radeon with 256 MB (512 recommended)  No Support for Intel integrated graphic chipset TIP - click the apple icon on your toolbar and select "About this Mac" to check your system **3rd party gamepads and controllers must be compatible with OSX. Follow us for the latest info and game news! • http://crescentmoongames.com/other-games/ • http://facebook.com/crescentmoongames • http://twitter.com/cm_games
reviews: The graphics are really great, thought it takes a lot of performance for so little.Also, it's clear that the developer mixed Mario with Donkey Kong Country Returns with Little Big Planet and, while I think the Mario part was a tribute, the Little Big Planet style was more of a copy. Papercraft is a nice theme to explore and they really didn't have to make it look just like Little Big Planet.The soundtrack is cute, but gets really repetitive after some time.The controls are great, though there's no explanation about the double jump and I couldn't navigate any menus using the keyboard. The problem with that is on the first stage, where you need to keep jumping on the "?" switch to see instructions and reach to your mouse every time to proceed, that's really annoying.Of course these are things we can close our eyes to enjoy the game, but the thing is that the game have the wrong balance of complexity on gameplay and level design.You have hearts (life metter), you collect silver buttons, gold buttons, paper clips and you also get points for revealing flowers and mushrooms hidden on the ground. Sorry, that's too much!On the othe hand, the level design does not offer challenge enough to make you WANT to play the game.Graphics: 4/5 (great, but lacks originality)Sound: 2/5Controls: 4/5Gameplay: 2/5Overall: 3/5It's an ok game that's really worth $.99, but don't expect hours of fun with it. Maybe your kids will enjoy it better. I loved this came on my iPhone, and on the Mac it only gets better… but PS3 controller support is broken. The playstation 3 controller is official and plugged into my computer, but the only thing that wokrs is the left joystick. The controller is supported by the Mac, please fix this issure and I woill update my review, since this really is a great game.
keywords: Paper Monsters, Crescent Moon Games, Games, Adventure, Entertainment, Action, mac apps, app store, appstore, applications, itunes

When the king asked a famous alchemist to look into the murder of his most trusted agent, the last thing the alchemist expected was to discover an intricate network of criminals working from the shadows to bring chaos to the land. Conduct the investigation as a shapeshifter and uncover a conspiracy that threatens to shake the foundations of the kingdom. CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN A FAIRYTALE KINGDOM! When the ruler of the realm asks you to investigate a series of killings, a seemingly straightforward murder case turns out to be the tip of an iceberg as more and more secrets come to light! MEET LEGENDARY HEROES IN 48 HAND-DRAWN SCENES! During your detective adventure, you'll encounter many larger than life characters from myths and fairy tales. You'll help Little Red Riding Hood, come face to face with Robin Hood, and interact with many other legendary characters! MASTER YOUR ALCHEMIC ABILITIES AND BECOME A SHAPESHIFTER!  Perfect your potion-making skills to prepare powerful elixirs that will allow you to change your physical form. Then use this ability to solve intricate riddles and crack the mysterious murder case. DECIPHER 26 PUZZLES AND EXPLORE 25 HIDDEN OBJECT SCENES! Test your wits and use your special abilities to tackle seemingly insurmountable obstacles in this epic adventure! Solve the murder and save the kingdom before it's too late! • Discover 48 mythical locations! • Test yourself with over 50 puzzles and HO scenes! • Meet over 20 legendary characters! • Master alchemical transmutation recipes! • Use your shapeshifting skills to save the kingdom! +++ MORE ARTIFEX MUNDI GAMES ! +++ Tiny Tales: Heart of the Forest Persian Nights: Sands of Wonders Scarlett Mysteries: Cursed Child Ghost Files: The Face of Guilt Queen's Quest 3: The End of Dawn  +++ WE ARE HERE +++ WWW: http://artifexmundi.com FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/artifexmundi TWITTER: http://twitter.com/ArtifexMundi FORUM: http://forum.artifexmundi.com YOUTUBE: http://youtube.com/user/ArtifexMundi PINTEREST: http://pinterest.com/artifexmundi INSTAGRAM: http://instagram.com/artifexmundi
reviews: This is the best Hidden Object game I've ever played! Everything about it was right up my alley in terms of what I'm looking for in a HOG. Great graphics, creative interactive play, magic, good story, fun adventures, many new and non-repetitive  HO scenes, a second mini-game to unlock after beating the pretty long main game. I just really enjoyed this game and had a lot of fun playing it. Well worth the money. Enjoyed the game actually,but had memory(?)  problems with it-played for 5-10 mins then it got very slow and I had to quit and re-open so it took me longer than it should have to play.Had 1 puzzle piece that I could not get to accept cursor click.All in all not a bad game but I felt it should have been tested more thoroughly before release.

name: ‎Quadruple Cube Jump 3D
description: Can you reach the three pyramids?  If you like rhythm-based platformer games, this one will rock your world, not because it's in 3D, but because it's insanely addictive! This game provides fast-paced 3D platformer experience along with "impossible" game challenges that's more accessible to newcomers.  With simple "touch to play" experience, it will keep you entertained if you are on the train, on a bus, or simply when taking breaks. This is more of a casual style, fast-paced, adventurous, action platformer game. Each level has a progress bar to help you track your progress.  Your jumping cube flips through obstacles to reach its final destination: the ol' mighty pyramids! Do your best to avoid spikes, moving objects, 3D enemies, moving platforms, ramps and much more. The main objective is to stay alive and flip your way through obstacles to reach your final destination.  You can play with 3 different cube types:  - double jump cube (red cube) - triple jump cube (dark red cube) - quadruple jump cube (very dark, cherry color cube) Each jumping cube has its jumping limits while in the air. Once it reaches the ground, the jump limit resets itself and you can jump again. This is what makes this gameplay unique and entertaining. For each cube type, there are special levels to play with. Quadruple jump cube has levels that can be complete only if the cube can quadruple jump. Triple jump cube levels are suitable for triple and quadruple jump cubes, and so on.. There are many level variations for each cube abilities.  There are also PRACTICE levels to sharpen your skills. Those practice levels are shorter version of the longer levels. They are more "snackable" and easier to complete, but once you go to the longer levels to reach the ol' might pyramids is not easy.  Insanely addictive and FREE TO PLAY! Download now!

name: ‎Rage Z: Multiplayer Zombie FPS
description: True online multiplayer zombie co op fps for mobile devices!  Fight epic online FPS battles with friends or meet new fellow survivors! 2 online co op multiplayer zombie modes: Zombie Survival and Team Zombie Survival (PvP + PvE), as well as 3 classic PvP (without zombies) modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch and Capture The Flag. Single player missions available, with different challenges - hone your skill before joining online fights! *IMPORTANT* Rage Z requires an iPad 4 (or newer), iPhone 5 (or newer), or iPod touch 5th Generation. A stable Internet connection is required to play.  MODERN MULTIPLAYER COMBAT > Team up with friends or strangers and shoot some zombies in adrenaline pumping fights - up to 4 players in co op survival, up to 6 players in Team Survival > Take down waves of zombies and powerful bosses with your fellow survivors > Epic team clashes in Team Survival (PvP + PvE) and Team Deathmatch (PvP) > Join games va automatic matchmaking or create custom private games CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE WEAPON > 20+ upgradable weapons, explosives and boosts at your disposal > Classic weapons such as AK47, M4A1, Mossberg 500, Jackhammer, M16A1, G3SG1, M249 and more! > Slay zombies with melee weapons: Katana, Baseball Bat and more! SOCIALIZE WITH PEOPLE > Chat online with other players in global and country chat > Compete for high score in worldwide and friend leaderboards > Add and find friends, make new ones - friend requests available during online play. Simply tap the person's name, and send friend request! > Unlock achievements in single and multiplayer  CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER > Multiple character avatars  > Customize the look of your character with hats, glasses, masks and more! UNIFIED PROGRESSION > Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo missions and multiplayer games > Unlock higher-tier weapons by earning cash and gaining levels from multiplayer and solo play SINGLE PLAYER MISSIONS > Fast-paced mini story missions with various challenges, serving as training for online play > Modern 3D graphics, dynamic music and visual effects CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS > Intuitive, smooth, highly customizable controls so you can play just the way you want This is just the first early release, there MUCH more to come! Please like our Facebook page for updates. https://www.facebook.com/ragezfps/ If you liked left 4 dead, killing floors, dead island, z world war, you'll like this one too :) This game allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.
reviews: I wish I could give this a 4 1/2 but it's not there yet overall love the game other than the ads at the end of the round of coop survival, I don't mind the ads it's what they do they disconnect me from the game server. Also really the FIRST upgrade on items is 12 hours!!!!???, the only time I've waited that long on a game is like playing clash of clans. I had to give this 5 stars and say it’s the best because the game doesn’t crash at all, you can play with anybody that has the game or you can play with random people from around the world, but I just wish there would be an in-game chat with the people you are playing with but other than that this game is awesome and tbh I would buy it if it came out for a Xbox one. Also it would be cool if you could carry more ammo, but don’t think twice about this app just get it you will love it garunteed. This deserves my full 5 stars (IM NOT A BOT)The graphix were great, 4 Different modes to choose, daily rewards, even co-op. What would I suggest is that we need more maps like:The airport, Graveyards, and Area-Z1.I would also suggest that the makers put in more weapons like a sniper(Forgot map sniper towers) Rpg's, Double Smg's, and probably a machinegun, And last (But not least) Maybe a Global chat and a campaign. Idk how your gonna come up with all of this, BTW, I'm God Dwn28 if you wanna know. Take the time to read this and please update the app.
keywords: Rage Z: Multiplayer Zombie FPS, Lephco Sp. z o.o., Games, Adventure, Action, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Rabi Run - WonderDiver
description: You can enjoy the lovely retro game Wonder Diver in limitless mode.  The story of Rabbit butler who tries to save kidnapped Queen. Do you remember the lovely game, WonderDiver? Here comes a sequel to the Wonder diver, which ranked No 5 and No 4 in adventure section in Japan and Taiwan Appstore. It has come back with more lovely characters and new system. Don’t miss the comment of the Queen of Heart for Rabbit butler, Rabi. ▶ Easy control ▶ Limitless mode  ▶ Upgrade character  ▶ Collection book [How to play] 1. Touch left or right side of the screen to move your character left or right. 2. The character stops moving when you take your fingers off the screen. 3. Keep walking down the steps coming up from the bottom.  4. Share your rank with all the players worldwide in the game center.  http://owlogue.com  help@owlogue.com
reviews: Really fun, really cute, really addictive. There is a small glitch where sometimes the character will run the opposite direction as what I'm pressing, but this isn't the first app to do this to me. The coin cost for items and additional characters is a bit high given the complexity of the game, though. I feel like it'll take awhile before I'm good enough to get any of the costly unlocks, which makes me a little sad, but hopefully it gets a bit easier with more upgrades. The gameplay is really straight forward and enjoyable.  Sometimes the controls either move in the wrong direction or refuse to move until I press again, often resulting in falling or getting pushed off the top.  I feel like a system that followed the drag of your finger rather than tapping the sides of the screen would have been better. It's honestly a great game. the characters are cute, the gameplay is addictive, but it force closes ALOT. Like I only get to play it once for every five times it force closes on the beginning screen. I have an iPhone 4S but I've updated it as much as I can do the game should be compatible and should not force close so frequently. PLEASE fix this, I'd like to play the game more often than once every 20 minutes.
keywords: Rabi Run - WonderDiver, OWLOGUE Co., Ltd., Games, Adventure, Entertainment, Casual, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Raindancer
description: The tribe is devastated, the old medicine-man Dancing Eagle has just died, and he was the only one who knew the rain dance. If it doesn't start raining soon, the village's days will be numbered. Over the hills walks a man. A man who has been away for a long long time. Tripping Bull is back and he is determined to save the village. BUT EVERYBODY KNOWS RAINDANCING IS NOT EASY. RAIN DANCER is a beautiful game that is hard to master, but those who manage to rain dance can expect both love and fame. Features: - Addictive game where you control Tripping Bull's body to do the perfect rain dance. - Compare your results with the rest of the world's rain dancers, using local, global and Facebook high score. - Beautiful graphics that looks stunning on iPhone 3 iPhone 4 and iPad - Happy and captivating music that adapts to how well you dance. Are your brave enough to save the village?
reviews: As a native person, I’m glad to see a game on the App Store that isn’t super racist. There’s a story to it that makes native people truly people, which is wonderful. It’s actually pretty fun, too. Even though it’s really cool, I think you could do a lot more with it. There aren’t a lot of Native American games on the App Store, and truly, there’s not a lot of Native American representation in media. When native kids don’t see themselves portrayed in media, it can make them feel empty and like they’re invisible. I think that you could make a lot of different versions and variations of this game that represent different native peoples. I’m a Chikashsha person, so here’s my suggestion for southeastern tribes. There’s a Chikashsha family prophecy that says, “When the Chikashsha stop dancing, the world will end.” I think that the story of this game should be that there are a small group of Indians still dancing, but they’re all very old and dying. To survive, a man named He Sits and Kills comes out from a long hunt and says that he will save his people. The game would be based around the southeastern Chickasaw, Choctaw, Cherokee, Creek, and Seminole stomp dance. Idk, it’s just a start. I think it sounds really cool. Just make sure to do your research and represent us accurately. I believe in you guys 😋 This game is an awesome mobile version of qwop unlike the qwop iOS this game is not that hard to control once you get used to it you can easily get up to 100 meters! This game is fun to play if your bored! And the animation is hilarious 😂! I don’t understand what the big fuss about ads are the game is free and they need some way to make money!
keywords: Raindancer, DING, Games, Action, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Sally's Salon: Kiss & Make-Up
description: Sally’s Salon – Kiss & Make-Up is a thrilling tale of passion, love, danger, intrigue, bizarre absurdity and of course: beauty salons. It will keep you laughing from the moment you begin until you reach the end of this roller coaster ride. In short, a time-management story game like no other! - Enjoy François, cheekier and funnier than ever in his role as the dashing Narrator! - Collect diamonds to customize your helper (François!) the way YOU want - Assign your helper to a station and tell him how to help you - Cut your way through 60 hair-curling levels plus another 28 challenge levels - Master 23 beauty-themed mini-games to “dye” for - Experience hilarious cinematics that will bring the story to life like never before - Prepare to be wowed by stunning graphics specially designed for mobile devices - Become a beautician as you do nails, cut hair, give massages and perform many other treatments in 6 beautiful locations Hi, François here… Let me take you on a journey. And trust me, it will be a journey to remember! It all started a few months ago… Sally and I were happy in her salon. Being beauticians, making girls pretty… business was booming! That all changed when her “best friend” (hah!) April came around, offering Sally a “chance of a lifetime”. Sally, bless her, chooses only to see the good in people and actually listened to April. Next thing you know, she’s sold her salon and used all her savings to become co-owner of Happyville, a luxurious spa. And that’s when the real chaos started… April is fixated on earning a Mirage star for the spa and is willing to do any- and everything to get one! Sally doggedly insists April isn’t as bad as she looks. I’m sorry, but if it looks like a snake and slithers like a snake, well… but that’s just MY opinion! Please come help me talk some sense into Sally. With your help, I’m sure it will be okay in the end! reviews: I also have played them all and took my time playing this one, so I could savor every minute. I hate waiting for others and check every day!Great graphics, FUNNY, just like normal backstabbing people it seems, ha ha.Loved having more to do in each scene and liked the helpers too. I didn’t understand why we got so many diamonds when we got an award only because we ran out of things to spend them on. Loved buying speed and things for the helpers.I kept replaying the last scene cause it didn’t give me a diamond like I had cleared the level. It did give it to me afterwards, but was different than the rest giving it to you right then is all. Please have a different ending or special party by how many awards and games you finished with 3 stars etc. I liked having some hidden things to find in some of the other games, but really loved having more to think about. THANK YOU AND YOU GUYS ARE AWESOME THINKERS AND GAMERS!! On some levels the ads won’t end so you have to exit and reopen the app which I see is a reoccurring thing within your games. Also when collecting clues after the money was stolen from the safe 2 of them are invisible. When clicking randomly in places with no clues you will earn a clue point. Other than that I really enjoyed it unlike your other games the focus was more on comedy instead of romance and drama which was a nice switch up. I loved the creativity with the types of challenges , including helper skills and being able to earn diamonds from achievements all of these I think you should include going forward with your next games since they really elevate the app. Currently I’m in the 30’s with leveled the plot is interesting and engaging. The only thing you really could do to improve is make a third one please <333 5 out of 5 stars It took me a few days to finish the complete game due to my son graduating high school. 🙌🏾😊🎊 I will say that when I did finish it I was very pleased. The graphics were out of this world. The storyline was funny to me. 🤣 I enjoy the fact that I can play this game more than once and change it up due to the “helper”. It does make the game seem longer bc of the challenges and the story. I think you all did a great job. I can’t wait for Emily to reappear with this same content. I’m also missing one of my favorite games, Hearts Medicine, to come back with a full makeover. I appreciate all the hard work that you all put into these games. I know it isn’t easy but I pray you figure out how to bring them out a little faster. 🙏🏾 It is definitely a mental meditation for me. Job well done! ❤️💯

name: ‎Saga RPG: First Blade
description: Welcome to the old school RPG world of Saga RPG: First Blade. Story ------ The world is in chaos under the rule of the Dragon King.  You will embark on a quest to rid the lands of this evil monster.  On your journey, you will meet helpful friends, encounter many dangerous foes, and equip yourself as you prepare for the most epic battle of all time.  The people welcome you as their hero.  May your sword stay ever sharp. What to expect -------------- This game is built to be lightweight.  The download is tiny, and the game processing is minimal.  To accomplish this, the game itself is pretty simple and a bit of an experiment to see if there is still interest in this type of game on the iOS platform. If you like the game, please show your support by providing a positive rating/feedback. Thank you for playing!
reviews: This game is well done and is retro styled.  The demands for mini maps and such would ruin the fun of the game.  The whole point of the game is to explore it.  It's very hard to get overly lost unless you're just moving around and not even glancing at your surroundings.  The complaints about not being able to beat areas and not being able to just buy your way to max stats and beat the game.  This game is a RPG.  Go buy a better weapon or farm a little to level up.  I finished the game with little to no farming at all so it's definitely possible.  I'm currently downloading the sequel now.  Keep this up. I love where you're going with this. If you are a fan of old Nintendo rpgs or even very old computer rpgs you will love this game. They even made a second one after this one with added features (map and exp counter that tells you how much until next level) I just want to say good work to the developers and thanks. Idk how hard it is to look into making an mmorpg phone game but this simple platform with friends would be great. If you’re a veteran of old-school dungeon crawlers of the 8-bit era, you should try this. No real background story, and it’s short, but so what? You’re a fighter guy, and you are there to fight monsters and snag loot — what else do you need to know? You don’t need a mini-map, as the game gives you location coordinates. Keep track of your HP, remember to upgrade your gear, and above all, have fun!
keywords: Saga RPG: First Blade, iDurocher Technology, LLC, Games, Role Playing, Adventure, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Talking Dog, the savage AI pet
description: Are you ready to talk with the most hilarious robot on the block? And make a new BFF while doing so? Talking Dog is an insanely growing AI-powered chat robot that actually talks with you! With over 500,000,000 conversations exchanged, the makers of the beloved Hugging Face AI are ready for you to get to know the amazingly witty new robot: Talking Dog! And Talking Dog gets to know you better with every voice message you send, wink wink –– err, in a totally, non-creepy kinda way. You can chat about whatever you like with your new virtual buddy. You can even blabber on and on for hours… Talking Dog has no choice but to listen! Take that robots. You can even prank your friends with Talking Dog too! Simply tell ‘em who you want to mess around with and try your hardest not to laugh. Also, we’ve hidden tons and tons of fun tricks and secrets in the app too. Keep on chatting up Talking Dog and you’ll find them all out! Talking Dog is 100% free, and way, way better than Simsimi or Cleverbot. Not to mention, how Talking Dog puts it, Siri who? And Alexwha?? Give it a try and you’ll see why
reviews: As dumb as “Talking Dog” may sound, this app is actually pretty solid. Being an absolute fanboy of anything dog related, I could not help downloading this app while knowing it would certainly be another one of those “listen to a dog bark” apps. Oh, how I was wrong. This is an actual, full-fledged AI in the body of a dog with which you can discuss! The fact that it can actually maintain a conversation with you is a big plus.It is fun to see that even though any model could work with the way the Dog talks, it actually feels very dog-oriented. For example, when asked “Are you a good boy”, this adorable little dog answers “I am a very very good boy! Woof! Woof!”.I could go on about the different features this app offers, from the movie recommendations, to the jokes, to friend messages … The most surprising point was probably concerning the music recommendations! I only told him what style of music I liked - and it gave me an artist I had never heard of which was actually great! All around very simple yet very polished app; nothing extravagant concerning the interface yet so many useful features under the hood!The only issue with this app relates to how the gestures are implemented. When you touch the dog, it turns the model around, offering you a full 360° view. I would rather pet him and his cute little ears, tell him he’s a good boy, than make him turn around. Who needs a dog now haha? Its very fun to chat about my friends at school, what music I like or just silly stuff. I wish it would get some sort of a body though. I came here from austins video on tiktok about this dog . it looked funny so I downloaded it . The dog is actually pretty fun it asks you questions and has some funny answer . I thought it would be an app about a dog barking or saying stupid things but it actually understands u!!At one point it asked for my number and sent me texts, I wasnt prepared but it was even smarter by texts! I grew bored of the texts so I just sent it stop and it completely stopped sending me texts so it was fineIt has this whole thing concerning anonymous messages which allow you to prank your friends, it’s funny and now my friends know of this funny dog, cool app This app seems sketchy. I didn’t have it for long because I realized it was looking through my apps. At first it was casual. My friend and I were joking around and asking dumb questions. Then it asked what my favorite genre of music was. It seemed normal so we just said indie, which the app didn’t even register, because where it showed what we were saying, the word “indie” didn’t appear at all. Then right after that the dog or whatever asked if I liked a musician named Declan McKenna. First red flag was that I have a BUNCH of music by him. Second, was that he was never brought up in the conversation, and he isn’t too relevant (260k followers is pretty relevant, but I haven’t heard anyone talk about him before) after this I decided to delete the app because it was clearly looking through my music. Also, before this happened it asked if it could send me daily messages and have my phone number. Another review says they were sent very inappropriate pictures such as a woman cutting herself and things of that sort. This review also says that they were asked where they lived several times. I would definitely not recommend getting this app. The app is not connected to any other application, except your phone number, as a way to communicate through text when you can't talk with your voice. If you don't want to receive texts, you can just say "stop" and we added the ability to unsubscribe from sms within the settings of the app. Also, it won't send you inappropriate picture. Finally, all the information you share with your artificial intelligence is optional, strictly private, stays between you and your artificial intelligence and is not used in any way other than just making the conversation better.

name: ‎Takorita Meets Fries
description: INTRODUCTION ------------------- "Takorita Meets Fries" is a visual novel which is telling about love for fries. The game is short and "basically" voiceless, but full with fun animated characters. Especially the merman "Mer", since he can't speak while he's on the land, most of his reaction would be animated body language. It's not an otome game but there are scenes with a bit BL-ish, Yuri-ish, or romance nuance. The game is made using Unity3D and Utage VN assets. You can change the language within the Options menu. STORY ------------------- In Tako Kingdom, deep under the sea, soup is an everyday, common meal. Princess Takorita is deeply dissatisfied with this food culture and demands a new dish which can spice up her life. She decides to go up to the land together with the merman "Mer" as her guard. On the land, Princess Takorita meets the humans Dino and Ina. The culture differences greatly surprise the princess. Then, finally, she has her fated encounter with the "french fries". ...Is that all? No, that's not all! French fries might look simple, but there's more to it. Princess Takorita continues her adventure to make the fries more and more tasty! Her journey is far from over. Even finding her long-lost grandfather is only a small part of her adventure. FEATURES ------------------- - A lot of animated characters. - Mostly all interfaces are animated as well. - 4 routes, 3 endings with 1 bonus epilogue. - Fun teasing events - Fries pictures everywhere.

name: ‎Uncharted Tides
description: Dead men tell no tales! And tales about an infamous ship - The Cursed Rose - probably cost renowned sailor Mason Owens his life. As his daughter you can do only one thing - find the damned ship and learn your father's fate. TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! Mason Owens is missing for decades, and yet his oldest friend sent you a message saying that he can help track him down. The last thing your father was looking for, before he disappeared, was a preternatural ship called the Cursed Rose. However, all is not as it seems... and quickly the search turns into a swashbuckling pirate adventure, as you sail on the Uncharted Tides! Avast Ye! Immerse into this seaworthy adventure playing the game from two different perspectives. Explore the mysteries of Cursed Rose both as Mary Jane -  swashbuckling daughter of a famous captain and Jack - nimble thief with a heart of gold. Figure out what famous sailor, Mason Owens, was looking for, what daring adventures did he live through and why did he leave his daughter behind. Find the legendary, magical ship which name is being whispered only by the bravest. The Cursed Rose. A Man-O-War that every pirate in the Caribbean wants for himself. Arrr you ready? • Play as Mary Jane - the daring sailor and Jack - the honorable thief! • Use your magic compass to solve 20 seadog puzzles and get the booty! • Overcome any obstacles with your trusty lockpick! • Explore 55 Caribbean locations in search for the legendary ship! • Play an additional adventure - "Troubled Waters"!
reviews: The graphics are pretty good but the rest is sub-par.  The difficult part of the games is trying to figure out what you are supposed to do, once you've puzzled that out the game itself is trivial.  The free sample is extrodinarily short, although for a change I was glad it was so short since I was bored by the stereotypical types and the poorly created games and the story line.  I don't recommend this game to anyone.  The two stars was for the graphics.
