name: ‎Unknown Knights
description: Discover new challenges, and steer the game's Narrative as you venture to destroy the Dark Lord's Tower. Your loyal company of Knights and Soldiers, the Unknown Knights, will stand by you every step of the journey. "Unknown Knights" provides unique unit battles with roguelike encounters. You must solve problems, hire knights, and draft militia to build a strong band for the final fight against the Dark Lord. KEY FEATURES ◆Real-Time ACTION Strategy Control multiple units in real-time with four buttons. Timing your Actions is key; Read enemy movements and react accordingly. - Attack, Defense, Parry, and Charge. ◆The Journey and Choices Hundreds of random encounters will pop up during the journey. Each of them has different choices and consequences. Some of the results of your decision won't happen immediately but surely come back to you. ◆Hidden Bosses & Relics to Discover Your name will spread in the world as you continue your journey. Wandering wizards, underground monsters and leaders of factions will come to you to challenge or give a request. ◆Content - 290+ events and stories, all affected by user choice - 350+ battles - Knights with 15 different specialties - Enemy Factions that includes Dark Lord's Army, Thieves, the Assassins, and the Royal Guards - Randomly generated play map and different ways to unlock gifts - Dynamic Weather, providing weather-based strategies - Three different difficulties designed for players of different skill levels - 10 hidden bosses can be found throughout gameplay - Online Ranking ※ The game is available for offline playing. ※ No Ads or Microtransactions
reviews: I kept reading all these glowing reviews about this game. The art style seemed intriguing too me and I’ve always been a huge fan of roguelikes. So I figured I could spare the few dollars. This game is fantastic, very unique from any other roguelike I’ve played. The choices you make actually have an impact on your run, not just you as a character. But also the events and things that happen to you throughout the game. The combat is also very unique. Your units fight on their own but are still at your command in terms of what they do and who you put where. Leading to some interesting builds with your party members as some have abilities to use tranq arrows or fire shield. Or perhaps they aren’t a combat specialist and are miners that can get you more ore? Along with some talent trees and trinkets and you got yourself a game you can play many different ways. The art style is minimalistic when you are traveling about. But when you are in combat it changes to become a little more complex to help keep track of everything going on and it works extremely well. You also get permanent unlocks in the form of trinkets you can start the game with. It’s all here, balanced, polished and loads of content. This game is worth more than the $2.99 asking price. These developers deserve your money for the content they have packed into this for that price. Hours and hours of entertainment, give it a chance if you are a fan of roguelikes or rpgs at all and I’ll bet you’ll like it. Okay, so when I first saw this game through an add I expected some kind of cheap game, but the gameplay and story just drive me to keep playing. I failed so many times before having my first victory through the 10th chapter, but I still can’t stop playing it. It’s addictive to keep playing and to work to get different relics, skills, and other starts. Along with the ranking system! Anyways this game is great and I really recommend it!P.S. 15 potion start is my fave because I make a lot of mistakes All in all I think the art style and gameplay are wonderfully  simple yet captivating. However my ONE issue is that saving your game does nothing, as the game automatically saves your progress anyway, AND if you die, you must restart from chapter 1, rather than from the level on which you died. And saving the game doesn't help because you can't manually load a save game to go back after dying. I find it to be incredibly annoying. Was this the original intent? is it supposed to be "let's see how far you can get" kind of game? If so that's fine, I guess. But it isn't made clear.
keywords: Unknown Knights, Aram Seo, Games, Role Playing, Strategy, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Ultima IV: C64
description: ABOUT ‘ULTIMA IV: C64’ Download one of Western RPG’s beloved classics and experience the ground-breaking game that cemented the Ultima™ series' legend firsthand. ‘Ultima IV: C64’ is a near 100% replica of the original version developed by Origin Systems in 1985, available free of charge - courtesy of Mythic studios - utilizing Elite System’s C64: Elite Collection technology.  SET FORTH ON GRAND ADVENTURES The evil triad of Mondain, Minax, and the hellspawn Exodus has been vanquished but evil yet abounds, in isolated pockets and in the hearts of men. A new age awaits the coming of one who can conquer evil through mastery of both magic and the use of force. Daemons, dragons, and long-dead wizards plague the countryside and must be destroyed. EXPERIENCE A MILESTONE IN COMPUTER GAMING WHAT DOES IT MEAN TO BE GOOD? Ultima IV challenges not only your physical and mental skills, but the true fabric of your moral character, breaking traditional “kill the bad guy to save the world” clichés. BATTLE ENEMIES IN STRATEGIC COMBAT The seeker on the path of the Avatar will face hostile groups composed of mixed enemy types and will survive such encounters only by strategic use of weapons and terrain. Earthly victories over seemingly impossible odds lead to the final conflict, where the ultimate challenge awaits. DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO BECOME THE AVATAR? ULTIMA IV: C64 GAMEPLAY FEATURES: •Digital copies of materials included in the original Ultima IV including the ‘Player Reference Card by Lord British,’ ‘History of Britannia as told by Kyle the Younger,’ ‘Book of Mystic Wisdom as told by Philpop the Weary,’ ‘Ultima IV Map of Britannia,’ and assorted images •Helpful in-game guide to help you master gameplay as well as an in-depth gameplay guide for Beginners, courtesy of GameFAQS **Spoiler Alert** •Enjoy playing Ultima IV in portrait or landscape mode •Automatically save your game each time you exit with up to four save game slots The app is constantly evolving, Elite Systems is committed to continuing development over the weeks, months and indeed years ahead. If you have any questions, concerns or general feedback please contact us at support@elite-systems.co.uk  We promise we’ll respond to your message. NOTE: We're aware of (and thank each of you for reporting) a number of issues. Currently we're considering which of them can feasibly be addressed and where so, on what timescale. SIGNIFICANT - currently this app does not utilise iCloud to back-up saved games. Therefore, whilst we intend and believe that saved games will be retained when this app is updated, we can not guarantee that it will. If you wish to retain your saved games we recommend that you DO NOT UPDATE THIS APP. PLEASE ALSO NOTE: As of 12th Sept. we are aware that a number of players have reported issues with the game "freezing" after loading a saved game. We are investigating these reports and in particular whether the issue may be related to the Stack pointer. If so, we expect it to take a few days to prepare a fix and an update for submission to Apple.
reviews: I know I shouldn't whine about a free thing but the misclicks are getting stupid.  It's almost not fun anymore.  I don't play as long now that that is happening. I was considering checking out the game that the ad has been promoting but I don't think I will.  Apparently quality isn't a concern. Now that I'm hooked into the game I'd even pay a couple of dollars to be able to finish it without the frustration of poor battle placement and having to move 15 times to get a treasure chest. I was SO excited to find this game!  I’ve been wanting to play it again for years.  It’s amazing they are able to “port” it, it is literally the original game in all it’s vintage glory.  I was so happy . . . but now after a couple weeks of playing, I’ve run into the same problem I see many here have: the farther you get, the more impossible it becomes to play.  The mis-clicks are making it nearly pointless to continue; I’m up to FIVE mis-clicks per step now, about 40% of the time.  I just made 23 moves in order to get on top of a treasure chest.  I have blundered into poisoned soil 10 times in the last day.  I can’t fight, no one will stop moving.  I end up fighting with one person and skipping the rest, because I can’t reposition anyone.  I am hugely disappointed, can this be fixed?  It’s not a small issue.  Does this have to do with my iOS version?  Is anyone NOT having this problem?  Thank you for putting this game out, but alas I don’t think I’ll bother as it’s already incredibly frustrating and I’ve only got six in the party.  I haven’t even been in a dungeon, and I can barely fight trolls.  There’s a long way to go. I read the reviews ahead of mine and thought, "Well a lot of people are complaining about this movement bug, but what the hell it's free"...I was so excited to see this game on here, my first rpg from my childhood! So I downloaded it and thought I could play through the bugs.  At first the game was great, just how I remembered it.  But as you pick up party members (required to win the game) it's bugged to move you for every additional party member you get.  So when you have a full party of eight people the game becomes unplayable.  I know they are using Ultima IV to promote their new game on the loading screen.  I would encourage people not to invest in either as the time sink isn't worth it in Ultima IV and I don't trust the game they are trying to sell on the Ultima load screen if they won't fix Ultima.  C'mon guys it can't be that hard!
keywords: Ultima IV: C64, Elite Systems Ltd, Games, Role Playing, Entertainment, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Ultimate Arctic Simulator
description: Survive the arctic in your newest adventure as a powerful Polar Bear, adorable Seal, or a stealthy Snow Leopard! Choose from TEN PLAYABLE ANIMALS! Hunt down food in the frosty tundra, raise your family, and unlock exciting playable animals as you experience life in a tranquil yet dangerous Arctic! Download the Ultimate Arctic Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time! Brand New Features REALISTIC SIMULATOR You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy while ruling over the Arctic tundra! TEN PLAYABLE ANIMALS Choose from your favorite species of arctic animals in a single game! Become a Polar Bear, Seal, Lynx, Penguin, Moose Snow Leopard, Bighorn Sheep, Siberian Husky, Snowy Owl, and a Walrus! Each species has their own families, experience, and levels! DANGEROUS BOSS BATTLES Test your skills against SIX new boss battles! A massive mythical ape lurks in the redwoods! A dangerous canine predator with razor sharp teeth awaits his prey in his den! BUILD YOUR FAMILY Dominate other animals or bring them a treat to recruit them to your family! Customize and play as any animal in your pack and create a powerful family! RAISE YOUR BABIES Breed babies that will grow into powerful members of your family! Care for you babies while they are are young, finding food for them and carrying them in your mouth! CUSTOMIZE YOUR ANIMAL Choose your animal’s name, appearance, skills, and attributes to complement your pack members and become a more powerful group! LEVEL UP YOUR ANIMAL Gain experience by catching and eating your prey, escaping predators, caring for your family, and completing missions! Level up your animal to increase their health and attack damage, earn points to upgrade your stats, and increase the size of your pack! EARN STAT POINTS Stat Points can be used to provide bonus’s to traits like Health, Critical Attack Chance, Run Speed, and much more!  UPGRADEABLE BUFFS Buff Points can be used to upgrade your Hiss and Roar Buffs, which create temporary Stat Boosting auras around your animal when active!  RAGDOLL PHYSICS Your prey now realistically dangles from your jaws as you carry and drag them! DYNAMIC WEATHER AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE Procedural weather system with unique storms, clouds, sun, and stars! MASSIVE REALISTIC 3D ENVIRONMENT Explore a world so big we created TWENTY FOUR unique dens for your animals to live in! Hunt in the frosty mountains, build your home in the remains of dead trees, and brave freezing waters to find a comfy iceberg! DOZENS OF ENEMIES Hunt down animals like penguins, snow leopards, seals, moose, walrus, snake, fish, owl, elephant, raccoon, hawk, boar, skunk, squirrel, arctic hare, sheep, lynx, crab, deer, marlin, polar bear, dolphin, whales and many more! OPTIONAL BLOOD EFFECTS If you are of age or have your parents permission, turn on the BRAND NEW blood effects for added combat ferocity! GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases! Download the Ultimate Arctic Simulator to transport yourself into the snowy plains of the tundra and survive life as your favorite arctic animal! If you liked living in the Arctic then you'll love our other animal simulators! reviews: Absolutely amazing game. I don’t have any other game exactly like it. Could you put more breeds tho? And humans? Also, don’t make it so hard to level up because it is really Annoying. I don’t like it at all. Please fix that. I also love the dive rushing and the tap target things. Some major glitches include falling out of the earth while holding a fox. I lost all my prey and I was very frustrated. That sucked. Anyway, bai bye!  Story Time!Screech dived out of the air, Bolt and Shallow followed, their wings flapping furiously as they dived and twisted out of the owls reach. This is apparently what happened if owls found you awake and flying in the nighttime. They mobbed you. Not cool. Screech called back to his companions, “Don’t let them grasp your talons! Ready! Dive! Twist around the tree trunk then swirl up! Yes! You got that owl taken care of!” Shallow had grabbed a owl by the neck, the smallest one. It looked like this was it’s first night outside the nest. Shallow clawed at the owl furiously until it was limp. The other owls wailed in horror. Backing up until they could fly out of the dense forest. Hi love your games! This game is awesome! I’m almost to the level with the hummingbird! Just wondering for some future updates that you could try to make some humans like falcon keepers and a few houses for you to live in in a city. like a falcon cage, that you can escape from or stay, are fed in like ether a food bowl like one for birds that clasps into the cage (I love birds like parrots, so I know about these things)or a human drops some meat into the cage for you to eat, a parrot cage (just like the falcon cage except inside a human house instead of on a rooftop and you eat seeds and fruit) and a tree hole near the humans in a park in the city. ALSO CAN YOU ADD A PIGEON??? You could eat in a park and a old lady would feed you crumbs. Also CAN YOU MAKE A STORE IN THE CITY AND BULD YOUR NEST ON A BILLBOARD AND ADD A FINCH? Or if that’s too much can you make a city bird sim or a pet bird sim?PS... sorry for all these requests but I am just excited that you didn’t retire yet and I thought maybe you could use a few fresh ideas! I’m a programmer too but I am not as good as you!

name: ‎VDV Match 3 RPG: Zombies!
description: From the creators of War Of The Zombie comes a new adventure which combines match 3 puzzle action with in-depth RPG gameplay! Immerse yourself in a zombie apocalypse world as you take command of a small military base to recruit & develop survivors in an effort to combat the zombie outbreak. Hone your strategies on the combat puzzle board by matching 3 or more similar tiles to call your heroes into action, and with bigger matches come some very special weapon tiles. So with a good deal of luck and some clever strategies you'll soon be clearing the undead filled regions with your powerful squad of heroes! As you progress through the land winning ever more match 3 RPG puzzle missions, you are in full control of which stats to boost for your heroes, perhaps hand out a promotion here or there, or maybe you want to train some new recruits to join the fight against those zombies? And don't just rely on human survivors either! Your trusty familiar 'pet' class (perfect for stunning the zombie hordes) has more powerful recruits as you progress, from man's best friend to wolves, leopards, tigers and the all powerful bear! Clearing the land of the zombie outbreak is tough without the right equipment, but there's a huge supply of head gear, body & leg armor, belts, backpacks and of course awesome weapons (each class has a particular selection of weapons specialized for their needs) to be collected by completing the RPG match 3 puzzles within the missions. Or perhaps, you simply want to scavenge the regions you've already cleared? In this zombie puzzle RPG match 3 game you'll come across zombies of all shapes and sizes, even a host of different zombified animals! As the undead horde slowly make their way towards your heroic squad, decide wisely on your best match 3 combat puzzle board move as those pesky zombies have their own special abilities that can catch you out unexpectedly. But fear not, your squad have their own set of unique class skills, and if you've packed some powerful combat inventory you might just turn your squad of recruited survivors into a squad of mighty zombie slaying heroes! Join the VDV Match 3 RPG zombie puzzle battle now in glorious toon-styled 3D action! • Build & upgrade your base of operations! • Scavenge & collect +200 essential combat items, gear & weapons! • Recruit, train, level up & promote your survivors into heroes! • Choose what stats your heroes develop and whether they gain promotion! • Choose what gear & weapons your heroes use during missions! • Choose which combat items to use as mission battles unfold! • Strategize how combat unfolds by matching tiles on the puzzle board! • Discover new regions, locations & zombies in 240 replayable missions! Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/vdvmatch3rpg

reviews: I like the comic book style art and text boxes. I like the choice your own adventure style play. Story was only so-so and characters kinda cliche and uninteresting. But it was still fun. This game was really fun and interesting. I loved the illustrations. It was almost like an interactive comic book. The one drawback is that if you die you have to start the game all over again. name: ‎Vambrace: Cold Soul
description: Synopsis The King of Shades has cursed the great city of Icenaire. Now cast under a permanent blight of frost fall, its former residents have returned from the dead as mad Wraiths. Survivors take refuge deep underground where they lead a desperate campaign against this unearthly power. Woefully outmatched, they are forced into hiding as the King of Shades amasses an army of the undead above them. One fateful day, a mysterious stranger appears in the city with an enchanted vambrace. She may now be their only hope…  Gameplay You are Evelia Lyric, bearer of the Aetherbrace and the only human capable of entering Icenaire. The survivors now look to you as their best hope against the King of Shades. Only one problem...you’re woefully outmatched, and survival is not guaranteed. Vambrace: Cold Soul is a narrative-driven game filled with memorable characters, brutal challenges, and deep strategy. To succeed, you must choose perceptive party leaders, camp to recuperate, navigate strange encounters, and survive deadly combat. Will you scavenge for supplies to sell or use them to craft new items for your next expedition? The surface of Icenaire is cold and unforgiving. So, prepare your party well before departing...lest you join the cursed city's undead. In this game, the difference between life and undeath all comes down to good planning and smart tactics!  Features: - Embark on an epic fantasy-adventure spanning 7 intriguing chapters. - Complete sub-quests to unlock up to 26 new, thematic character skins. - Assemble your party from 5 races and 10 unique classes of recruits. - Craft items and armor from precious materials gathered on your trips. - Make crucial decisions where one wrong turn can seal your party's fate. - Prepare well or condemn your comrades to permanent death. - Find codex pages to expand upon Ethera's history and mythical lore. name: ‎Vigil RPG
description: One of the top 10 JRPGs available on iOS! - TouchArcade, 2018 Vigil RPG is an 8-bit-style premium RPG where every battle involves interesting decision-making! Take on the role of a solo hero on a quest to discover the hidden cause behind the sudden appearance of marauding bands of goblins and monsters! NEW FOR 2019: VIGIL RPG SPECIAL 5TH ANNIVERSARY EDITION - Huge free update!  • Now a Universal app! Play on your iPad, iPad Mini, or iPad Pro in full resolution! • Beautiful high resolution support for all iPhone sizes, from iPhone SE to the iPhone 11 Pro Max! • Bo the Bartender has tons of new advice, commentary, and humor! Tap him at the tavern for more tips! • Added a new early-game boss! What manner of creature awaits you at the Northern Hills farmstead? • Added local high scores for quests! Challenge your best times from prior playthroughs! • Redesigned several enemies, making Vigil RPG’s trademark interesting non-boss battles even more interesting! • Polished and enhanced graphics and sounds! Delight your senses with primitive 8-bit-era media! • Reworked the hero’s ultimate “Finisher!” ability to be even more devastating! • Added new unique music for many bosses and dungeon areas! Vigil RPG features that you may come to wish that every game had: • Created by a one-person development team with a design goal of maximum FUN -- not maximum monetization!  Vigil RPG has no IAPs, ads, stamina timers, or even "leave us a review!" nags. If it's not fun, it didn't make the cut. • Meaningful decision-making in every combat -- even vs. non-boss enemies! Every enemy has unique attack patterns and "tells" for a clever player to overcome. Healing is hard to come by outside of town, so efficient gameplay is important and rewarding. • Fast turn-based combat! Select an action and launch each combat round in a single tap -- no menus to navigate through. Each round takes about a second to play out. Zip through battles quickly against easy enemies, and take time to consider your strategy vs. tougher foes! • No annoying tropes common to console-port RPGs! No imprecise on-screen D-pad; just tap your destination to move. No save points, or manual saving; your progress is continually auto-saved, even mid-battle.
reviews: I bought this as soon as I saw the graphics. This is old school all the way - even fown to the single developer working alone, just like those Atari 800 games I loved in the 1980s.The gameplay is simple (which I love), the goals are clear, the music is GREAT, and the graphics - perfect!  I don't like ultra-real 3D scenery except in racing games.  Loved the goatee on my character too.  I am happy with graphics just like these.  Loads of similarities to the original Wizardry (the "stables - free!" Was a giveaway), which again is a great thing.  I wish we had the original Wiz for iPhone...The price is very reasonable, I appreciate the developer's efforts (I read the credits, Jon!) and am going to enjoy finishing this little gem. Hi, Catman! Thanks for the review! You're exactly right: That very first Wizardry game for the PC all the way back in the '80s was a big formative influence on me, and it was fun to get to pay homage to it in Vigil RPG. :-) One of my absolute favorites. The graphics are budget, & the adventure is on the short side, but this is one of the most advanced & innovative games around. It's the RPG equivalent of an old school hot rod: strip away all the excess weight, supercharge the engine, then tune & balance it all to  perfection. The "engine" in this case is the combat system, and it's a nitro burning beast. I wholeheartedly recommend Vigil to anyone considering it, and I sincerely hope that AggroMagnet brings more games like this to market. Hey Discostallion, thanks for the super kind words! You pretty much nailed exactly what I was going for when I decided to make Vigil RPG: A fun and engaging combat system -- which is, after all, the bulk of what you spend your time doing when you play any RPG -- and just enough decent graphics, sound, and story around all of that to make it work. There's no sequel in the works as of right now, but if I once again get the itch to play a certain type of game that I can't find on the App Store -- as I did when I wanted to play a game like Vigil RPG, couldn't find one, and decided to make it myself! -- your kind words about enjoying Vigil RPG will be a big motivating factor! Thank you! I purchased this app after reading your interview on making a one-man game. Thanks for putting so much awesome info in the credits/acknowledgements. It is definitely challenging but also a lot of fun to play! I'll definitely buy your next game! Hey, MikeTMorpheus! I'm glad you liked reading the interview I did with TouchArcade; it was my first time doing something like that! As a solo developer, I did take advantage of many graphics and music assets that other folks had kindly posted online under Creative Commons and similar licenses, and I definitely wanted to make sure each and every one of those folks got credit for the cool stuff they had created! I really appreciate the review! :-)
keywords: Vigil RPG, Jonathan Schneider, Games, Role Playing, Adventure, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

reviews: I have had this game for a while now. I still really enjoy it but I think it has gotten a tiiiiny bit stale. We need some sort of new thing to do like new bosses or something like research we can have an adventurer do to up production times/get better loot/make stronger weapons. Also wouldnt mind a UI update. The game is really good, little bit of crafting mixed with arena and auto combat dungeons. Only problem is that it won't connect to the network. I have already had 3 times where I would have payed real money for characters, but the game won't connect to network to authorize payments.

name: ‎Weapon Battle
description: A world from another dimension The battle will start in the location you’ve chosen Gain and create countless blueprints You can go into battles using the weapons you’ve created  Develop mines and recruit miners to collect various minerals  You can learn and enhance various skills  Meet and greet the mysterious guests who visit you  Deliver the weapons your customers want and earn gold ◆ Game Features ◆ ▷ Tap the screen to create various weapons ▷ Open a forge in a location you want ▷ Win battles and get various blueprints ▷ Acquire skills with various characteristics ▷ Items that are suitable with the skill characteristics ▷ Hire miners to your mine to extract minerals  ▷ Indie game developed by 1 person
reviews: This is a fun game to play once you start to realize what is going on. Without any explanation I’m game, I almost deleted the game in the beginning since it seemed a bit boring. However, I gave it a second chance and am quite pleased. There are still a few things I don’t understand like what benefit upgrading your miner has. You can tell the developer wanted to make a good game and put time into it which is why I gave it 5*. There are no ads unlike a lot of developers that have ad heavy games. It is a fun game to spend a little bit of time in. It does get a bit repetitive but other than that, it is good.  Give it a try, you might be spending a little bit of time on it too The game looks nothing like the pictures. Everything 3D in the game is just a white silhouette on a black background and the smithy is just a gold-colored, almost formless mannequin. The app info says that my iPad is compatible so I know it’s not a problem on my end.Edit: thanks for the response. Will look forward to future updates.
keywords: Weapon Battle, Blue-island, Games, Role Playing, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Warzone Military Strategy Game
description: Warzone: Strategy War Games is the best war strategy game on mobile. Rise with your alliance as a world conqueror in this game of war, warfare & invasion. Attack now Commander! Build your army, navy & airforce. Grow your military empire, prepare your war heroes and call your war friends on duty. Attack enemies, wage epic war, but most importantly use your war strategy, tactics to outsmart your enemies and destroy them.   An addictive war game with missions, special ops, assignments, pvp battleground, alliances and lot more free strategy games.    Command your military empire, plan your tactics and lead to victory in this world at war. Become a world conqueror in this mmo rpg styled strategy game.   Commander! Join the battleground and experience the best strategy war game on mobile. World War is about to begin. Lead your army and conquer the world. We have designed new strategic battles, new troops and special units. Command the strongest ally forces! Conquer the world at war!. Classic strategy war game, with click-based tactical operation! A World War RPG game. Use your tactics, command your battles and win this mmo strategy game! WARZONE: WORLD WAR GAME FEATURES:   MISSIONS - Battle against STORM who are trying to take over the world. ASSIGNMENTS - Complete Assignments to Rank up Captains and command more Units into your battles. SPECIAL OPS - Destroy the enemy forces and earn huge rewards in Special Operations. BATTLEGROUND - Rage epic battles against other players, loot resource mines and attack storm outposts in Battleground. Show off your military power to the world at war. CAPTAINS - Recruit captains and rank them up to command massive armies into epic war against other players in battleground. MERCENARIES - Hire war heroes, mercenaries to assist the army into epic battles against other players. UNITS - Deploy and command massive military forces into this war zone of Free World War Game. Choose strategically from a variety of modern army, navy, air force and missile units. BASE - Build and upgrade your base to level up units and gain superior firepower. DEFENSES - Deploy defense to protect your base from enemy attacks. HOSPITAL - Heal your units and be ready for war at all times in this warzone. BANK - Safeguard your loot in the bank and invest into growing your military edge over others. MISSILES - Deploy missiles to take down defense and wage a tactical and intelligent global war. INCOME PROPERTIES - Manage your economy and upkeep by buying various income properties. MILITARY DRILLS - Perform various drills and keep your units at maximum stats to dominate the action in war zone game. SKILLS - Improve your war strategy with allocating skill points tactfully. REVENGE - Take revenge from battlelog on all those who attacked your base or even dared to attempt an attack. ALLIANCE - Choose your war friends, allies to join the journey to conquer the world. LEADERBOARDS - Show the world your power and supremacy by competing on live leaderboards in the best strategy games.   Team up with your war friends from around the world. Define your battlecry and play this online mobile war game to experience the power to kill & destroy in this free war game.   A unique and best war game to conquer all war strategy games fans! Get ready to answer the call of war in this strategy rpg game.   For any feedback or support, please reach us at support@tinytactics.in Privacy Policy: https://www.tinytactics.com/privacy-policy-and-legal Terms of Service: https://www.tinytactics.com/terms-of-services
reviews: Just to tell you I am no bot ok this game is a game I haven’t played in awhile I have played Lords mobile,Clash of clan and other military games but everyday single time I try those game they have the same style oh you can use your base to build stuff on the land and go out of your base to attack other bases no that is over use but this game is different you can attack people who are online that is what makes it fun This game is totally awesome but the only thing wrong with it is that once you level up and progress in the game you stop getting real ppl available for attack in battlefront and only bots, in other words once you get better your only fighting bots which is rlly boring plus theirs like no one on my server I’m like one of the only ppl still active and I spent money so I don’t know what to do, please fix just add more players please thanks. Seems ok..If you have ever played Mafia wars? Welp pretty much same mechanics..So pretty simple to play and not outrageous in the sense that you have to spend! Although I’ll spend money on a game I love..To early to say I love this game yet *********1hour later update***************** haha 5 stars for 25 gold! Prob 4.5 stars so far! Pretty cool game actually! If you like again Mafia wars or games like it..JRock review!

reviews: Since there is no support for IOS yet I will add my issues to this review. The game has several glitches that have arose lately. First, I bought the growth pack and now it tells me I need to buy the growth pack to get growth rewards, but it also won’t let me buy the growth pack again. Stupid. Second, I can’t build anything anymore, so there is no way to progress my account from the point it’s at. Until this is fixed I’m stuck. Third, when you try to contact support, in game or by email, nothing happens. I like this game, fix the issues and I will give a higher rating. Thank you. I would give it 5 stars but then the update. Great graphics, challenging play, and many different things you can do within the game. I was having a lot of fun with this game and then came the update. After the update it took 20-30 minutes of having to go through the tips, again. The game drops during fights. All my warriors lost their skill levels which took a lot of gold and time to level up, and now have to do it again. Very disappointed.

name: ‎XCOM 2
description: Earth has changed. Before you buy, expand this description to check the system requirements below. Twenty years have passed since world leaders offered an unconditional surrender to alien forces. XCOM, the planet’s last line of defense, was left decimated and scattered. Now, in XCOM 2, the aliens rule Earth, building shining cities that promise a brilliant future for humanity on the surface, while concealing a sinister agenda and eliminating all who dissent from their new order. Only those who live at the edges of the world have a margin of freedom. Here, a force gathers once again to stand up for humanity. Always on the run, and facing impossible odds, the remnant XCOM forces must find a way to ignite a global resistance, and eliminate the alien threat once and for all. reviews: I bought the app store version of the game with all down load content available on the app store. The game is a nice update to XCOM. It does take a newer machine to run the game. I am on a 13’ MacBook pro 2016 and for me it runs fine. I don’t expect to use the highest graphic settings. I am a fan of strategy games that I can stop and take my time to make a move. I do think there are too many missions in which everything is timed. I do like the how customized I can get on my soldiers. On average, I complete the game at around 30 hours. You also need to plan the rooms on the Avenger. Limited space makes your choices feel as if they matter. If you liked XCOM, you most likely will love this update.As for the download content, everything is available but the Chosen expansion pack. For those of us who bought this version and want to play the Chosen pack, the developer as stated that you should contact them directly. Don’t post here about the issue. Get in touch with them, they worked with me and took care of me. They met and exceeded my expectations. Its the same game, but with some twists.  I don’t mind this at all as I have played in every level many times and never got tired of it.  The way tp build a base, to admin your resources and all makes this game very enjoyable.If you liked XCOM franchise, you probably will like this one too. Expect addictment.Do note, that those that put a bad rating, do it with hate because they could not run the game.
keywords: XCOM 2, Feral Interactive Ltd, Games, Role Playing, Strategy, mac apps, app store, appstore, applications, itunes

name: ‎Xanje
description: Xanje is a casual virtual pet game and community.   ALL THE PETS Xanje is unique from other virtual pet games in that each of our over dozens of species and over 2,000 patterns have thousands of different color combinations. It is extremely rare that two pets look identical. Xanje allows you to collect as many pets as you want, and grow, breed, or quest with them. Unlike other pet sites, you do not have to worry about your pets starving and dying if you do not feed them. We encourage players to collect to their hearts content! MEET NEW FRIENDS We have members from all over the globe, so there's always someone online to chat with. Post in our public forums, or use our built-in private messenger to communicate.

name: ‎Ys Chronicles II
description: After a hard fight to recover the six sacred books in Ys Chronicles I, Adol is back for a sequel! Ys II -- also known as Ys II: Ancient Ys Vanished – The Final Chapter -- is an action-packed, heroic fantasy JRPG game that immerses you in a beautiful Japanese artistic universe. After defeating Dark Fakt, you (as Adol) must continue your quest to unravel the island’s secrets. Use your sword skills, wield new weapons, and for the first time discover magic to free the legendary city of Ys from evil. With your unfailing determination, you must restore hope to a land besieged by demons and weakened by despair! Featuring an epic, enchanting soundtrack, a rich, poetic atmosphere with beautiful artistic direction, and a deep story, Ys II uses the same “BUMP” system as its predecessor, requiring you to attack enemies by pouncing on them. This fighting style equates to more intuitive, more dynamic touch gameplay!  • Easy-to-master gameplay • Hint system • Choose between three soundtracks: Chronicles, Original, and PC-88 • Two game modes: Adventure and Time Attack • Two graphics modes (available in Adventure mode only): Chronicles and Original • Four difficulty levels • Achievements • HD Menus • Virtual Pad and joystick support • New artifacts, weapons, and armor • Numerous spells to defeat your enemies with • No ads, no in-app purchase, no hidden costs! Enjoy the full content! Continue your adventure in the Ys universe with this epic sequel to the godfather of all Japanese action-RPGs! Enjoy this mobile version anywhere, anytime -- no Internet connection required!
reviews: I've played the Nintendo DS version of the Ys I/II Chronicles, and this is a faithful port of that amazing version.  Beautiful graphics and sound (although I prefer the TurboGrafx-16 music over any other version, sad that it was not available as a music option) and lots of fun to play again.If I could change one thing, it would be to add a FIXED gamepad on the screen.  They do have the option for a "fixed pad" but it can be anywhere on the screen.  Too much freedom in that has led me to trouble many times, and I know I'm not the only one who had this comment.Otherwise, brilliant game and I hope they bring some of the other Ys games to iOS!  Well done.  😊 Love all things Ys, except this (chronicles) port—which I now despise. On a platform with d-pads and buttons chronicles is epic, the mobile ports however (what with having to drag your finger around and/or mash spots in the corners) is unplayable garbage for anyone with hands larger than an eight year old thanks to how easy it is for said actions to obscure ones field of view—which typically results in repeated death during boss fights (to the point of rage).My review: this/these port(s) should be buried in the desert next to NES ET.

name: ‎Yama Medieval age fantasy SRPG
description: Leo lived in the West Wind Kingdom, the west most country in this continent. Everything was perfect until one day, the Southern River Village was attacked by monsters. Leo and his fellows fought and saved their village. However, as the investigation went deeper and deeper he realized a big conspiracy behind... In this game you will control Leo and his fellows to fight for the country. You will play in turns with the computer, by applying proper strategies and items you should be able to defeat any strong enemy you encounter. There are 5 careers you can play with: Swordsman, Light Cavalry, Bowman, Thief, Cleric and Mage. Each of them can upgrade to the next career when reaching certain levels. Swordsman -> Fighter -> Hero Light Cavalry -> Heavy Cavalry-> Horse Guards Bowman -> Hunter-> Archer Thief -> Bandit -> Assassin Cleric -> Priest -> Bishop Wizard -> Mage -> Arch Mage Each career has advantages and disadvantages. Swordsman has an advantage over Bowman, Bowman has an advantage over Cavalry and Cavalry and advantage over Swordsman. This rule is very useful and should be applied in the battle. Each career has unique spells and it's important to use the spells wisely. There are 3 types of attack spells: fire, water and earth. You also need to considering the landscape when playing this game. It will affect the movement, the spells to use, etc. There's a lot more for you to explore. I hope you will enjoy playing this game. Thanks for reading!
reviews: Honestly the game has neat concept and it makes you use your brain, and does this all while being addictive in a way where you wanna play more but you can also put it down. The visuals are simplistic, but stylish in a retro theme. My two problems with the game are that it has no audio, not even music, and it has no leave or restart level options which in a trial and based game is essential. name: ‎You are Hope
description: #1 Role playing game in 24 countries so far! "You are Hope" is based on an earlier version of a PC game called "ONE HOUR ONE LIFE", made by Jason Rohrer. It's not the same game though. You are Hope's gameplay and online worlds are separate from OHOL's, and the emphasis is more on the need to collaborate peacefully with other players in order to survive and evolve. Your task is to rebuild civilization from scratch, together with other players and across countless generations. One important thing you do in this game is to name your children (who are also players). "You are Hope" is what a mother would say when she gives the name 'Hope' to her baby. You are born either as a baby to one of the other players, or as a young woman if no suitable mother is found. Every minute of real time is one year in the game and your maximum age is 60 years. A single life is limited, but the things you make during your lifetime are left for your children and grandchildren once you are gone. Try to make life a little bit easier for those who come after you, so your family line will have a chance to prosper for generations to come. Sometimes you will spawn alone in the wilderness. You need to build a fire to stay warm and trap rabbits to get meat and furs for clothes. A sharp stone may be your best friend in the beginning. Try to find a good spot to settle and grow some food, because other players may soon arrive as your children, and will need to be taken care of until they are grown enough to help you. Sometimes you will be born in a sprawling city, with farmers, cooks, blacksmiths, shepherds and hunters. There will be clothes and equipment ready for you, prepared by players who may be your grandparents or distant relatives. Maybe you will gather some friends and set out to start a settlement of your own, maybe you will inherit a farm job from your uncle, or maybe you will slay bears and wolves. The choices are endless, but remember: unless you leave the world better after you have lived than when you arrived, you have not really achieved anything. Every life you play will put you in contact with new players. Some are more experienced than you, some are less. Some will teach you and some will learn from you. Some may even be disruptive to the civilization you are building, and will need to be dealt with accordingly. It will be up to you and your fellow players to shape the world for a brief moment in time, before the following generations take over. After your game life is over, you can look at your family tree and see how your descendants are doing. You can take pride in each of your younger relatives who survives into adulthood and in each new generation that follows you, knowing that you helped make it happen.
reviews: This is a game that many are on the fence about getting. I saw the pc version and gave this a try. Well worth the measly $5. However I will say I wish you could come back as a relative if your own to continue progress when you die. The game does seem to lose its touch without being able to further progress after a while. One a happier note, Being so simple it is surprisingly addictive this game is one of the best not only on mobile but in general. To attempt to live and create a meaningful contribution to your offspring and build off of the legacy your parents lay out for you is an amazing and different idea and actually difficult to accomplish at times. 4/5 stars only because you have no way to continue your achievements. This is honestly the best mobile game I’ve ever played. Especially if are trying to kill an hour or so. The only drawback I could see is that it is a complicated game and much too complicated to get the full experience on mobile. The PC version(20$), which is the same version as the mobile, has much more to offer. I believe this mainly has to do with the player count. That’s not to say I haven’t spawned in some cool cities on mobile. I have, but they are always so much further behind than the mega cities on PC. The best lives I’ve had on mobile I’ve been an Eve or generation 2-3, developed something decent and died, only to never spawn there again. This, I attribute to the lack of player base, because the locations and places around the villages where sustainable long term. I have even lived full lives as a female with only having 1-2 sons. And even had 0 children before. But in summary this game is great no matter the platform. TLDR:Being an eve or a daughter/son of one is a very fun and rewarding experience(usually). This will happen far more often on mobile due to lower server populations. Buy the game and fix that problem. Or just play the PC version. But seriously get both. This game rocks. This is a phenomenal game, so phenomenal that you will quickly want to buy the desktop version, which is 20$. Me and 2 of my friends did just that and now this feels like a waste of 5$. The full game is definitely worth 25$ but still. There are no content differences between mobile and desktop but as good as the controls on here are they can never compare to the ease of a mouse, also the desktop version has a larger player base so you can be a part of more advanced civilizations more often, AND afaik you can only spawn with your friends on the desktop version with twin and triplet codes. Actual review: beautiful graphics, infinitely replayable, steep learning curve because of how deep the crafting system is, a coop dynamic like I’ve never experienced before - you really need to rely on others and they rely on you to survive and thrive really different than any multiplayer game I’ve ever played. It’s very fun and I highly recommend it. This game could be described like a less-casual Minecraft with a much deeper multiplayer coop aspect.
keywords: You are Hope, Wereviz, Games, Simulation, Role Playing, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎You. Me. Heaven.
description: Crazy and surreal point-and-click-adventure about the anguish of a former bully. Tova used to be a real bully back in school, many years ago. One day a strange shadow knocks her door and brings back a slice of her dirty past. ”You. Me. Heaven.” is a classic point-and-click-adventure, a pitch black surreal comedy, with two playable protagonists; The former bully Tova, and the bullying victim ”The new girl”.  Visit the fearsome Castle Death Spider(tm), meet lots of zany characters, play rock paper and scissors against an evil warlock, participate in the surreal family show ”Guests with chests”, find out what’s behind the secret door in Tovas basement (but there IS no basement… or is there?), go beyond space and time to a secret alternative dimension… and make choices that shapes the story and it’s resolution. This is not a game about heroes. This is a game about a shy bullied girl, and about a former bully’s journey through anguish and remorse. ”You. Me. Heaven.” is an independent follow-up on the critically-acclaimed surreal point-and-click-adventure ”You. Me. Hell.”, but doesn’t require you to have played the first game first. ”You. Me. Heaven.” is not a game for kids. It contains strong language, violence and gore, zombies, weapons, flesh eating bacteria, sad dolls, Dala-horses, pumpkins and lots of pitch-black lethal humor. If you get stuck, check the full walkthrough at: http://www.biscuitplacebo.com/you_me_heaven/you_me_heaven_-_walkthrough.txt
reviews: I absolutely love these games, I played them in years ago and every now and then I will replay them and can’t seem to find the very first one of us game. But either way it is the best point and click games that I’ve ever played from the App Store, absolutely love them and the replay value is amazing. Biscuit placebo is such a wonderful company and I know it is just that one developer but please make more amazing work I will pay! This game changed all of my perspective on how actions and all the things i say can change someones life, and how their reactions can change mineOne of the best games ive ever played, i wish jens would make more games of this kindI really loved the story and i would encourage you too play it, it could change the way you see yourself and others If you love point and click games then you will love this one. Very creative. Funny story line. Best of all it's free even though I would play. I hope they make another one soon. FYI play them in order so you can understand the storyline you won't be disappointed.

name: ‎Yesterday Origins
description: ***To celebrate the release of Yesterday Origins, for a limited time only, you can get up to 33% off the game!*** DISCOVER A VISUAL STYLE ADVENTURE GAME AND ORIGINAL STORYLINE, TOUCHED BY THE UNIQUE DARK HUMOR THAT MADE PENDULO STUDIOS' SUCCESS, CREATORS OF THE RUNAWAY SERIES! Solve puzzles and immerse yourself in a challenging quest full of unexpected turns! -------- It's 1481. You play a young John who is publically humiliated and dragged through the street. Under suspicion of witchcraft, he is imprisoned by the Spanish Inquisition to be tortured. Later, he undergoes an alchemical transformutation making him immortal. But not everything goes to plan. As a result, after each resurrection, John completely loses his memory. 500 years later, in the present day, John is living in Paris with Pauline, his immortal partner. Together they are searching for an artefact that is needed to reproduce the ritual so John will never forget who he is again. During their investigation, they will have to solde mysteries from the past and face dangerous protagonists who want to steal their secrets...  Join immortals John Yesterday and Pauline Petit in Yesterday Origins. Experience an epic adventure through time and across the world in a story full of intrigue and unexpected twists. FEATURES: * Pendulo Studios: over 20 years of story driven adventure gaming experience * An original storyline through different time periods: medieval and modern  * An adventure mixing several genres: investigation, thriller, history and the occult * A violent and mature plot * Dark offbeat humor * Gorgeous digital environments paintings * 3D graphics boost the good old "Pendulo's touch" * A beautiful original soundtrack * Fully dubbed in English Who said Immortality was eternal? ---------- Follow us on social networks: Facebook: facebook.com/microids/ Twitter: twitter.com/Microids_off Instagram: instagram.com/microids_official/
reviews: A vast improvement on the original game.  The story goes back and forth between the ancient past and the present, effectively telling the “Origin” (which would have made the first game way more easier to follow) while coinciding with the continuation/resolution of the main story.  Everything that was vague or confusing about the first game is cleared up rather nicely, which lets you appreciate this game a great deal more. The gameplay and animation is far smoother, and the voice acting is terrific.  The “focus” is a little wonky when inspecting items/people, but it’s more of a distraction than a hindrance.  Needing to switch back & forth between multiple protagonists is a fun gameplay mechanic, although the timing toward the end could have been a little better. The black/adult humor is still there, and it never seems forced.  Also, the game is MUCH longer than the original.  Some of the puzzles will be a bit frustrating to even seasoned adventure gamers, and the “dialogue trees” could stand some improving.However, all in all this is a great game that I would recommend to anyone.  One of those sequels that you wish you could have played without needing bother with the subpar original. Played first game and loved it, but it was a bit short, or more like what most point and click games turn out to be 4-5 hours. But this game was .99¢ and I played for at least 12 hours, it is an amazing game, I barely had any crashes, maybe 2 the entire game.One thing to know both games are adult oriented games, and have extremely dark subject matter, but I love that type of a game, so this was perfect for me. First game and this one are you playable without the other game, also though origins does a great job of reiterating what happened in the first game, just to give new players a starting point. For reals this is an amazing piece of work, for a 8-12 hour game(depending on how much dialogue you want to read) it is never tedious, and storytelling/script is just amazingly well done. Just buy it already you won’t be sorry. If I had any cons, it would be they didn’t explain the mechanics all that well, but after looking at a walkthrough for the first main puzzle I had it figured out, and didn’t need the walkthrough anymore, just a bit of a unique of an approach to the puzzle problem solving, and the developers could have explained it a bit better.  SPOILERS....You have to find sometimes upto 4 objects, or ideas, and then use them all to solve a problem, or is really fun once you figure it out, and it is used a bunch so you have to figure it out lol, have fun I have been enjoying this game more than almost any adventure game I've played - it's up there with the classics for me. I especially like that it is not as violent as the first Yesterday, though there's some disturbing content implied in the flashbacks. Graphics are gorgeous, puzzles v intuitive (little need for walk through, this is a game that makes you feel smart), and the story is genuinely engaging in itself. But ... it crashed every 30 minutes or so for a while, and now it's up to every 2 minutes and is thus unplayable. Please fix, I really would love to finish!
keywords: Yesterday Origins, Microids, Games, Adventure, Role Playing, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Yokai Tamer
description: “Yokai Tamer” is a super popular Japanese style MMOARPG mobile game that has a very competitive playing style and beautiful Japanese art style, with hundreds of popular Japanese voice actor and an original fantasy story, giving you a pleasant experience while playing the game. As the game has exciting gameplay, gorgeous art style and a strong team of voice actors, it received a very good rating from the players when the game was released in Japan. The game was set on a fantasy background, it was said in the legend that when the twilight falls, it is also the crossing point of Yin and Yang, the demons and Shikigamis have been released into the human world, so the Onmyojis that protect the land will repel the invading demons by controlling the spirits, protecting the peace of the world!   [Game Features]  ----Gorgeous Artwork, Top-class Voice Actor----  ”Yokai Tamer” has the best Voice Actor from Japan and China, giving you the best experience in this world of Yin and Yang! Other than that, the beautiful scenery of ancient Kyoto has been thoughtfully remade by our designer, providing a pleasant trip to ancient Japan.   ----World Ranking, Who will be the best----  The Peak Arena will have Onmyojis from different places, who will conquer the arena? Also, the World Championship will also be held, Onmyojis from all around the world will gather and compete to be the best, who will be the strongest Onmyoji in Kyoto?   ----Command Shikigami, Seal Demons----  Collect soul shard of Kamigami to summon it as your Shikigami, Shikigami has two different stats——transformation and deployment, as well as a certain element of their own, such as water, wind, fire, thunder, etc. Collect your Shikigami and turn the tides of battle!   ----Guild Community, Your Second Family----  Team up together on an adventure where you and your friends fight bosses, defeat powerful monsters and many more~ The guild station provides a warm place where you and your friend can spend time and chat together~^^~   ----Find Your Destined One and Forever Love----  Join festival, dance party, guild quest and many more together with your loved one. There is also couple-exclusive action, as well as a secret place only for the two of you.   ----Unique Baby System, Raise Your Own Kids----  The cute baby system is here, foster your own baby with your loved one, and watch the baby change appearance as they level up! You can even bring them along your adventure and battle once they have grown up!  We welcome any questions about the game, feel free to contact us anytime! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EyouYT/ Support: support@eyougame.com Website: http://yokaitamer.eyougame.com/
reviews: It is so easy to level up in this game that purchasing items isn’t a necessity unless you want to b the best of the best immediately. I’ve been playing for 30 minutes and have already obtained some top gear and have also reached level 80 due to the game’s willingness to make reaching level 75 a breeze. Every mobile game needs to adopt this model because it only makes you appreciate the developer’s desire to make the game fun and friendly and deserving of some monetary support. This game will not disappoint anyone in my opinion. It is new but is already a must-have for any mobile gamer - new or old- who wants a fun mobile gaming experience. This is what’s wrong with mobile “game” developers. They think that just having a character running around means it’s a video game. It is not. A video game is something that you have agency and investment in due to its gameplay. Keyword here being gameplay. This “game” does not have gameplay. I “played” for a total of 10 minutes, reached level 52, fought 5 bosses all under 20 seconds long... all by just pressing the auto button. All quests are carried out automatically. All battles are automatic. You don’t play this game. This is just mobile developers trying to make something LOOK like a video so they can get your money via micro transactions. They want you to feel like it’s a cool game by being all flashy and dangling all the different costumes in front of you so you can buy them. All to hide the fact that this isn’t a game at all. These kind of stickers games and these kind of developers should be banned from making and publishing crap like this that only targets children for money. Should be illegal. You developers reading this, yes you who make this kind of crap for a living, you should take a look in the mirror and be ashamed of yourselves. I really love this game because it’s like Very artistic and usally I don’t like games and i just delete them after like  5 minutes of playing it but this game is probably one of the first games that I really like 1.Its very artistic has 4K graphics to me if you ask me maybe not other people. 2. I love the love the characters and half of the world or maybe even 80% of the world loves and this is like a anime game and your playing it with 4K I just really love the game really do love the person who made this game Requires iOS 8.0 or later. name: ‎YooHoo & Friends: Doctor Games
description: Hey! YooHoo and his friends speaking. Our neighbor animals got sick and we must help them! We won't make it without you, and that's why you must embark on a journey with us! You will be able to treat the most exotic animals from all around the world! There are 10 characters waiting for you, and they keep on getting different illnesses; there will also be 5 places where you can go together with YooHoo and his friends! It's your chance to become a true doctor! Put on a medical cap, pack the medical kit and let's play! Being a doctor is, undoubtedly, difficult, but in this game anyone will be able to master this profession, including the smallest users! Learn to treat different illnesses! You will find out: - how to treat a runny nose; - what to do if you get a lump; - how to treat fever; - what to do if your ears or eyes are sore; and many other things! Meet interesting animals! You will head for Eurasia, Australia, Africa, North America, and even the Antarctic! Can you just imagine what exotic animals live in places like these? Pandas, penguins, hippos, polar bears... there's everyone! Play cool minigames! What games, you might ask? Here they are: - fly the hoverboard with YooHoo! Fly and overcome all the obstacles! - play hide-and-seek with Pammee and her friends! - a minigame with Lemmee where you'll need to feed all the animals with fruit, but be careful not to let them eat something inedible! - make presents with Roodee's cool gadget - a high tech pen! - a minigame with Chewoo: she's now a photographer and needs you to help her take pictures of the animals! Or course we couldn't leave you with no present! Start the game, complete all the tasks, treat all the animals and get a prize! Are you ready to set out on an exciting adventure around the world and treat everyone? YooHoo is on his way to save lives, and you? reviews: This is way too fun and addicting! I haven't been this addicted to an app in forever! controls are simple and the characters are too cute! It definitely lives up to the name! The level of difficulty is great and hard/challenging (unless of course, you choose the easier difficulty). My only complaints are:1. The clothes are too pricey. (Maybe the weapons and skills, too but, at least, they're more reasonable than the clothes). I can't afford them unless, I buy in game money with real life money or play 24/7 for about 2 weeks, lol 2. The fanservice. Think about the kids! This is pretty much the ONLY cute, anime themed zombie game that doesn't have creepy zombies but, you just HAD to ruin it with panty shots and other suggestive pictures! Also, I don't like it...That aside, haha, nice references to other animes in the trophies section and hey, nice! Miku's singing in some of the levels! Cool. In my opinion this is a great game as its fun and just lots of cute girl killing fun. I mean that in the best way possible. 3rd slot really doesn't cost much just invest a little time and login everyday at least and before you know it you'll have the currency for it. Weapon prices are a bit high honestly but after playing a bit I average about 7-10k per stamina bar which is my usual break playtime at level 27. So while it might take awhile to get a new weapon it fits in nicely that I'm not just zooming through gear. Perks help a lot too they're relatively cheap at low stars.  With the perks you can get a lot more mileage out of a weapon. Currently rolling with a pure damage build with the best sniper I can use Its nicely effective and quite hilarious at times where you accidentally kill yourself by sniping a bullet reflect buffed tough zombie off screen. Kinda scared if what the Minigun will cost in non premium currency though considering the hefty 2600premium tag on it right now. Might be less than I imagine considering it is a max level weapon.

name: ‎Zombidle
description: Like the song says, good guys finish last, and in this case, they also finish homeless and on fire.  Join up with Bob our local Necromancer and his cohort of evil buddies to raise some proverbial and literal hell across the kingdom of... Good... land... Goodlandia... yeah, that's what we're going with. Use all your evilitude to ruin these poor fella's day and establish yourself as the baddest of all the badasses in your corner of the fiery pit of hell.  And if you think that doing that isn't evil enough, how about some corporate management abuse? Con your monsters into doing your work for you so you can sit back and reap the reward of their labor. Features • Various evil monsters to help you on your quest of not being a nice guy. • Gallons of skills to enable the ultimatest, deadliest sin: utter slothing. • Hordes of peaceful people to annoy and bully around. • Lots of towns to pillage and plunder for some phat loots. • Purchase some subterranean real-estate without filing the paperwork; yolo.
reviews: Enjoy playing it, very easy to catch on.  Plus if there are any adds that pop up it’s to benefit your gameplay in a big way!  Needs a bit of polishing but overall hope the Devs continue with this game. Really enjoy playing!!! I’d give it 5 stars but for the past day, every time I try to watch an ad for the devil deal, it drops me from the game and I don’t get the boost after watching the full ad. I can’t find support anywhere in the options either except the external network sites I don’t use. Obviously, they don’t read these. This issue has gotten worse. I like helping them by watching ads constantly, but when it kicks me almost every time, it’s pointless and quite annoying to have to reload every deal and still not get it after watching the full ad. I’m going to keep removing stars until I get a response or it gets fixed. This is a great game, but it’s unplayable for several days after every update. For the past week it’s said to update to the newest version even though I’m on the newest version. Once the app works again I’ll give it a 5 star, but the amount of time that this app becomes unplayable after each update is frustrating. name: ‎ZENONIA® 4
description: ZENONIA® 4: Return of the Legend, Extreme Action RPG The definitive action RPG has returned, now in glorious HD!  When an ancient evil threatens to erupt onto the world, heroes of the ages must assemble once again to change the course of destiny. Join Regret, Chael, Ecne, Lu and more to embark on the greatest ZENONIA adventure yet! THE BEST-LOOKING ZENONIA® EVER Explore the overworld in vivid HD, now with spectacular visuals and top-notch animations optimized for Retina displays. DYNAMIC AND VISCERAL COMBAT  Become a force to be reckoned with -- unleash powerful combo hits and devastating skills with explosive graphical and aural flair. GEAR UP AND CUSTOMIZE FOR EPIC ADVENTURE Choose the best strategy and equip your Slayer, Blader, Ranger or Druid class hero with countless armor options, weapons and items.  DEFINITIVE ACTION RPG EXPERIENCE Level up through Normal, Hard and Hell mode. Master the Fairy sync system and annihilate hundreds of normal and legendary monsters. CHALLENGE THE WORLD IN EXPANDED PVP Tackle asynchronous online PvP with the new 2-on-2 arena battles or compete in the Abyss zone for loot drops, and hire other player data as mercenaries. The Execution Room and classic 1-on-1 rumbles also return. NEW TITLES, NEW REVELATIONS Collect effect-boosting titles and over 40 Game Center achievements as you delve deeper into the secrets of ZENONIA®'s beloved characters. reviews: I love zenonia 4 so much i dont care about too many enemies or something the only thing is that you play for fun :) but if it could be better give it a new version or create a new game please cause i like the game so much i couldn't  help my self if you were going to give it a new version dont change anything just give it a multiplayer or something but dont change the game's backround or the characters and if you were to create a new zenonia please continue the story of chael cause i dont seem to like the zenonia 5 if theres a zen.6 please put it on the appstore and please new ver or create a new zenonia that continues the story of regret and chael but i think the main character that is suppose to be is chael's son make it great :) please please please make it happen :) ohh and one thing if you're going to create a new zenonia please make the style just like the zenonia 4 thank you I got the legendary gladiator medal and did not see a single person with a holy fairy, even with all the hackers. In other words, no one has a holy rune because you can't get one! It should be a 1/2 chance to get a darkness or holy rune over the others but it's 1/5,000,000,000 which isn't even fair! Darkness runes are nerfed and you can really only get reg defense at lower levels than 30. I've literally tried for weeks for ONE DEF DARKNESS OR HOLY RUNE! U CANT GET ANYMORE! Havent even gotten a dark extreme def. rune. So to sum it up, frost runes are terrible because they can still attack, can't get def or extreme in this. Just normal and attack rune traits and terrible for training. Then there's fire runes. Extremely weak at any level, terrible for training. It's not even cool that the most worst runes are the easiest to get. Reason being for me saying this is i get stunned and statuses every hit which is kinda really annoying. A lot of others have this same problem, everyone with the runes. Havent even gotten to hard mode and am STILL LEVEL 50 TRAINING FOR A DECENT RUNE! With all the previous updates on here that were great, and you now only updating zenonia 5, it's gotten easier to find bugs and notice how annoying they are. My first priority is to request that you balance the amount of runes of each attribute, including the ability to get holy runes. Fix this bug please! I came upon this Game while looking for a simple RPG like Maplestory which was removed from the App Store. It's a pretty decent game but the thing is that items are ridiculously expensive. One of the beginning quests in Adonis town is to buy a health potion that costs 900 gold. However after the class the reward is only about 170 gold, which is ridiculous, as it means you lose 730 gold. Even the average potion costs about 100 gold, and there is a recharge time for potions and skills, which is even more ridiculous. This might be to account for the fact that the controls are minuscule. It's quite hard to press the button you want; I usually tap about 3-5 times for the little ones, and I'm always turning in the wrong directions. There is also a pitiful lack of monster drops; I bankrupt myself trying to buy a few potions, and when I go hunt monsters they give me an average of about 10 gold, maybe, which means it's going to take a long time to save up for just a single potion. I just started playing last night, and I've already noticed all of these annoyances. Requires iOS 8.0 or later. reviews: Hello there you amazing people!!What a wonderful game!! You guys got me hooked to this game, but ever since I updated my iOS to iOS11, this game doesn’t open, asks for an update. So please please update it so we can play!!!!! It's too easy. At the beginning, it build up to a challenge nicely, but the last 20 levels or so, while intense, don't take more than concentration to score a perfect on. Also, if you do it right, you can have all the upgrades bought well before level 30.Don't buy the other " schools" thinking they're new levels, because they're not! It's just the same levels, with your scores already effective, with a new design. Disappointing on that count.That being said, it is pretty fun! Fix needed, what ever score you get on the first level is set on all add on levels. If you complete the first level/kindergarten as Perfect Score, the add on kindergartens, such as the sea one have the same score Perfect Score that you completed in the first level. And you haven't even had a chance to play them yet.  Unless this is fixed, there is no reason to buy the add on Kindergartens.Also need the option to reset the game so you can replay it over again.

name: ‎Acrylic Nails!
description: Congrats you have your own nail salon!  Time to give some hands an acrylic DIY makeover - drill, lengthen, shape, and polish some gorgeous nails.  It’s up to you to makeover nails with art and give your clients the ultimate nail spa experience. Think you’re done? To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
reviews: Let me get started by saying this game is awesome!!!😉😊😀 But like any game, sooner or later there is the flaws... 😑 But if you want to have a game with major ASMR, you should get this one, no, YOU NEED to get this one! 😃    First of all, there is the games creepy and freaky characters! Their faces are not normal and many people have left reviews on this subject already. Second of all, there is too many ads! Every time I finish a clients hand, there is an ad! I know that I can turn off my WiFi but I really want to get the extra stuff that needs ads... Third of all, I know I just reported ads, but this is for a MAJOR reason! These ads are super inappropriate for younger children who might download this game!  Fourth of all, there isn’t enough colors to put on the nail polish 💅! Please try and fix that! I’m already on level 7 and I have only been playing 3 days!!!   I would be super glad if the developers could fix these small flaws but other than that, you guys did an amazing job programming and editing this game developers and editors!!! 😊 😆 😃 So I got this app and INSTANTLY deleted it. I wasn’t even on it for five minutes. I hated it. I was generous and gave it two starts because I liked the idea of it. The first thing that aggravated me was when you finish your nail you can get double the points, only if you watch the add. I personally don’t like adds, therefore I clicked no thanks. I thought I just clicked the wrong thing, so I tried it again. After I did three nails, I was done. Also, I kept getting  the same add and it was super inappropriate. THERE WERE GIRLS WITH THEIR SHIRTS OFF! I don’t know if this was the games fault or not, but I got an earful from both of my parents. Another thing is that I wanted to decorate one nail and have the rest one color. Well, the game doesn’t work like that.  And, you can only put one thing on the nail. That’s pretty irritating. Though, I do like where the developers were trying to go with this app, but it needs a lot of fixes. I read these reviews and saw more bad ones than good ones, but I’m not the one to instantly judge the app. I downloaded it, tried it out, and hated it. I in courage you to try out the app first, but it wasn’t my “cup of tea”. Thank you for reading this. If you can, please fix some of these things. Maybe I’ll try it out when things are fixed. Have a blessed day. Ok, this app is the BOOM! But there a few problems. First, when you are done with a nail, it will ask you if you want to use an ad for an offer. But when I press no thanks, it gives me an ad anyway! Second, the people are super creepy! Know wonder they want makeovers! Please use better graphics for a better experience! Third, I want more nail colors. Unlike a few other apps, it only has like, 10 colors, and the user might not like it LIKE ME! Fourth, I know I already put this topic in, but the colors are to girly! I mean, I know it might be a random pick, but some girls like colors like green. So please put in more colors and not just in one category. Also, I might not get this correct, but aren’t you supposed to make this a realistic reality, like other simulator apps? Because this app is not really realistic according to my problems. Other than all that, this app is simply the best!
keywords: Acrylic Nails!, Crazy Labs, Games, Entertainment, Simulation, Role Playing, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎A380 Checklist
