Thank you for your support and feedback! Tell your friends about Action Strike Online! Good luck & have fun! Regards, Action Strike Team
reviews: Hey there developers! I played for a straight week and im pretty impressed not too many games catches my attention but, keep up the good work. Some things you might want to add and change the player hud's arms is kinda awkward its slightly positioned to the right instead of the middle, pretty sure that can be fixed, another thing is you could add some sights and more customizations to the character and the weapons, keep it coming! Id love to see some good changes!                           Sincerely,                            playername: EBkGhost I know I’m writing this right after an update but like finally. I’ve played this game before the first battle pass like 3-4 months before it and I’m always try to mess around in the area I’m in but none of the players r good it’s like their all bots and I could continuously kill them rake up mega kill points along with headshots and rank up faster and faster but besides that the guns, I’ve been waisted the new guns that are show cases to come out already they’ve be their since I started playing the game and their still not here, like we got more accessories for the character but the lack of guns is kinda bad like the ak maxed out is overpowered and the last smg not even leveled up it also over powered. I just want to be able to try new guns and different combos for my guns to see how I can climb the new rank system in the game. It has been well over a month than I started but it still doesn’t show how to open cases when you win them there’s no button, now out if the case part of the feedback I think trading skins in the game would be great and having trade/scam moderators, to be honest the game should have a official discord server. The game lacks content maybe if you add game modes it would be for fun for many people because teams battling it out on the small maps can get boring for most people. I know it may be hard but at least update the game every month my friend who is a solo developer use to run a game that only had him as the developer and the game had less bugs than this.
keywords: Action Strike Online, Alfa Bravo Inc., Games, Simulation, Action, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Baby Supermarket Manager - Time Management Game
description: Hey kids! Welcome to our newest time management game for kids, no matter if you are 5 or 6 years old you will love to play Baby Supermarket manager, since we have made it really easy for all kids to have fun in grocery store, in which a supermarket manager knows how to manage a grocery store all alone. So kids its your chance to become a supermarket manager & learn to manage grocery store, not only your management skills will be polished but also you will learn how to operate cash register & handle money. Baby Supermarket manager is a fast paced time management game to test your time management skills all in a speedy way. Baby Supermarket manager is an educational cashier game for young boys & girls. In Baby Supermarket manager kids can learn how to handle money as grocery store cashier mania to become the best toddler store manager in town. Kids can improve their basic math learning skills like addition & subtraction. Baby store is full of awesome shopping items like baby food, toys, section full of beautiful toddlers dresses. A supermarket manager knows how to operate the grocery cash register, serving the customers on time, so they don’t get mad on any kind of delays to get their toys, baby food & kids dresses. Baby Supermarket manager starts with a manual cash register with receipt and scanner, you have to enter the price of each grocery item and get the total. Tap on the customer to receive money. Cashier drawer will open and you can put the received money and return the balance amount to the customer. You can upgrade your manual cash register, with the automated one so you can scan each grocery list the customer brings to the counter, and ring up the price! Then accept payment via cash, credit card or through mobile NFC, and enter the total amount, followed by scanning the credit card or mobile! In this time management fun filled cash register game you can also improve your store management skills. Customers are in queue, waiting to pay money and get their grocery like toys for toddlers, food for baby & kids dresses. Baby Supermarket manager is an educational and fun game where children learn to handle money at shopping mall. It can help improve their math and calculation skills. Features: * Fast paced Time Management Cash Register Simulation. * Serve customers & make them happy to get rewards. * Modern payment methods; Credit Card Machine and NFC Mobile payments. * Unlock Point Of Sale Machine to scan grocery. * A fun filled supermarket cash register games. * Use Auto Complete Robot to get task done automatically. * Use Cool Candies to increase patience of customers. * Multiple Machines and Purchasing Items. * Cater your Clients with multifunctional machines.

name: ‎Cafe:Cooking Tale
description: One of the most wide-spread and dynamic games for the lovers of cooking is here for you. You will start with the simplest steps and will learn the basics of cooking, get acquainted with new recipes and learn how to cook traditional dishes of world cuisine easily. You will find out the rules of chef's life in a light and funny way, learn how to make your customers happy and rivers of coins will flow to the hands of the best chef in the region!   With this game you will easily learn everything what is connected with food cooking – from new modern frying pans up to completely new dishes, which you have never heard about. Stylish tableware, constant updates and creative tasks, charming helper and a whole lot of ingredients will help you win the hearts of your guests. Just a little bit and you will become a star chef, and the legends about you will spread around the world. Your regular customers will fall in love with your café and will come every day! All you need to do is cook these amazing dishes without stopping! So, are you ready to know more? Then, let's go! What is waiting for you in the game? Prepare to a huge list of cool things.   Hundreds of unique dishes!   The acquaintance with the cuisines of the whole world is your new and exciting adventure. Every new level will open up a lot of new recipes. It will make you closer to getting a rank of the best chef. You will practice cooking healthy dishes, adored by everyone. And also, being a true professional, you will learn the preferences of your regular customers and will see at once what they will want in a minute. Wonders, right?   You are a true chef!   Not only you will learn the secrets of cooking food from all the corners of the world, but you will have to make them yourself. You will learn the secrets of the recipes you already know and you can make your skills perfect. Every day you will make complicated desserts and simple salads, and everything will be simultaneously! Of course, you will have crowds of customers in your café all the time. This is just what you need for training your cooking skills.   Fancy tableware!   You will be able to equip your kitchen to the nines. The most modern steam cookers, pressure cookers, grills and stoves are being delivered to your kitchen. You will be able to update every detail of your restaurant's kitchen, getting the ingredients for your cooking for free. From cutting board up to mixer, you will have all you need, but still you can always make it better! You will equip the kitchen of your dreams, the way that any chef will hope to take a glance and admire it. Are you ready to outshine the snob professionals?   Endless customers!   Your café will always be crowded and noisy. You will try your skills not just in crafty cooking, but in a fast one too. Surely, you have already been in situations when you had to prepare a lot of dishes for the feast? Imagine that you need to do the same for the crowd of customers! On busy days or during lunch time, the entrance to your café will be busy – there will be long queues of people, ordering all and everything at the same time. The orders will pile up, and full and satisfied customers will pay the bills with joy. Isn't that a dream of any restaurant keeper? Look at the clock – it is high time to start a new life in the café!   Rush here and enjoy the chef's life. Open the door of your café today.   At your disposal:       ·  300+ levels with new tasks and dishes 250+ of unique dishes 20+ customers with different wishes and traits of character 100+ ingredients 10 theme locations with demanding customers Tasks for time, speed and skill to satisfy every customer A game with friends – everyone has to know the best chef here!     Are you ready to conquer the world with your cooking talent? Then let's meet in your café!

name: ‎C14 Dating Visual Novel
description: C-14 Dating is an otome dating sim that combines archaeology, friendships and love. You play as Melissa Flores, a 3rd year anthropology student participating in a summer archaeological internship. The field school takes place in Belgium, over 5000 miles away from your native California! Okay, it’s a little bit out of your comfort zone, and the fact you’ll be staying in an unfamiliar country for two months can be nerve-racking, but you couldn’t pass up such a learning opportunity! You get to excavate at an authentic prehistoric site, which has uncovered Neanderthal remains in the past. Maybe you’ll dig up some bones, or even unearth tools that were manufactured by early humans. And of course, you might forge friendships and find romance during your stay…
reviews: I love this game a lot and have done almost every relationship except Hendrik. It’s impossible! I’ve tried multiple different times and I just can’t get it too work! Please fix this bug so I can enjoy this game again. I rarely write reviews, but I'm making an exception for this game! It is a true pleasure to play, and I felt so smart and exotic learning all of the interesting facts about archeology and reading the French! The art was beautiful, Mel was so sweet (I loved the diabetic twist!) and the boys were all irresistible. My heart was sold out for Kyle... And then the free trial ended. I CANT purchase the rest, unfortunately, but thoroughly enjoyed the taste that I got. Sometime I hope to splurge and continue. Thanks for creating such a lovely and unique twist on the usually so clichéd dating sims. I thought the plot was good and interesting and I liked how some guys had some form of disability (like with Kyler being death). I would've liked a tad more romance in it though, like we only got the romancing towards the end. And the mini games were interesting as well, but it got to a point where it was getting too big and a bit more complicated that I just ended up skipping them. Almost wish I could've zoomed in once it got to be 15x15 squares for the cave games.
keywords: C14 Dating Visual Novel, Celso Riva, Games, Adventure, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Daily Kitten : virtual cat pet
description: Daily Kitten offers you your own cat; it's just for you. It can do anything as long you take care of it. Caress it, feed it, teach it to stay clean, play with it, put it to sleep ... you can accompany it in its dreams, dress it up the way you like and make it purr when you stroke it. To make a long story short, it's your new companion and you help it grow and have a lot of fun. FEATURES:  - Play over 10 mini-games while playing with your animal pet. You can earn gold and emerald to buy him stuff. - You can interact with your cat by taping on the screen, he will came to you to receive some petting... so cute ! - Take care of an adorable pet ! - The game is cut in 10 days. Each day your kitten grows up and can use new toys and stuffs ! -  You can take pictures of your adorable cat to share it with your friends ! - Give food to your own kitten, play ball of wool, play with a lasersight, help him to scratch his nails in cat tree, like a true kitten ! - This kitten is really realistic, you can watch him live in your house, he will move around and play with everything - Show at your friends how your kitten is beautiful ! - Make fun with your little animal and take care of it ! You can deguise him with a lot of stuff ! - There is different mission during the game. would you be able to finish everything? Daily Kitten is available in french, english, spanish, german, chinese, japanese, turkish and russian.
reviews: I love the graphics and sound effects. The games are fun and I like watching my pet grow! I do have a few issues though, some of which I suspect are just glitches. The first is that I'm challenged to bid 12 stars at the slot machine but there is ZERO functionality to change your bet from five stars. I've tried everything. The second is that one of my challenges is to get 10,000 points in the bell dream which is IMPOSSIBLE. I would like to be able to skip or cancel challenges that I can't complete so they don't take up space. I don't mind "paying" coins or emeralds to do so. Also with two cats, there's a lot of glitches with changing focus between them, or them leaping over each other. Sometimes they're asleep and it still gives me access to their needs. Weird! Finally, and this is a deal breaker for me if this is not in the works to be changed. WHY IS ANIMAL ABUSE AN OPTION? First time I played this game, I went to tap on the cat to see if there were options, and I walloped her in the face. Considering I created this cat in loving memory of one I owned in real life, that was really upsetting. It happens sometimes by accident too. PLEASE remove this option. It doesn't do anything! It's not like it's disciplinary (which still wouldn't make it okay). It's literally there just to upset me. Please remove. I Rate this game 4 stars not because of the game but because just the graphics of the game itself, first of all the games for when the cat is sleeping, there should be more games because there are many different things that cats could dream of, second of all there should be MORE cats because the cats that are in the game are only shorthairs. Third of all why do the pictures say "Him" i mean could you change it to like "it" because maybe a little girl want a girl cat but there are only boys, fourth of all, this game is fun and all but like the HITTING THOUGH, I mean not to be rude but SERIOUSELY?!?! IS THIS LIKE ANIMAL ABUSE?!?!!And finally, i understand that for the hitting you could discipline the kitten, also the kitten should go outside, by the way thanks for changing the gliches Enjoying the app and kittens are cute, very lifelike and act like real animals. Good visuals, touch interaction and simple but fun games and activities.That said the app has some major problems and badly needs an update. Some I've experienced:1. I can't get past Day40. No updates, new activities, etc2. No updates so nothing new to work with. I have 2 basic games to play with my cats, 2 to play when they're asleep, and that's it. I'm racking up money and treasure but nothing new to spend on except some accessories, and I can't buy a new collar everyday just for the sake of spending money. More games, toys, better food, etc would be great.3. The app is buggy. Stops in the middle of activities, percentage gauges don't work sometimes even though I use my food and litter privileges, etc. Sound stopped working early on. I've had to send cats to the litterbox 2-3 times in a row to get the percentage to work ok.4. Time is completely off. Sometimes I feed and bathe the cats and come back 1-2 hours later and they're already in need of food and smelly. Sometimes I can check in 1-2 times a day and they're fine. I wake up to find them starving sometimes even though I fed them right before going to bed.5. My 2 cats exist in separate worlds and I can't get them to even acknowledge each other let alone play together. When the cross paths one cat spins in the air like a sci-fi movie time warp. I can only play games with one at a time.
keywords: Daily Kitten : virtual cat pet, Honikou Games, Games, Family, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Day R Premium
description: Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th.  It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies – you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport.  - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode  with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game!  Features:  - Сraft system – get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one!  - Hardcore simulator of survival  - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode  - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en
reviews: This game is amazing, the combat system is challenging and keeps you on your toes, the story is clever, text based quests amazing, great soundtrack, and a unique way of searching in a 2d style, which not many games pull off to this day. I have a few problems with the game though. Since you need a wolf to hunt certain targets, why not add a perk for that called Tracker or something? Grinding is such a big part of the game, with hunting being such a big part of that grinding, which is another gripe of mine, since when I beat Searching for the truth, I was only level 42. Also, we should be able to make the forge and bellows sooner because wire is such a big part in recipes and repairs, its ridiculous. Also, the ants around Leningrad should be like the bees in Ufa. There should be an ant mound you could raid for chitin or lymph seeing how much lymph is needed in medicine recipes. In addition there should be a way to instantly respawn enemies in the wastes or forests, since hunting and grinding and fighting are such major parts of this game. All in all though, Day r nailed it. The survival is hard, Ai smart, and rewarding when you pull it off. Keep up the great work devs, and, looking at the update notes, since you added new traders, Tver might actually serve some purpose besides a bunkhouse. I understand the concept of not getting too overpowered too easily but in all seriousness vehicles should not be sooo incredibly difficult to get, I mean it’s nice and all that their even in the game in the first place but I usually die before I can even use them. I just hope that the leveling system can be fixed or the motorcycle can be put into a different level or something because the bicycle isn’t working because if you get attacked by something you can’t use the bike anymore so your just sitting there not knowing what to do. So I hope it could potentially be fixed or rearranged to be a little more fairish and I doubt that the world of USSR only had like 5-7 vehicle, it would be nice to see more come into this game. I love the game, i love the creators, I’ve never seen a survival game quite like this. Keep up the good work and keep making the game fun. I’ve played this game for years, having finished everything on one profile. Was a great game. Recent updates removed the ability to save and load anytime, a specifically advertised feature of the premium app. Instead, it has been replaced with a auto save system combined with a heavy penalty for dying that will often be enough to end your game.  Like, being teleported thousands of kilometers from your loot, having your vehicle and all fuel taken, having heavy penalties and debuffs applied to make scavenging harder, having all food and water taken, as well as all of your pots for cooking. Being left in an area you’ve already looted so there’s nothing to find. Just really rage inducing. If I wanted such a heavy death penalty, I would’ve checked the one life option. Before these last few updates, you could save your game, try something new, and then load if it didn't work out. Now, you can be ambushed and lose everything, bricking the profile. I won’t even get into losing 90% of my caps and the store turning into loot boxes all of a sudden.  Sad to see a great game go this way.  Super tedious grind now, plus the chance of losing everything anyway.  Plus, now you can lose everything at your camp with the “while you away” event that happens even if you left everything in a wooden house in a safe haven and didn’t die. Poor choice.
keywords: Day R Premium, Aleksey Shurokhov, Games, Role Playing, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎F18 3D Fighter jet simulator
description: Are you looking for a game in which you can fly an advanced jet fighter trough the skies. Are you looking for a free fighter jet games that can teach you to fly like the best Navy Air force fighter plane pilots. Learn how to land and take off your F18 fighter jet plane  from a carrier. So if you think you have what it takes to fly an F18 jet fighter. Here is your chance to get a taste o flying one of the most sophisticated aircrafts in the world . If you accept this fighter plane challenge you need to clear all 20 missions successfully before you can call yourself a real fighter pilot. Your challenge is to get through your Basic fighter pilot training and put your pilot skills to the test on different mission where you will learn to push your F18 fighter jet to the limit of what it can take.  3D fighter jet simulator is a modern air combat plane simulator in which you as a fighter pilot can fly around in a F18 jet plane.  During the course of the game you as pilot have the opportunity to fly 20 missions.  Main Controls: Move the Joystick right/left, up/down to control the flight attitude of the fighter jet plane. Use the Throttle lever up/down to accelerate/decelerate (brake) the fighter plane. Fine-tune controls:   The throttle lever can also be turned right/left to fine tune the flight attitude of the plane during flying. Touch the plane icon to change any flight attitudes of your plane during flying. Navigation: You can read the navigation info on the radar screen to find the correct flight directions. Change inflight view: By tapping the cockpit icon you can change view, into the cockpit view. From the cockpit there will be an arrow that indicate the correct directions.     Game objective: In each level you have a mission to accomplish, for example, you have to fly your plane trough the rings in the air or land your plane in the given parking point. You have to accomplish the mission with a specifies time limit. The more time left after completing the mission how bigger the medal reward. 3D Fighter jet simulator – game features -20 different airplane missions – landing , taking off, from airfields and carriers.  -New improved airplane physics. -Change your view to Cockpit view . -Fly an advanced fighter jet plane the F18 -Time challenge you could enjoy the scenery of the sky around you but time is not on your side. Bring your aircraft down before time runs out! -Watch out for skyscrapers or else its mayday, mayday and that is not good for your flight career. -Different airports and carriers to land your aircraft and to take off from. -New aviation missions will follow.  -New airplanes will be added.  NOTE! Your plane will crash if it falls into the sea or crash into any building or into the ground. Also be careful with landing you need to hit the runway or else your plane will explode.
reviews: Requires iOS 4.0 or later. Compatible with iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6S, iPhone 6S Plus, iPhone SE (1st generation), iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR, iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone SE (2nd generation), iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPad, iPod touch (3rd generation), iPod touch (4th generation), iPod touch (5th generation), iPod touch (6th generation), and iPod touch (7th generation).

name: ‎Game of Sultans
description: You are a king! Now rule like a king! Game of Sultans is an exciting new empire simulation RPG game in which you get to experience the life of a Sultan – a king of Europe and the Middle East! Every detail has been attended to so that players can immerse themselves in brutal wars, military strategy, flirtatious romance, empire management, political intrigue, and more!   Key Features: - Become a Sultan – Experience an empire at your command! - Assemble your harem – Romance beautiful and influential queens! - Recruit warlords – Rally a fiersome council of historical viziers! - Raise a family – Lovingly raise your children from childbirth to young adults! - Join PvP – Marshal your armies against other players worldwide! - Forge alliances – Make friends and enemies, join the good fight! - Turkish Coffee – Drink, chat, then listen as the fortuneteller interprets each cup!   The Ottoman Empire was a time of great change, remembered for its brutal conquests, romance, creativity, prosperity, wars, rebellions, love, marriage, and great coffee!  Follow and like us on Facebook! Facebook: facebook.com/gameofsultans If you have any questions, feedback, or suggestions, please feel free to contact us! E-mail: support_gos@mechanist.co
reviews: I enjoy this game for the reason I don’t lose resources or placements or advancement if I can’t play for a bit. What I would like to see though is that you don’t lose resources or points in the mini-games (such as Romance of the Sultan or the feast game that I can’t remember the name) where in a game you spend so much to get so close, never quite making it only to have to start all over the next time. I think the players should be able to keep their flowers, baskets, traps, eating attempts, or whatever other resources they earn or spend diamonds or cash on to be played the next time the game opens up. I would also like to see the amount of points needed to exchange something lower a little to make it possible for everyone to earn everything the game has to offer, no matter how long it takes. Another thing I think would be beneficial to the game is when new clothing or accessories comes out for visited and companions, having the initial promotion period is great...where if you want to spend the money to get those right away, you can but after the promotion, I would like to see them show up in the “store” so they can be purchased later if desired using either diamonds or clothing tickets. There have been a lot i have wanted but I couldn’t get them at that time. Also in the Dagger Slide, I would like to see additional rewards available for diamonds in addition to cash. Other than those...for now...I really like the game. Dear Sultan, thank you for taking the time to write the review. Hope you continue to enjoy our game. If you have any feedback or suggestions, please write to us at support_gos@mechanist.co. We would love to hear from you! ❤️ Having played other war games I do not consider this a war game. There are many rotating events where you challenge or compete with other players but unlike war games I’ve played before, you never lose anything to other players except points. Your resources can’t be stolen or your whole “home” can’t be destroyed. You compete for points and it can be very competitive. You will have to hear constant complaints about someone outspending someone else to win events, but that has been every game I’ve played. The developers have added numerous different events since I started playing 18 months ago which keeps it fresher than games I’ve played before. The only opportunity I would like to see them work on is rewards for Vizier events. First place gets an elite vizier and second gets a horrible package for the resources they used trying to win. I would like to see these events add vizier badge shards for the top ten places so they at least earn a portion towards claiming these viziers. I have seen too many people build up for months to finish second and get 20 items to replace 2000 that they used. Beef up awards for top ten in the elite vizier challenges and you will get my fifth star rating. While I completely understand the need for VIP and covering expenses, the time it takes for things to load like children aging or leveling up consorts, or normal XP of the Sultan is ridiculous. The ads did mention making choices which hasn’t happened once in the two months of me owning this app. I like the theme but it is missing what it advertised. People in chats are sexually horrific and there is no set block for people who are in appropriate or monitor. There are kids 14-17 who know about things yes, but should they be exposed to the continual graphic sexual speech when they are trying to play a game? I don’t think that’s acceptable. They should have a monitor of sorts. Yes they block out words but there are ways around it. Yes you can block them but not everyone does and why should we have to block someone because they are being the inconvenience. Many of the elitist players are rude about their position in the game. They think they can bully other players. If maybe they monitored the chat every once in awhile they would know. And from what I know doesn’t Apple not like the kind of hate represented often in the chat. I shouldn’t have to stick up for myself and others constantly. With the sexual content in the chat either ban it or change the age level requirement. I do like many parts to the game. But some of the main parts need addressing in how they are managed. Dear Sultan, thank you for your time to leave a review. It's very important for us to receive user's feedback and to make our game way better. We'll take into account your proposal and we look forward to your continued support to Game of Sultans:)
keywords: Game of Sultans, Mechanist, Games, Simulation, Role Playing, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Game Dev Story
description: Manage your own game company and try to create a million-selling game in this unique simulation. Features the ability to develop your company's own game console, plus a system for changing your staff members' professions. Hire talented people and train them to develop their skills. As your staff gets more experience, you will unlock a wider array of game genres and content to develop. Try to find the most popular combinations and develop for the latest platform! Your staff members can have a variety of game-related professions, from programmer to sound engineer. Work hard and you may reach the top of the video game industry! -- Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at http://kairopark.jp.  Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! https://twitter.com/kairokun2010
reviews: I remembered playing this game back in elementary school... so I typed it in the App Store. I bought the game at around 10 o'clock in the morning & played. I kept playing, and playing until I saw I was in year 20. I had my phone on the charger so I wouldn't lose my progress in case my phone died. I looked at the time on my phone and saw it was 8 o'clock at night. At that moment came to a realization that I've been playing Game Dev Story for 10 hours. This game is well worth the little price that they charge, believe me. It was even difficult to write this review because I missed about 5 minutes of Game Dev time to write this. Buy the game. Every single one of the Kairosoft games are great, so it’s very difficult to pick a favorite. Game dev was the first one I played so it has a special place in my heart. I am totally hooked and replay them over and over. Awesome games at great prices, I put so many hours into these games so you definitely get your money’s worth. Just note that you might not be able to stop playing and get some sleep or any work done Bought this game ages ago when it first came out on the app store, i think i played it on my 4s. I fell in love with the game and spent many hours on it, then moved on to other games but came back to play the devs other games especially mega mall story. I recently redownloaded this game for the first time in many years and am once again hooked, fantastic game just as fun as i remembered.
keywords: Game Dev Story, Kairosoft Co.,Ltd, Games, Entertainment, Strategy, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

Easily accept job offers from any of several clients based all around the world, and you are automatically synced-up and ready to hack. reviews: The game includes fun and easy puzzles- but not that many of them. Unfortunately, the game lacks depth at its current state. Although the puzzles may be well made, the game has no story. The intro was nice, the game is simple, and the puzzles are solvable in many ways. I recommend this game for anyone who has like 20 minutes to spare, waiting for their pizza or whatever, and want to solve a puzzle or two, or better yet the whole game. I finished the game in a solid 15 minutes. The hardest puzzles aren’t too challenging but if there were more puzzles that were harder, and included a story of some sort, where the in game money could be spend on some kind of in game object that would keep the game fresh. Like for example a car. Add parts onto it or even a computer set up that gives power-ups for the puzzles you “hack.” Other than that the game was well made, no lag, no glitches that I’ve come across and a nice “hacker” backlight design to it that can be toggled off and on.
keywords: HACKRIS, Trevor Von Ryan, Games, Simulation, Puzzle, Utilities, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

description: Hey Kids! Are you crazy about Costume Parties, haunted house, trick-or-treat, or some other celebrating ways? If your answer is no, you don’t have to worry because you’ll absolutely cheer for Halloween Supermarket Store. Halloween Supermarket Store is a time management game, customers at store are in queue, waiting to pay money and get their Halloween grocery items packed. An experienced supermarket store cashier in shopping mall knows how to operate the cash register machine serving the customers on time, so they don’t get angry on any kinds of delays to get their Halloween grocery items. Halloween Supermarket Store starts with a manual machine you have to enter the price of each grocery item and get the total of all. Tap on the customer to receive money. Cash drawer will open and you can put the received money and return the balance amount to the customer. You can upgrade your manual point of sale, with the automated one so you can scan each Halloween grocery item the customer brings to the counter, and ring up the price! Then accept payment via cash, credit card or through mobile NFC, and enter the total amount, followed by scanning the credit card or mobile! In this mile-a-minute fun filled cash register game you can also improve your store management skills. Customers are in queue, waiting to pay cash and get their halloween grocery items packed. A fast-paced store management game to test your speed and accuracy. Halloween Supermarket Grocery Store is an educational and fun game where children learn to handle money at supermarket shopping mall. It can help improve their math and calculation skills. Features: * Fast paced supermarket Time Management Cash Register Simulation * Serve customers & make them happy to get rewards * Modern payment methods; Credit Card Machine and NFC Mobile payments * Unlock Point Of Sale Machine to scan grocery items * A fun filled supermarket management game * Use Auto Complete Robot to get task done automatically * Use Cool Candies to increase patience of customers * All sorts of strange dresses, unique make-up, colorful masks, spooky monster, ghosts, walking skeletons outfits.
keywords: Halloween Supermarket Store, The Game Storm Studios, Games, Role Playing, Simulation, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Hades' Star
description: Leave your mark among millions of players in a persistent galaxy that constantly grows and evolves. Hades’ Star is a unique online space strategy game. You are in control of a growing Empire, starting with a single planet in your own corner of space. Over time, you’ll expand to own multiple outposts, command a formidable fleet, research advanced technology, participate in diverse missions and manage relationships with other players in the game.  FEATURES:  • Colonize numerous planets and watch them grow from lifeless rocks to central hubs of activity. • Optimize trade routes, mine resources, explore new space and defend against the indigenous, mysterious alien space race • Build combat, mining and trade ships and customize them with powerful modules • Establish diplomatic relations with other players and dictate your rules for economic and military cooperation • Work with other players in dangerous Red Stars and retrieve resources before the star goes Supernova • Compete for rewards in the intense, rapidly collapsing Blue stars  • Organize with other players in Corporations and participate in highly strategic White Star missions • Play and grow at your own pace: Nobody will unfairly steal your resources while you are offline SUPPORT If you have any problem in the game, please contact us at support@hadesstar.com, or use the in-game "Contact Support" option. PRIVACY POLICY http://hadesstar.com/privacy_policy.html TERMS OF SERVICE http://hadesstar.com/terms_of_service.html Hades' Star uses Emoji provided by http://emojione.com
reviews: So, After playing this game for about 5 months, I have gotten to level 64, and can truly say this game is actually great. With the same base-building style of CoC, without the annoying fact that you can be attacked, it really is amazing. Currently, there are 4 game styles, all of which appeal to different people. You get to control a yellow star, which is basically your base. There are different planets, asteroids, and all sorts of amazing things. The main currency, credits, can be gotten through calm, fun ways, that do take some time. Hydrogen, your fuel, is plentiful, but used up like that 👌, so watch out. The currency that many people complain about buying is truly free, and often appears in their planets. As for the game styles, there are both RS, which is anreal-time PvE gathering style, which is fun and can other players can participate. There is also WS, which is basically an online 5 day chess game between up to 20 people, causing much fun and lots 'o credits. Today, though, Papa Andreas, (the dev) implemented possible the best thing for all those action-loving peeps. The Blue Star. (BLS) this is basically a shorter, player versus playe4 RS, resulting in lots of fun, with minimal losses. Overall, it truly is an amazing game, graphics are amazing too. Overall, probably best mobile game I have ever played. Thanks to the community too, which really is amazing. -Avid, Spaceforce Corporation I have been looking for a longterm game as I have gotten fed up with PVZ2, and EA’s constant need to push you towards in-app purchases. Yes, I realize Popcap is still running that game. Regardless, Hades’ Star is a breath of fresh air. It is challenging, and it never pushes you towards purchases. In fact, they make it difficult to almost impossible to speed up the game. I have actually spent money with them just as a type of developer fee, and hopefully others will do the same. Solid, structured game play that you can easily do in your down time and still have a life. Unless they change the game play, I will be here for the next few years (if not longer).Update - I have been playing this game for several months now, and if I could give it more than 5 stars, I would. I can’t remember what an in game Ad looks like. There is zero push to spend money. I have been one to almost never spend money on phone games, yet, when not pushed and the game is worthwhile, I spend money.  Basically, I want to keep the developers happy and creating updates. Great game with long term play style. You can merely PVE or PVP or both (has a little for everyone).  There is not a single currency in the game that you can not find in the game (ie, you NEVER have to pay to play).  Hope you give it a shot! Fun space empire building game. Starts kinda slow but gets huge, deep. Challenges your mind. Colonize planets discovered in your star system. Build mining, transport, and battleships. There’s tons of tech to be discovered. Everything can be upgraded. Go on 3 types of missions. Red Stars are pve, single or multiplayer coop missions for artifacts which you need to unlock and upgrade tech. Blue Stars are short, pvp “last man standing” missions rewarding valuable resources. White Stars are epic 5v5 up to 20v20 5day slow paced events where 2 corporations duke it out for resources in one big star system. These missions are all about strategy, no PTW, which is important to me. I can’t stand the new ptw, in game purchase model that plagues games these days. You can get really creative using all the different tech you discover. Running shipments while trying to use the least amount of fuel is a fun challenge. The modules you can deck your ships out with offer plenty of strategy to figure out and employ. Your home is always safe, this game is not about attacking and taking others resources. It’s about slowly growing huge, efficient, smart, and powerful, in a great supportive gaming galaxy, especially enjoyed if you join a corporation. Word.
keywords: Hades' Star, Parallel Space Inc, Games, Strategy, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Ice Cream AR
description: Ice Cream AR is something new. It brings the promise of AR to life with a fun single or multiplayer game that makes anywhere an Ice Cream Shop. You start the game with a mobile ice cream cart and an unlimited supply of vanilla ice cream. By selling your cones to virtual customers you can earn ice cream bucks to upgrade your carts, unlock flavours and cones, and achieve the ultimate ultimate ice cream shop. Everything about this game is intended to be self-explanatory and fun. You start by scanning your environment so that the intelligent game engine can place tables on top of your existing furniture. Once you place your ice cream cart you can open you store and start fulfilling orders.  Order appear at the tables in your space. Each one has a picture of the order and a cost. Match the cone and flavours in any order over at your cart. Once correct the order will glow green to show it's ready. Tap it to fulfill the order and you'll get a fun animation.Do your best to stack the cone as requested so you can get paid . If you make a mistake the order drops and makes a mess all over your furniture.  Taking advantage of Apple's groundbreaking Augmented Reality technology, we have  sophisticated algorithms behind the scenes calculating your location in your space, the location of objects, and a powerful physics engine all to make the ice cream scoops fall in a realistic way, hide behind objects, and make splats that seems realistic in your world. Designed from scratch for iOS by a company driven by a female co-founder, this unique game redefines what kind of casual games are possible in Augmented Reality. Download this app now and start experiencing games with friends in a whole new way.
summary: Run an Ice Cream Shop in AR

name: ‎Ice Cream Maker Tony's Shop
description: On a fine day Tony’s ice cream maker shop opens on an Italian beach. ------------------------------ How about becoming an ice cream seller and making ice cream together？ "Tony the Ice Cream Maker’s Shop" is a free game to be enjoyed with your family and friends,from children to adults.  Put a smile on your customers’ faces by making ice creams to order and handing them over to your clients.  By gathering coins you can get various kinds of ice cream,cones and toppings for making your ice cream creations.  Also you can change the sales person character according to your mood and taste.  You can improve your ice cream making skills during mini speed contests and collect more coins playing card games with Tony.    ------------------------------ How to play ------------------------------ ●Your customers arrive from the right and order ice cream.  ●When you see an ice cream order,please tap at the bottom and chose your ice cream,cone and toppings.  ●When your ice cream is ready,tap on the customer and hand it over.  ●Please make your customers happy without mixing up their order.  ●By collecting coins,you can increase your ice cases,ice cream,cone and topping varieties in your shop.  ●Besides,you can enjoy making ice cream with other fun characters besides of Tony.  ●You can train your skills during mini speed contests when you can show how many ice cream orders you can finish within 70 seconds.  ●When you pick the same card like Tony with a similar ice cream shown on the card，you can win coins.  ●You can show your great scores to your friends via Twitter and Facebook.   ------------------------------ Tony the Ice Cream Maker’s Shop is ideal for … ------------------------------ ● anyone wanting to enjoy a simple game with their children.  ● children who like shop games.  ● anyone wanting to enjoy a game during their free time.  ● anyone wanting to enjoy a game with their friends. ● anyone enjoying casual games.  ● anyone who likes ice cream.  ● anyone who likes shop games.  ● anyone who likes relaxing games. ------------------------------ Tony the Ice Cream Maker’s Shop fun characters  ------------------------------ ●Tony (54 years old,Italian man) He poses like a cool guy,but sometimes his cheerful side comes out.  ●George (8 years old,chimpanzee) A fun chimpanzee that enjoys giving customer service.   ●Droid BCG (four years,robot) An assistant robot that can sing and dance.  ●Ivanov (52 years old,Russian man) Always in a good mood,daring and optimistic,does not worry about work too much.  ●Catherine (34 years old,French woman)  She loves to sing and play the guitar. A lady with a cool character.  ●Ken (25 years old,American man) A refreshing,spirited and good-looking young man who is good at street performances. ●Sara (18 years old,Japanese woman) A slightly careless girl who loves maid fashion.  ● Julia (28 years old,Italian woman) A cheerful and talkative shop clerk. ------------------------------ Character Voice by Maya Himenogi  http://materializer.co/maya/ ------------------------------ Characteristics of the game ------------------------------ ●There are no difficult rules whatsoever. Anyone can enjoy the game from small child to adult. ●Have fun with cheerful music and character voices.  ●The design is easy and child intuitive.  ●You can register your score on the leaderboard. ●You can show your score through the social media share function. ●There are no charges within the app.   ●Some ads from third parties might be displayed in the app.  ------------------------------ From the developer ------------------------------ We developed this ice cream theme game the vision of a fun leisure activity among friends and family.  We are welcoming any kind of review or feedback to improve future versions.

description: ~~ The most entertaining racing game and steering wheel toy in the App Store ~~  ~~ 10 exciting steering wheels and road tracks for your kids to enjoy! ~~ ~~ HD illustrations and sound ~~   Have your little ones experience their very own driving fun. Kids Steering Wheel - driving simulator lets them feel like they are driving a car! This exciting racing car app has 3 speed levels, bumper obstacles and presents to collect along the road! Kids Steering Wheel has wonderful buttons with real sounds of a car, such as: horns, windshield wipers, blinkers, two way radio and ignition.  Cars inside: + Race Car + Police car + Fire truck + Ambulance + Tractor + Jeep + Bus + Semi trailer + Luxury car + Taxi What’s inside: + 10 amazing car steering wheels + 10 exciting locations + Intuitive, fun and child friendly controls + HD quality illustrations and sounds Playing Instructions: * Rotate the steering wheel left and right in order to navigate the car on the road * Press the speed button or ignition in order to change speed up or slow down between 3 different speeds which provide 3 different difficulty levels * Collect presents along the way to complete stages and win the race.  * Avoid colliding with bumpers so they don’t slow you down Sound doesn't work? Try Increasing the volume and check that your device is not set to “Mute”. The Mute button is located next to the volume buttons on the side of the device. Still no sound? On the iPad it's possible that your side switch is set to lock screen rotation. In this case you can control sound volume by: Double tap the home button Swipe the lower bar from left to right Tap the speaker icon to the far left It should show “Mute Off” below the play button You can set the side switch functionality at “Settings > General > Use side switch to” Note: 4 steering wheels are completely free and supported by Ads. All 10 steering wheels are available with an easy to use in-app purchase inside the application. Purchasing full version also removes all Ads. name: ‎K1 Speed Racing
description: Be sure to download the latest update to the K1 Speed App to enjoy our virtual racing game, get rewarded with points that can be exchanged for real races and merchandise, challenge your friends to race, live track scoreboard, race results and much more. Reward Games & Loyalty    * Collecting K1Kash points from Virtual Racer Game  * Collecting K1Kash points from Your Racing Actions (real racing, checkin, challenges b-day, etc.) * Exchange K1Kash points for races and merchandise. K1 Racing Game * Learn the track for each location. * Test your speed against time. * Get a feel of the K1 Speed racing experience. * Improved racing controls . * Race against your ghost with points when you beat your time, or beat the ghost. * Race against Multiple AI racers with points for Place 1st, 2nd, 3rd. Get loyalty K1KASH rewards points. * Challenge your friends and take the K1 Speed racing experience with you. Racing Scores * Get instant results after your race, as well as previous race history. * Purchase another race and beat the registration lines. * Get LIVE scoreboard to not miss the action. Racing Community * Racers Challenge each other to Physical Race, the winner gets K1KASH rewards points. The winner is determined by achieving 2 of 3 criteria: Best Time, Average Time, and Most Laps Led. * User Racing Profile (Statistics), check yours and share with your friends. * Social Media Friendly sharing of your challenge results. Location Check In * Beat the registration lines by checking in at the location with just your login. Takes seconds. * Beat the registration lines by creating a new account, for new customers. Karting Academy * Let our experts brief you on how to have the best racing experience while maintaining safety. You’ll be amazed with just a few short minutes will teach you how you can improve your speed. * If karting is your passion, then visit our K1 Speed Academy by Patricio Jourdain, or download his book, “The Perfect Lap”. Photo Booth * Take fun interactive photos on cool racing backgrounds. * Automatically replace the background with custom themes in the racing world and extreme sports. * Put yourself and your friends on the coolest places on earth where racing and fun happens. * Unlock your camera roll for even more backgrounds. Your K1 Speed Account * Update your account. * Create your racing profile and upload your photo. * Check your K1RS points. * And more…
reviews: The idea of the app itself is great, but I can’t try it because the Portland location is missing. PLEASE ADD PORTLAND. The features of the app seem to be ok, especially the ability to race tracks virtually and see race results online. There’s definitely the feeling that the app hasn’t been worked on in a while though, such as the missing location and the fact that the feedback button doesn’t even work. First off, design. Not responsive to screen. Built for older models pre X squared screens. Being a developer, like cmon. Keep with the times. That said, layout is alright. Now off to the disappointment. The syncing of accounts, point system, and community activities are awful/broken. The invite to challenges dont work. Challenged user isnt notified or can view a challenge. By the apps notifications, I should have way more points that what is stated. In addition, points, should you find the bug, could easily be obtained  without paying or doing anything as stated within the how to’s. Overall Nothing social works as it should. Accounts are not even synced properly and yes,  it states I received rs points for races(dont show I have them though) but same points 24hrs later.  My friend who was new to k1 signed up and was unable to connect properly right off bat. Site associates and the manager informed me to contact corporate. 2 two stars for idea. Kudos to whomever came up with the concept for this app. It has all the features you would want, but they just don’t work the way they need to. It got me thinking that more entertainment places should have something interactive like this.Unfortunately the positives end with the concept. The game play and physics are brutal, also the app doesn’t recognize me and my credentials no matter what I do.  Screen controls also seem to go haywire, not only in the game but even for the registration process.  I thought I might be able to slog my way through enough races to get myself a free real race, but that is nearly unattainable and certainly not worth it if it is.
keywords: K1 Speed Racing, K1 Speed Inc., Games, Entertainment, Simulation, Racing, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

reviews: I just got this game like 3 minutes ago... it’s so cute! It’s very enjoyable because of the happy music, cute art, and relaxing gameplay. It’s not something you feel like you have to do, it’s just a fun thing to play when you have the time/whenever you want. I like how you can watch ads to get more sticker packets instead of waiting 10 or more minutes for the next packet. If you want a cute and stress-free app, this is it! Very cute! ^~^ This app is great! It’s super cute and a fun way to trade stuff! I really like how you can sell stickers for packets if you have enough extras. I also like how you can watch an ad to get a free packet. However, I don’t like that there is a maximum a day that you can trade stickers for packets. Right now, I have about 40 stickers that I can trade to get packets, but I already sold the maximum for today. When I come back tomorrow, I still won’t be able to sell all of them because there is still a lot more left. I also don’t like how when you click on things, like stickers to see if they are common or just switching from “album” to “home”, it always makes me watch an ad. For things like that, I shouldn’t have to watch an ad. I should only watch ads for when I want an extra packet. Lastly, I don’t like it when ads pop up in the middle of my screen. It’s just splat there randomly. Ads from Google pop up and it ruins what I can see on the screen. I can barely open the packets and after I get frustrated, I reload the page and that packet is gone. But thanks for listening! I hope you make some changes!!
keywords: Kawaii Album - Kawaii Book, Rafael Sian de Freitas, Games, Simulation, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Maggie's Movies - Second Shot
description: Life in Hollywood isn't easy, and Maggie has her work cut out for her this time! Your favorite director is back in the time management game Maggie’s Movies – Second Shot! After the box office success of her indie movie Prohibited Love, Maggie is now directing a feature film, Immense Darkness. But in Hollywood, you’re only as good as your last movie so the pressure is on. Maggie is finding the stress of directing a major motion picture a little too much for one person to handle. Actors with egos the size of the screen, a co-director who takes MORE of Maggie’s time and the looming shadow of “make or break” combine to make Maggie’s job even more difficult. If this film isn’t a success, Maggie’s benefactor is out of a job. What she needs is someone with time management skills! Are you game? Can you help her with the myriad tasks she has to perform? They will include directing actors, assisting the crew as well as arranging every detail of the sets from a pirate ship down to flowers! As if this weren’t enough, Maggie’s father is busy taking Pulitzer Prize-winning photographs in the most dangerous, war-torn areas of the world. Maggie wishes he would also make time to be a dad to her. Can Maggie juggle everything that’s going on and reconnect with her father? With your help, she just might make it. - Learn the ins-and-outs of making a blockbuster movie - Put your time management skills to the test - Discover gorgeous tropical locations - Hold the crew together and finish the movie - Master 60 story levels and an extra 18 challenge levels - Fall in love with a dramatic story, both on and off set - Upgrade the movie sets with new equipment - 7 movie-themed mini games will make you feel like you're directing a movie! Try the first few levels for free! name: ‎Magazine Mogul
description: Take charge of your own magazine! It's up to you to turn heads and help your community grow through the power of the press! It all starts with compelling coverage. Brainstorm story ideas and angles with your editorial team, then deploy staff to put those ideas into print. Hit the streets for info and you just might snag the hottest scoop of the year! Wider circulation means better publicity and tourism for your town, so win new readers over with fresh and interesting features! Keep it up and the mayor may headhunt you to assist with urban planning, relying on you for advice on public projects, events, and even what businesses to invite into town. A small local magazine can make a big difference! Do you have what it takes to become a magazine mogul? -- Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at http://kaipa.jp. Be sure to check out the wildly popular Game Dev Story for your mobile device or PC as well as our collection of FREE games!
reviews: It's hard to find games that work on my iPhone 3GS without crashing, but Kairosoft always delivers! I've had none of the glitches reported on newer devices. (If you're familiar with iPhone games in general and Kairosoft in specific, not all of them support rotation, so that hardly counts as a "glitch".) Gameplay is a cross between GameDev and some of their "adventure" style games where you send your people on missions to gather resources and ideas. Quite engaging, but rather short compared to Ninja or Beastie. My favorite part is having a penguin, a polar bear, a chimp, and a robot on my staff. :D As expected this game provides a lot of combinations in the newspaper design options. There are some funny moments here and there. The game is slow to start but we are given 19 yrs instead of the usual 16 yrs to calculate score. Overall a memorable title with good replay value. I found it quite compelling to play.  I was hoping for more character art variety and I missed the usual funny character names. It is a bit difficult to earn Knowledge points but that does add a level of challenge. I prefer to pay for games and this was worth it. Money well spent. Fun and back to the roots of the company. No right combination, you have to connect topics with the target customer. Interesting twist that you help run the city council, adds to the fun. And there are boosts to give your employees, so there isn't necessarily 'best' employees; i didn't hire any new employees after the last branch expansion. So fun, even though it kinda runs out of steam at the end. Worth the money to help independent game companies.
keywords: Magazine Mogul, Kairosoft Co.,Ltd, Games, Adventure, Entertainment, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

reviews: I love the game, lots of fun with a variety of strategies. However I would suggest looking into your update process. I have this game on my iPad and iPhone, and when ever a update comes out the game directs me to the App Store to download the update, however the App Store does not show any update options available. I’ve had to wait up to a week before for the update to appear in the App Store. This has happened several times on both devices so I’m pretty sure it’s not my error. Thanks for your review. Actually the delay for update is not our fault too. We just release our new version from Apple management site. (iTunesConnect) Then we have to wait until all distribution for all players. Sometimes it takes several days depending on players location. Sorry for your inconvenience. I will ask Apple how to reduce distributing time. The game is easy to play yet has a surprising amount of depth to it. The singleplayer missions are quick yet challenging, and there are various forms of multiplayer combat. I was quickly able to earn enough of the in game premium currency to unlock every nation in the game (the game has 5 nations, the USA, Germany, USSR, the UK, and Japan. You get to choose one for free at the start, and each new nation costs 500 gold each). I did have a scare where I lost all of my progress with my unlinked account, but the technical support was able to not only get back to me within minutes, but was able to restore all of my progress, despite my account not being linked to Game Center or Facebook. I strongly recommend you give this game a try if you enjoy WWII naval games. Thank you for your review. We are going to make a new update this week. We have prepared patches for daily quests and accessibility enhancements for beginners and lots of patches. The 3.13 version will be released in a few days, so if you have a new version, download it and try it again. We are actively gathering opinions from players and actively reflecting on game updates. We will continue to update continuously and quickly. http://www.navyfieldmobile.com/ https://www.facebook.com/MobileNavyFieldOfficial/ naiadgames@gmail.com So far I am enjoying this game and want to play more of it, but I can’t pass the tutorial because everything it tells me “your dock is empty, buy a ship” it doesn’t show the guy when I go to buy it and I can’t buy it. It just stays there and doesn’t change. It doesn’t progress forward or anything. It’s not my WiFi. It’s not my connection. It’s not having to do with Game Center or the app it’s self cause I deleted and disconnected both and tried literally everything. I can’t even restart or Delete that nation to try again. Please help :( I want to play but it won’t let me continue further. English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

name: ‎Off Road Truck Driver Game : Cargo Truck Simulator
description: Do you love truck driving off road game? Truck games with an offroad truck driver for cargo delivery! Yes that's the kind of truck driving you are going to get with an off road truck driver in this Offroad truck cargo delivery game. Off road Truck games with an offroad truck driver doing off road truck driving would have been good in the past but Offroad truck cargo delivery is the best of the off road truck games in 2016. Off road game for truck driving usually doesn't have that challenging cargo missions but this off road game has the best missions among all truck games with a truck driver. Background story of the truck simulator game: Leaving service was never going to be easy for our solider so our Man is now looking for ways to earn money. Kool Games was looking for truck drivers so our Man grabbed this opportunity and he is a truck driver in this truck simulator game doing truck driving for cargo delivery. Though a truck simulator game or off road game is not a specialty of our Man but he was looking for ways to earn so he is up for this truck simulator game. Thanks to Kool Games for providing him this opportunity to play this off road game. What is this truck simulator game all about? This is the first truck game by Kool Games. In addition to being a truck game this is also an offroad game. The user will have the option to select the truck best matching his/ her requirements. Once a truck is selected, the user can then enjoy the off road driving. The user will be presented with a number of cargo missions. In each mission the user will have to pick up or deliver the cargo to a certain place. The map in this truck game will help the user to see where his/ her pick up or delivery point is. Along with completing the cargo missions the users will also enjoy the off road driving. There are a total of 20 missions in this truck game for now but in future more missions shall also be added. How to play this cargo game by Kool Games? 1. First, you need to download and install our cargo game for free on your smartphone or tablet. 2. Once you launch the cargo game, you need to select the truck that you want to play with. You will find different awesome 3D trucks hat were designed carefully. 3. Once you select your truck, you need to select the level that you want to play in this offroad game. 4. When you start playing, you will be able to drive your truck with the controls. You can easily accelerate or brake using the acceleration and breaking buttons in the bottom right side of the screen in this offroad game. 5. To turn left or right, you can use the steering wheel in the left side of the screen, it's very easy to use and you can use it like you are driving a truck playing a cargo game. 6. While you are driving the truck to the pick up/ delivery spot, you need to avoid any collisions so that you dont drop any cargo. 7. If you deliver the cargo successfully at the right place and within the given time, you will complete the level and go to the next one. Why this offroad game by Kool Games? You are surely going to love this cargo game over the others due to following salient features: 1. Totally Free: This offroad game is totally free! 2. Delightful graphics: This truck simulation game has awesome graphics which make long lasting impressions on your mind and vision. The graphics are high quality as well as very smooth so you are going to have your best gaming experience while playing this great truck simulation game. 3. Entertaining music: This off road driving game has a very entertaining music for your pleasure. 4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this off road driving game are very realistic and they keep you fully involved in this truck simulation game. 5. Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this off road driving game as the aim is to get better and better until you have delivered all the cargo. Please don't forget to rate our truck simulation game/ provide feedback. ENJOY & Thank you!
keywords: Off Road Truck Driver Game : Cargo Truck Simulator, Muhammad Arsalan, Games, Entertainment, Simulation, Racing, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

Select your vehicle among five different luxury cars. Become furious heavy vehicle driver in this 4x4 offroad rally game. Features of Offroad Cruiser Uphill 4x4 Jeep Driving Adventure:-  -	High quality 3D graphics. -	4x4 Luxury vehicles added. -	Realistic controls applied. -	Cool background music and sound effects. -	Three different modes of gameplay. -	Manual shift added. -	Powerful offroad jeeps with 4x4 engines. -	Realistic Driving Pleasure. -	Massive 3D offroad jungle environment. Note:- This game is free to download and no in app purchases included. You can download this game without internet.

name: ‎Office Jerk for iPad
description: There's a Jerk in every office. A know-it-all, overachiever who comes in early, stays late and kisses up to the boss. Exact revenge on “that guy” with Office Jerk: grab whatever you can find, and hurl it at him! The Office Jerk can only take so much - find out how much by throwing:     * Laptop (NEW ITEM)     * Fire Extinguisher      * Cheesy Button     * Snappy Mouse Trap     * “Joe” the boss from Kick The Boss 2     * Leather Racing Glove     * Garden Gnome (cameo appearance from Streaker Run)     * Nice, Blue Water balloon     * Suction Cup Dart - Always Classic, Always Funny     * Stick O' Dynamite     * Agitated, Honey-Filled Bee Hive     * Shiny Red Stapler     * Crumpled Piece of Paper ...and a whole bunch more, plus mystery items! And we're adding new items all the time. Don't just sit back and take it: pay it back. Grab whatever feels right, and fling it at his head or shoulder - or go right for the face! Tap the desk organizer and see what other items you can rain down on that office meanie. Finally wipe that smirk off his face, in this feel-good app from Fluik Entertainment.     > Hit the Jerk with 45+ items     > Unlock hilarious reactions for each item     > Discover tons of environment interactions     > Master the Office Jerk checklist     > Earn Daily Rewards     > Complete Daily Challenges     > Achievements Galore! “Way funny, I love to wipe the smile off that jerks face!” “Makes you want to throw things at people you work with and compare reactions!” “Who can resist blowing off some steam by picking on the office jerk!??? Very enjoyable.” Play Office Jerk today! “Like” Office Jerk on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/OfficeJerk Get FREE in-game Coins when Office Jerk gets 100,000 “Likes” on Facebook! ___________________________ Office Jerk is brought to you by Fluik Entertainment, makers of wicked-fun mobile games such as Office Zombie, Plumber Crack and Streaker Run. Search the App Store for “Fluik” to browse all our games. Follow @FluikGames on Twitter for awesome game announcements and other updates. NOTE: To help keep Office Jerk awesome, please send any bug reports or suggestions directly to us, instead of posting them in your app reviews. We can't respond directly to app reviews, so it's hard for us to help you with your problem or issue. You can post all your bugs or suggestions on the Facebook fan page, https://www.facebook.com/OfficeJerk, or email them to us at support@fluik.com
reviews: The game I expected was going to be fun, goofy, and just plain jerky. But when I got the app, a MILLION ADS popped up and I was beginning to feel ripped off. I went to the game and threw a stapler at the guy but I could not get the second one to throw. I switched to paper wads and I had great results, but when I got a checklist completed, it would not let me press the ok button. Then, alas, I had to delete the app. Ya see what I'm saying? Please fix these bugs and I will happily re download the app. I don't think I can handle it. Seriously, I do enjoy this game. Mostly I love getting a chance to find out what the different debris does to the jerk. If I had one thing to complain about, I'd request that the goals for earning the second coin of the day be set at a more realistic level. For instance, having to break the glass on the door 75 times when only one in five lucky throws will even go in that direction is a little ridiculous. It would take me all day and I know which items to use.  Another thing, how do I see how many coins I have? Never been able to figure that out. Holiday  Jerk tells me, why not this guy? Shouldn't be kept a secret. I'd definitely buy more crap to throw if I knew. 😋 I got this game about a year ago, and abandoned it because I didn't have enough coins to buy all the items. I didn't have the Golden Stapler, so I wasted all 100 coins on it. Now I have it.... The scratch cards really helped me now! I now have 1003 coins! (yes, one-thousand-three) I have all the items and have completed all the achievements. So I'm looking forward to their next update. Maybe a platinum stapler that costs 299 coins??? Maybe!Fluik, you made the best iOS game ever.Thank you.
keywords: Office Jerk for iPad, Fluik, Games, Simulation, Family, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Office Madness 2: Corporation
description: *****On Top 10th Simulation & Strategy Game List in 46 Country***** You always dream to be the boss of your company. Now you have opportunity. Hard working days are over. You are the boss!  Built your departments and rooms. Hire your employees and managers. Avoid attacks of union labor, virus attack on your accounts , fire and etc.... Keep your rooms clean and equipments are working properly.  Choose your decisions on employee's behaviour actions correctly and keep your employees happiness level high.  Join online events and challenge with other players. Be on the top prize list and get the event prizes daily.  Office Madness 2 is an office tycoon game that you will have fun while running your business...
reviews: First, major issues I’ve ran into, during the virus attach the timing is off. At the exact same time the mini game ended someone got sick with no chance of being able to click the bubble. Secondly, during multiple timed multi choice what do you do questions, while reading my options something else pops up and makes it so I cannot make a choice thus timing out and losing the ability to make the right choice. Third, I placed an elevator and all of a sudden all rooms attached to the elevator started blinking “missing elevator” now I had to delete 3 offices in order to get them out of the building and everything on the third is now inaccessible even the elevators say “missing elevator” Fourth, there are so few ways to increase happiness other than spending money it becomes tedious to increase happiness. There should be more ways to increase employee happiness other than spending money. I’m not sure where the creators have worked in the past but people at work don’t hate their job more and more every single day to the point of your company losing money (unless you’re a terrible boss/manager). Other than that maybe make it so it can be an idle kind of game where you still make money while you’re away as well. This game has promise though I am currently stuck and can not expand the building any more. There are no “events” and the game is quite boring right now. With some updates to maybe give you goals or to just make it harder in general may make this a great game. Has potential at the start but now I am just waiting on an update before I can do anything else. Boring..... This game has A LOT of potential to be amazing. However, it’s very glitchy. I had an issue where I accidentally placed a room inside an elevator and then the elevator didn’t work until I destroyed the office and the elevator. Also, happiness shouldn’t be earned on just spending money. This game is obviously a remake of the online “Business Tycoon” game where you own a button pusher company. You’ve got the idea right, just make it work.
keywords: Office Madness 2: Corporation, iyifikir, Games, Simulation, Strategy, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes
