Add anything - furniture, windows, wallpaper, and maybe even a tire swing, a baseball chair or a spaceship window! Make your house a fresh and wonderful place to raise your pets. + Cook treats! + Cook food with Chef Mitts and make paw-erful magic foods to evolve your pet into new pets! Visit the store to get more food, furniture and valuable treats. + Go on adventures! + Send your pets on 120+ hand-written story quests to help them grow and have fun! + Take Pakka Pets with you! + Check on your pets with the Apple Watch, or spread the joy in iMessage with 20 stickers and 16 animated stickers. Download Pakka Pets Village and start catching all of your animals, today! Pakka Pets Village Support: http://www.spaceinch.com
reviews: I love this game so much!!! This game really deserves more love and I can’twait for what updates will come to make it even more beautiful! This game is so great and it’s the best app I’ve ever played. It comes with lots of quests and every story is unique to how you play the game. You get to unlock different types of characters based on how you care for your Pakka and every. Single. Pakka has its own set of quests! That makes the game way more fun. There are so many areas to unlock full of life and more quests and there’s just so much to do, I hope it never stops! There are many activities you can do as well on your own such as level up your village, mine caves, grow a garden, decorate your village, and expand it, fill it with new characters you discover, make your own world! You can use the movie theater to catch food and gain sooo many hearts that allow you to trade from the infinite supplied shop and unlock more items and places with even more quests, and more! Developers, I see that the latest update was two years ago.  Please, please, please don’t stop! I would hate to see such a great and wonderful creation and world come to an end. Don’t let the game stop! I encourage you to continue bringing this game to life because this game really is worth it. Thank you for reading this and I hope this pushes you to keep updating the game and letting its world blossom. Thank you. 😊<3 I’m in love with your game and just can’t wait until an update comes to see what other awesome things await me. I’m a kid and just...l LOVE this game. I do have suggestions though, not that I don’t like the game as is but maybe if you can, try to follow these suggestions. The first one is that maybe you can make an update for this game. I only say this because I really want to see more cute adventures and more cute pets. So that’s why that one is number one. Number two is that if the notifications can be more about the game and not that it’s only based on the pet, what I mean is what if you can base different notifications on the  village that the players, including me, make. Now, I’m not saying to delete your notifications that you already have, but if you can please make some about your village. And those are my suggestions. OMG I can’t believe how much I wrote when I’m just a nine year old kid! Lol This game makes you want to spend money on the app. Reason being is because your pet can only generate limited hearts at a time and the supplies like food, medicine, decorations, etc are quite “pricey” for example one water is 7 hearts and one eggplant is 100 hearts. Your constantly buying and end up with no hearts so it does take a while to play this game. If you want to redecorate your community, once you place an object you cannot get a refund of hearts if you want to switch the placement so For me personally I find myself wasting many hearts when I’m decorating my pakka pets community. The quests in the app are fun but also one quest gives you one coin and sometimes the quests can be challenging. If you want to unlock more features you can unlock it for 16 quest coins which can take forever. Upgrading your level is also pricey. I know that the more pets you have you can get a reduced price to level up. I’m currently at 32 pets and the price to level up is 28,000 hearts which is insane I think. In general, this game is great and obviously addicting considering I got up to 32 pets (lol) I just wish that they don’t ask for so many hearts because it makes me want to spend real money on an app which I don’t mind if it’s once in a while , but I’ve been constantly buying packages of hearts because I kept running out of hearts all the time. ‼️

reviews: Hi! I absolutely love this game! It is fun, the songs are great, and it is overall amazing. But there is one little thing that annoyed me. Of course, it’s not that big of a deal but it is against my religion and some people don’t understand that. So when I got this game, I decided to put on notifications, because, why not. And now I’m annoyed I did that and turned them off because every single notification said “my g**! Your so lucky!” Blah blah blah. And I’m not allowed to say the lords name in vain, it is against my religion. Like I said, it’s not a big deal but I would love if you would say “gosh” or “goodness” instead. Besides that, I absolutely LOVE this game and you will NOT be disappointed! Sorry for the long review! Thanks 😃 If your a person who likes to play games with their friends online then this is the game for you. But if your a younger kid I would recommend staying away from it. Although it’s funny and comical, it’s not the most appropriate thing for kids. If you give the bunny the milk shake or the Pancake Milkshake™ Merger the pancake, a figure that symbolizes death comes in with a scythe and hits the Charente in the head. There for killing it. I feel that younger kids might find this sPancake Milkshake™ Mergery and should not be watching it. They might actually react like the kid in the movie. Well all in all it’s a great app for older kids with a competitive friend or two.

name: ‎Papa's Freezeria To Go!
description: Build and serve sundaes on the go with this brand-new version of Papa's Freezeria, with gameplay and controls reimagined for iPhone and iPod Touch! You've just started a relaxing summer job at an oceanfront ice cream shop, but things get hectic when all of Papa Louie's customers arrive on the island!  You'll need to whip up delicious Freezer sundaes by pouring ice cream, adding mixables and syrups, blending sundaes, adding whipped cream and toppings, and don't forget the cherry on top for a perfect summertime treat! You'll need to multitask between each area of the restaurant, with new controls designed to work just right in the palm of your hand.  Head to the Order Station to watch for customers waiting in the lobby.  Switch to the Build Station to combine ice cream and mixables for each sundae.  Jump to the Mix Station to mix sundaes until they're blended just right.  Hop to the Top Station to pour whipped cream and toppings before serving the sundae to your picky customers.  Each Station is a hands-on experience, where you'll need to drag, swipe, and tap your way through the sundae-building process. Keep your customers happy to earn points and level up.  As your level rises, you'll unlock new toppings for the shop, and new customers will start to visit the Freezeria!  A well-crafted sundae also earns you tips, which you can spend on upgrades and decorations for the lobby! ** NEW FOR PAPA'S FREEZERIA TO GO** Papa's Freezeria To Go is redesigned and reimagined for smaller screens, so your fingers won't get in the way of the action! CONTROL WITH YOUR THUMBS - You'll switch stations using buttons in the corners of the screen, perfect for your thumbs.  You can also use buttons in the top corners to quickly switch Order Tickets, and you can view all of your Order Tickets in a zoomed-in mode for easy reading. BUILD STATION - We've completely redesigned the Build Station for smaller screens.  The Pour Button and Bonus Meter are moved to the side and sized just right for your thumb, so you can watch the meter and tap at the right time without any fingers blocking your view.  When it's time to choose a mixable or a syrup, the entire screen is filled with large buttons so you can easily tap the correct item. MIX STATION - We've fine-tuned the Mix Station upgrades to work even better on small touch screens.  Once you purchase the Blend Alarm upgrades, you can drag these large alarms and snap them onto any blender.  Booster Buttons are also large and easy to press, and you can even use multi-touch to boost multiple blenders at once! TOP STATION - The Topping Bin carousel from "Papa's Burgeria To Go!" is back, which lets you top sundaes in a brand-new way!  Swipe the carousel of Topping Bins to choose the item you want to use, then grab the sundae cup to start pouring toppings evenly across the sundae.  You can also tap a button to switch to placeable items like cherries and cookies.  And with full multi-touch support, you can keep one finger sliding the bins and another tapping on the cup below, so you'll have those sundaes finished in no time! NEW INGREDIENTS - We've added a ton of new ingredients that can't be found in the classic or HD versions of the game, including mixables, syrups, whipped cream flavors, and other toppings that you'll unlock as you play the game.  There's over 70 unique ingredients for you to discover! **GAME FEATURES** - Hands-on ice cream shop in the Papa Louie universe - All new controls and gameplay designed for smaller screens - Multi-task between building, mixing, and topping - Shop to buy upgrades using your in-game tips - 85 customers to unlock with unique orders - Challenging Closers and Food Critic - 120 in-game achievements to earn **NOTE FOR iPAD USERS** Papa's Freezeria To Go is designed especially for smaller screens.  If you're looking for large-screen gameplay, check out "Papa's Freezeria HD" for iPad!
reviews: First of all, this game is definitely worth the .99. I play this game all the time on my phone and I never get tired of it! I love how you can have three different games so if you wanna restart you can but you still have progress from your other game. I love that when I finish a day on it that you sometimes get a new item, like a new topping or whipped cream flavor. I always get so excited! I’m on like day 90 something already and I’m still playing it! I think the little characters are so much fun! The only thing is that I got all the things in the shop very quickly and I wish there were more to buy. In the other apps you can move around the furniture and I think that would make this game a little more fun. Also you can’t create your own character like in the other ones. But I definitely recommend this game, so much fun!👍🏻👍🏻😍 What a throwback! I prefer having an app rather than on the computer but it doesn’t have everything that the computer version has. There’s a limited selection of things you can buy with your money. You can’t customize your character and there aren’t any clothes to buy. There’s also no tickets to collect or the mini games that accompany them. There’s no decor combos and you don’t get to design your shop, when you buy a decoration, it just automatically is set in a spot and you cannot move it. No color changes inside shop either. Almost not worth 99 cents but you don’t need internet connection to play and the general idea of the game is still intact so it was worth it for me as I used to play this game all the time. Would be better with more customization options No wonder it is half the price of the other papa’s games. This game is absolutely horrible. The quality is so low. It is nothing like the pictures and you’re better off paying an extra dollar for a different game. I am very disappointed that I’ve been scammed out of my money. Not everyone has money to just throw around and if you want to get a game you have to work for it. Please do not buy this game. I would love if they updated it so it would function the same as the 1.99$ ones with the same graphics and quality because quite frankly, I’ve never been so disappointed in a game. I could’ve went to iTunes and bought a song that would’ve been worth my money but instead I was ripped off by this absolutely horrible game on the App Store. I would greatly appreciate a response from the creator of the game. Flipline studios, please fix this game. Everyone thinking about buying it, don’t. And no I am not just some Karen looking for something to complain about I am legitimately upset over this horrible experience. Thank you.
keywords: Papa's Freezeria To Go!, Flipline Studios, Games, Strategy, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Quick Gun: PvP Standoff
description: Quick Gun is an online player vs player (PvP) cowboy standoff game. Choose your character, select your gun, and challenge other players in a western cowboy gun fight! Who will draw his/her gun faster? who will shoot first? Are you the Quickest? Quick Gun has a unique gameplay where you tilt your phone to draw your gun, and aim to shoot your opponent in a 360 3D Environment. You can play against strangers or you can challenge your friends. Unlock Many weapons and characters and compete to reach the top of the wanted leaderboard.  Are you going to win? or are you going to lose? will you have your redemption?
reviews: This is an excellent game, and I cannot believe the concept had not been used or at least popularized before. The only problem I see is that there is a glitch most likely to do with lag with your opponent, causing either them to be able to shoot you during the countdown or you can shoot them incredibly easily. If this bug is fixed, I think the game would be flawless. This is absolutely one of the best mobile games I’ve played in a LONG time. Absolutely love the concept, the setting, and super fun gameplay. I love how you and your opponent can see each other’s wins and losses. As long as this game continues to be updated, this could become one of the most popular games on the App Store. IAP’s aren’t bad either. All the purchases are cosmetic, and a lot of them (not all Ill note) can be earned without spending any money, and without having to grind for an unreasonable amount of time (some of the items are extremely expensive, and you would have to either use real money or grind a stupid amount of time. This is totally fine though because again, they’re purely cosmetic. I only have one real issue with the game, and that’s the lag. I’ve had it multiple times where I’ve clearly shot first (and hit my opponent), but it ended in a draw because it lagged. It’s also happened once where my opponent drew and shot me before the time even counted down. So once that’s fixed, this game will be even better :) If this game continuously updates the game  a lot, your looking at the #1 game in the App Store. Maybe the admins wanted to go a different direction from high noon, and that’s what it looks like to me. If they are smart they will make it like high noon 1 and 2. Now to be fair, this game isn’t where it should be compared to other games. For example, high noon, and high noon 2 were the best games I’ve ever played on the App Store. If this game wasn’t a one shot kill, you can customize your own character, you can join gangs, and play with real pvp players, this would be INCREDIBLE. It’s not always bots you play against, but more likely than not you will play against bots. This game still has a long way to go, so we will see what the admins will do to this game.
keywords: Quick Gun: PvP Standoff, Mad Hook, Games, Action, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Quantum Galaxy HD
description: *** ALL In-App Purchases are FREE as of February 3, 2015 until the XP saving bug is fixed! Conquer the new Quantum Galaxy for the first time in new HD with a unique "Transformable Ships" game mechanic, on top of smooth Tilt/Tap controls made specifically for the casual audience in this Incredible HD ON-RAILS 3D Space Shooter! Earn XP, Level-Up and Transform one of 3 BRAND-NEW HD playable ships on your 3+ hour journey through 20 BRAND-NEW HD action-packed ON-RAILS missions with JAW-DROPPING RETINA HD graphics EXCLUSIVELY on the iOS! For the first time, experience the never before seen innovation of the mobile ON-RAILS genre in HD as Quantum Galaxy gives you the ability to Transform your spaceship in real-time via the use of space Pods and Stations. Watch as your ship morphs before your eyes from a tiny spacecraft, to a formidable star-fighter, to a massive MINI-BOSS! All this, combined with a unique use of friendly AI Wingmen to aid you on your new action-packed journey through the Quantum Galaxy. Featuring: • Amazing cinematic ON-RAILS HD arcade action aimed at a casual audience! • Brand-new JAW-DROPPING RETINA HD graphics on all modern iOS devices • Full support for iPhone 5 and iPad with Retina display in HD • Tilt to steer your ship manually and avoid enemy bullets • Forgo tilting and Tap your enemies for a casual HD ON-RAILS experience • Master the game in minutes with intuitive controls and dynamic tutorial system • Control, Morph and Transform one of 3 brand new playable spaceships in HD • Earn XP to Level-Up and FREELY unlock new playable ships and 13 different HD shields and weapons • Skip the RPG Grind with Optional In-App purchases • Explore the vast Quantum Galaxy via the 20 brand new action-packed HD missions! • Like never before: morph your ship in real-time using space Pods and Stations • Defend Space Outposts and team up with friendly HD AI Wingmen • Face more than 25 types of HD enemies with Gigantic Bosses in every level! • Experience over 45 minutes of original HD orchestral music • Game Center support with 7 unique Leaderboards and 18 challenging Achievements • Near-endless replay value with Dynamic Difficulty and Randomized Enemies • No boring or complicated Sci-Fi story. Only non-stop arcade HD action that is accessible to all players with no language barrier! >> Game Play Basics: Steer your ship manually by tilting your device left and right, or tap your enemies to engage the ON-RAILS "Autopilot". To maximize damage, it is best to be facing your enemies directly before pressing the right "Weapons/Fire" button. Holding the left "Shield" button will allow you to deflect all enemy projectiles. Prolonged use of the Weapons/Shields will cause a temporary overload. Note that it is NOT possible to fire your weapons while Shields are active until you level-up your starship and unlock Translucent Shielding at Level 5. In addition, completing missions, earning XP and leveling-up your ship to Level 5 will also unlock new playable spacecraft for FREE. You may also skip the RPG grind and instantly level-up via the use of optional In-App Purchases. Each In-App Purchase can also be Restored, thus allowing you to instantly unlock playable ships on multiple iOS devices. YouTube game play trailer: http://youtu.be/wpAzofgjmKE
reviews: I enjoy the game however saving progress appears to be partially busted. It saves your progress through the levels just fine, but as others have mentioned it seems to reset your xp back to level 3. The only way around this I've found is once I hit level 3 I sit down for a while and play all the way until I unlock the next ship. This seems to work to save my progress. Also, there are only about 20 levels all of which are very similar, maybe slightly more difficult, but that's it. You could beat the whole game in a day if you wanted. Probably over priced especially with the saving bug and the in-app purchases. The game has been saving my level progress but it stopped saving my XP for my ship. I can not get any other ships or the last upgrades for my current ship and it's a bit aggravating. This game would be a 5 star if that could be fixed.
keywords: Quantum Galaxy HD, Miles Godspeed, Games, Casual, Simulation, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

reviews: a few major thingsfirstly no sound or music, and it would really facinate me if there was music.second, the AI even on slow builds way too fast, i see it building like 2 battlestars at a time! that aint fair, and i cant build fast enough, i cant even get past level 0. thirdly, the bases have no defense, and id like it if that bases have greater defense the more they are upgraded, and im vulnerable.Lastly, difficulty setting for the levels please?because i cant get past lvl 0. like an easy, medium, hard. the AI is super hardddddddi have a couple suggestions now.Create your own map? like put bases and outposts and ships wherever you want.and connect to gamecenter because i want to challenge my friend.other than that, the game is pretty good The game used too be fun with my favorite thing being the two players on the same iPad but now I can't even play it anymore and have fun, what I mean by that is anytime I try too play It the ai always wins, I don't even know how too use the controls, so finally my only request is that the game is made easy right too learn the controls and that the two player mode is readded. I can't disagree...  I'm going through growing pains on trying to differentiate the two Quasar Phases.  This one is moving towards online play, while Quasar Phase : Battle Room is staying true to the original (and it supports up to 4 players).

name: ‎Sand in a Box - Pixel Physics
description: Sand in a Box is a falling sand simulation app. Just touch the screen to see how grains of sand fall and form stacks. Just try it and you see how fun it is to form landscapes out of sand or watch the water flow. Features: - Sand Physics: Watch how sands falls and interacts with wall and water. - intuitive controls: touch the screen to "paint" the sand. - 9 solid materials: brick, concrete, metal, foam, sponge and more. - Different colors of sand! - Fluids: water and oil, with different colors that now can be mixed together! - 8 special elements: acid, lava, TNT, bacteria and more. Version 4.0 introduced new simulation algorithm. As some reviewers suggested, they liked older version better, so this new algorithm returns to original simulation from 2011 and makes it even better. Now particles move more freely making simulation more dynamic and there's no more randomization involved in simulation. Version 5.00 takes it even further introducing many new elements to play with, 35 in total from just 4 in previous releases. Box has no bottom anymore, particles that fall on the bottom will appear on top. If you're thinking with portals you know what I mean. Now you can create endless waterfalls or sandfalls and redirect particles in any way.
reviews: So I was excited because it had more updates but my disappointment came back in because you had to pay for the stuff and I do not think my parents would do it. Also, it was as slow as usual and you cannot tilt the materials. You guys said “ 35 materials “ but the materials were locked until bought. I would recommend up tasing the changes to this and like I said to unlock the materials cuz I was really interested in the rainbow sand. I wouldn’t really recommend to friends. Hope this was helpful! :> I loved this game however it wasn't long before the limits of 5 materials got to me. I think this game could use more materials like acid, or metal, or even fire. Overall 3 stars. Could be 4 or 5 with some work

name: ‎Table Tennis 3D Champion
description: Ping Pong is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level.  With our brand new app, you will have both, a lot of fun and a nice competition while trying to beat all the other countries from around the globe on a Table Tennis World Tour. You simply choose the country you want to play for and then start your journey to become the best Ping-Pong​ player of them all. The Ping Pong rules are exactly the same as in real life: - Each player has two serves in a row - A match ends when one player has 11 points with at least 2 points in the lead - If the score is 11:10 the match continues until one player has achieved a 2 point lead - During this overtime the players alternate after every serve You control your bat with by swiping your finger. The fast you swipe the harder you will hit the ping pong ball. Since this control scheme feels just natural, our Ping Pong app allows you to do everything you could do in real life. Surprise your opponent with a heavy power smash or throw him off guard with a vicious undercut. Learn to use the whole table and place your shots as precisely as possible.  But be aware: the further you progress in the ​game, the more experienced and tough your opponents will become. You’re not the only one who has mastered the art of trick shots and spinning physics. Make your way through the ranks and lead your country to the top spot of the World Championship in this 3D table tennis app. Features: - 3D Ping Pong - Table Tennis World Tour - Realistic Ping Pong Physics - One of the best sports games - Choose your own country - Become the Ping Pong Master

name: ‎Tactical Sailing Tips 2.0
description: Sailing on the go – Tactical Sailing Tips Whether a rookie or a professional sailor, everyone interested in the sport of sailing can find a selection of the most important tips needed to steer your boat the "Right of Way", to take the wind from the best side and to also make use of tactical maneuvers while racing against other opponents.  The main purpose of this app is to visualize the paths sailed in 16 tips overall as animated video clips for following advanced racing tactical situations:  - speed of boats, - position of sails, as well as direction and strength of wind, - for tactical maneuvers against the wind, - basic Right of Way Rules (ISAF / World Sailing). All animations are presented as video clips, comments can be printed out (pdf) as an extension to the tips and their simulated scenes, which you should watch on your iPhone or iPad. After downloading you can use the tips without internet access to take with you on your yacht.  In 2012 these tips were awarded winner of the "European Award for Technology Supported Learning - Best Media Didactics!“  iPhone and iPad: This App, however, is only the first step into the world of sailing. Designed for iPad, it will also display on iPhone, but of course in smaller sizes of videos. The first three tips are with sound, the others are without sound, it is  because of memory allocation restrictions (150 MB). Therefore the text is a useful extension for iPhone because of its small font size, print and read the comments in a .pdf file. The video clips are sized to be presented on Apple TV. These tips - and further 40 tips - are part of a game: "Tactical Sailing - A Game Against the Wind" and “Boat Against Boat” and "Coach´s Toolbox".  If you want to have fun with a powerful Tactic and Strategy game,  see a demo for free and order it on our website: www.Tacticalsailing.com - runs on Mac and PC.  Keep in touch with other Tactical Sailors Lounge and coaches, see the race board, news and Info online. © Photo front page: Fried Elliott.
summary: Tactic + Right of of Way rules

reviews: Once upon a time, there lived a tiger named Olivia, wandering through the woods for a mate. When she found a tiger that could be her mate, she found out her mate wasn’t in love with her. Then one day, Olivia found the tiger fighting a lion. I went to help him fight and we won. After we fought, he was in love with me now, and we became mates. His name was Stripes, btw. Later, I was pregnant and we had our cub. It was a girl and we named her Sarah. But then one day, when she wandered off while Olivia and Stripes were still asleep, she never came back. When the 2 of us woke up, we realized that Sarah was gone. We went out to look for her, but we couldn’t find her. I was never gonna have another cub and when we went back home, we just laid down, looking sad for the rest of our lives.5 years later...When we woke up to find Sarah again, we didn’t find her, but then we saw another tiger that looked like Sarah, because it was her, and she had a mate of her own and she was pregnant! Her mate’s name was Demetrius btw, just then I saw Sarah was fighting a pack of bears. Olivia was panicked, and she fought off the bears. It was a deadly fight, but she did it. She limped over to Sarah and found out that her cub was born! It was a girl and we named it Clover. After that, we all headed back home and we lived happily ever after. The End Please add a improved dog simulator, the one you have made previously is not the best. You can't breed, it is under dated, and it has many glitches. Please please!! I love your games, I have all of the new and updated games. Again, I think you should be able to breed cross breeds like between a German Shepard and a bulldog. And please make more dens. More than four dens please! And I'm not trying to be pushy, but can you make the games quicker?! I am constantly looking in the App Store and end up not finding anything new. Also where do people find out what app is coming soon? So many people in the comments say that this is coming out and that is coming out, but I want to know what is coming out early too. I know that people want to know about the early releases of your apps. So if you could create a website with the apps you are working on so people can get ready and get money for it. They can get there thumbs ready for the joy sticks and buttons on the side. Again, I want you to make a new dog simulator. And if I may, I would like to suggest dog breeds, wimmariner, vesla, yorkie, downmation, great dain, Doberman, pamaranian, pug, husky, Labrador, German Shepard, beagle, pit bull, poodle, shih tzu, boxer, Chihuahua, and cross breeds. Deffanition: cross-breedA mix between two different kinds of animals.THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME!!

reviews: The PC version of this game has multiplayer, but the mobile version does not.  The single player modes aren’t nearly as fun as multiplayer, but the driving mechanics in the game are pretty great overall.  The controls translate well to mobile.  There aren’t super noticeable performance differences between car classes - for example, the stock car is basically as fast as a formula one car on Monaco.  For me, there’s little reason to play this game alone - if I could form a league with my friends, this game would be amazing.

reviews: This is a good game, with far better graphics than iDrone, but surely a much better UAV game is out there.  I'd be happy with better 3D graphics and a less cluttered interface.  Still, it's fun and you really can get the feeling of flying the Predator, especially pulling the nose up to execute slow, tight turns in narrow mountain valleys.  I'm a pilot and it really does remind me of mountain flying at times, with the help of the accelerometer.  I'd love to find an app that really is a total simulation of flying a Predator, since the actual UAV combat experience is so much like a video game to begin with.

description: Ranked Top 3 free iPad Game in the USA and #1 free iPad app in Canada and Hong Kong! ========================================== Player reviews on iTunes: "If you were a fan of sim tower, this is ten times better because there are objectives instead of aimless building. Makes it fun and more challenging. In app purchases available but for a free game, this one is a TEN!"  "Cool little management game - That doesn't force you to buy stuff to have fun. I like it."  "I love Vegas .... - This is one of the best iPad game, got addicted with it. Bravo guys.."  "I love the funny comments those little people say when you click on them, ie, "My bag`s full of free bath soap". "There`s a free bible in my room". Alot of thought and detail have been put into this great looking game."  "Absolute Treat - This game combines the best parts of SimTowers, The Sims, and Sim City!"  "Awesome game - This game rocks. I always said most casinos appeared like they were run by drunken monkeys, now I can see how much better I can do! The pelvic thrusting dance moves in the club are amazing :)"  ***************************************************************** Tower above the Las Vegas skyline with your brand new Mega-Resort! Build your own luxury skyscraper from the ground up, manage hundreds of hotels, restaurants, and entertainment venues, and prosper from the thousands of visitors you'll attract. Compete with thousands of other players in real-time to dominate the Vegas Strip! FEATURES: Gorgeously detailed simulation engine - zoom in and watch as groups of visitors stroll through your bustling tower. Tap on individuals to find out where they are going and what they have to say! Over 100 different types of units to build, including Honeymoon Suites, Casinos, Steakhouses, Nightclubs, and Rooftop Helipads! Over 200 objectives to complete! Level up your tower while earning extra cash and favors to spend on new units and upgrades. Respond to special events such as fires, shoplifters, cockroach infestations, and VIP visits - handle them appropriately and you'll be rewarded handsomely! Scope out the competition by visiting other towers, and see how your tower stacks up with real-time rankings. Talk with your neighbors using in-game chat. Manage noise and productivity levels within your tower to ensure that your occupants are happy! Detailed statistics and a constantly-updated online reference help you optimize to your heart's content. Will your tower be a high-end paradise for fashionistas? A culinary beacon for food and wine enthusiasts? The hottest spot for celebrity nightlife? Or home to the best in live concert entertainment? It's all up to you! --------------------------------------------- If you are having trouble launching the app, please follow the steps here- http://support.apple.com/kb/TS1702?viewlocale=en_US Please go to http://siuyiu.helpshift.com/a/vegastowers/ for help if you have trouble logging into your account or have lost towers after updating.
reviews: This game is one of my favorites. There is no pressure to compete against other players for time. This is the perfect game of relaxation if you have the patience to wait for the next day should you run out of favors. Favors are always free. You can get 750 free favors every month making the game free to play. I’m in no way trying to cheat the developer out of making money so don’t take these hints as doing so. They’re simply things the developer have offered so that everyone can play at there own pace. Don’t expect to complete what the game has to offer in one day of playing, remember relaxation and patience. Those are the virtues of playing. The very first goal should be your maid station. You are able to use one favor to clean all of your rooms at once. After that it’s all down hill. Take your time and place each favor costing item in the place that you want to keep it. You cannot move an item without costing additional favors. Remember take your time relax and return each day for more fun. The game will never disappoint. I actually play this game all the time! People say there's nothing you can do when you go to a neighbor's tower, but there IS! You can pay fines for roach infestations, help by paying to rebuild their burnt down restaurants, and pay to restock in their stores where theft has occurred. You can only pay for 25 such events per day, any of your choosing, but be careful because the money comes from your funds that you're building YOUR hotel with. Don't worry too much thought, because you accumulate money quickly in this game. Pace yourself when spending favors though, because those do not come as quickly and easily. As yet, I have found no cheats, so you really have to play with it and kinda learn things as you go along. It's the closest thing I've found to Sim Tower, but in my opinion, a little better, because you have goals to achieve, and you get rewarded in game favors and money (which, in the beginning, won't be much). Sorry for the long review, but I tried to be as thorough and as helpful as I could 😊. This is a fun tower building game, one of my favorites for sure~ feel cool when you built fast food & retail stores~ it will make the game more addictive if there is instruction what to do to increase business so you are able to expand your tower.
keywords: VegasTowers HD, SuperFine Games Limited, Games, Simulation, Casino, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Vietnam...'65
description: It is 1965 and the US ground war in Vietnam is in full swing. As a US Army commander, wage a counter-insurgency (COIN) war to secure the Ia Drang valley, on the border with Cambodia. In order to win the Hearts and Minds of the local population you will need to search for and destroy the Vietcong (VC) insurgents, who infiltrate from the Ho Chi Minh trail and destabilize the province by intimidating the locals, laying mines and ambushing your forces. The insurgents also have a bigger brother, the North Vietnamese Army (NVA). This well trained, conventional army have much wider ambitions than the VC, they want to take total control of the valley, a stepping stone to unifying North Vietnam with the South under communist rule. The NVA conducts operations from across the border, primarily aimed at supporting the insurgency and launching offensives when the time is right.  To carry out your COIN mission, co-ordination of ground troops, special forces, artillery, mechanized units, training of local forces (ARVN) and airmobile assets is essential, but of greater consequence is winning the support of the local population. With greater co-operation from the local inhabitants comes the reward of intelligence, a key factor in COIN warfare. The war is not fought in isolation, so as the commander of the US forces, you will have the added complexity of managing the support for the war back home, should you the lose the Hearts and Minds of the American people, the war will also be surely lost. This is a game that captures the true essence of the Vietnam War, where airmobile operations are paramount, fire support bases play a critical role and air strikes can save the day. Rise through the ranks and watch your personalized uniform transform from a junior Lieutenant to General as you relive the Vietnam War. Features - Hearts and Minds victory conditions - Political support model - Full range of US units including transport helicopters, APC’s, armor, Gunships, Engineers etc - Firebases and artillery support - Special Forces operations (Green Berets) - Operational intelligence map - Training of South Vietnamese Army (ARVN) - Napalm strikes - Medevacs and in field repairs - Minesweeping and ambushes - Full logistical model - Road and base construction  - NVA offensives
reviews: This is a very good game as is, but  it would be cool if there were some objectives for the US force and more ways for the VC and NVA to disrupt you. It would also be cool if you could play as the VC and NVA This game is a great and the customization has made it better. They have finally introduced something that usually would only be on PC. I love playing Sim City and tearing down the jungle with engineers and introducing roads to "civilize" these VC savages. But I don't make it that far before Charlie comes and messes up my infrastructure. The complaint I have is that because every map is always separated by a river which makes it hard to link up to other villages we need PT BOATS to cruise up and down the river for firebase support and patrol it is a MUST. That or a faster way with engineer units to drop farther east and setup a network to link. PLEASE WE NEED PT BOATS! One of the very few games that deal with COIN operations in a simple strategic level that actually make sense and feel authentic. My review is 4 and a half stars. Great job. Keep these coming.UPDATE Charlie still don't surf but man did the update make the game better. Would love to be able to punish a village for a hit to H&M but forced intel and the addition of medics. But as it is, it's a great game made even better.
keywords: Vietnam...'65, Slitherine, Games, Reference, Simulation, Strategy, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎War 2 Victory
description: Based on the hit WAR2 browser game with 3,000,000 monthly active users across multiple platforms, the FREE MMO strategy game War 2 Victory now lands on App Store. Seek honor and glory in the battlefields of WWII. Take charge of either Allied or Axis forces and build a lone outpost into a mighty war machine. --BUILD your city from scratch --Form alliances to EXPAND your territory --Raise and COMMAND an unstopable army --Crush and CONQUER your enemy ***Highlights*** -Expert battle system. Rapid turn-based combat puts you in charge, allowing intricate control of over 30 historically accurate units. Crush your enemies with massed infantry, a blitzkrieg of tanks, swooping bombers, mighty battleships, or stand unconquerable behind an invincible line of fortifications.  -Detailed Resource Management. Control multiple cities, each producing a variety of resources, and manage a growing workforce. Build up your industry, feed your army, and turn your citizens into soldiers or factory workers.  -Develop new technologies to unlock powerful new units, strengthen old ones, or boost your industry.  -Play with thousands of people across the globe. Form powerful Alliances with fellow players to crush your opponents and wage epic wars against other alliances.  -Intuitive missions system guides you through your early development, assuring you get right into the action.  - Free to download and play! ***Comments from players of its browser-based version*** "Tons of fun. Reminds me of the old turn based strategy games like Civ 2. " "Love the battles. The turn system works very well, fights are fast." "Love it, love it, LOVE IT!" ***Community*** Join our Facebook Fans Group http://www.facebook.com/war2victory Visit our forum for guides and more: http://community.wistone.com
reviews: old version is 100 times better than new version. i like the new version but cmon you dont have to removed all the old version avatars for profile and others stuff. and its bad. you should change the old version back but i give you three credit star for making new image of troops thats are cool. This game used to be very fun and Wistone was actually making many improvements but now it's nothing but a money pit and it's very unbalanced because regular troops are useless. Wistone doesn't listen to it's customers and made it so you have to pay to be competitive. Only ultra troops can compete and you need to build level 10 buildings to make those and each building upgrade to lvl 10 costs 500 diamonds ($5). You'll need 10-12 upgraded buildings per city and if 14-15 cities ...totally insane unless you have lots of money to spend on a generic graphic online game (14x10=140x$5=$700). Then you'll need gear, medals etc and the top gear is ~20-50k diamonds per set ($100 = 16k diamonds). Wistone took a fun game that allowed players at all levels some fun but now it's ridiculous how much they want everyone to spend ..and you'll need to spend it unless you like living in truce cuz you'll be wiped in one attack wave if u don't. Currently I am one of the top 10 players on my server. Unless you are willing to pay 10's of thousands of dollars on this game you will not be successful. This game is managed by people who can't speak english and its very very difficult to communicate with them if you have a problem which happens often. I have been playing for several years and unless you can play 10 hours each day and are extremely wealthy this game is a waste of time. Even if you have several to 50 accounts on a single server to try to get an advantage and to save $$ it won't work. Don't waste your time playing this game becuz it has very many flaws.  The server crashes a lot and is extremely laggy quite often and continues to stay that way for many days at a time in which u are unable to play the game. name: ‎War Plane: Airplane Games Wing
description: Explore unlimited fun on your mobile with War Plane. With this skill-based game, you can improve your focus and decision-making skills. Players can choose their favorite plane to dodge missiles coming from different directions. By playing this game, you will get a chance to fly the plane. You have to survive your aircraft from missiles. Use your smart mind to get rid of weapons, such as lure them to ram into each other and explode. Collect points to improve your score and unlock new planes. Dodging the infinite bombardment of missiles with your concentration is easy. Increase your risk level to get more rewards. While luring missiles, you have to fly near them, such as near-miss. If missiles enter in the red zone, your fever bar will go up and drag you in “Fever Mode.” Once your fever bar is full, the missiles in your trail will blow up, permitting you to reprobate in significant points within a specific duration. To dodge missiles, you have to make quick maneuvers and different turns. If you want to hit maximum missiles in Fever Mode, you have to make sweeping and broad turns. Every consecutive rocket will give you the higher score, so catch maximum bullets. War Plane has 10+ different plans, but you can’t access them immediately. You have to complete various levels to get new planes. Your achievements will help you to unlock these planes. For instance, if you need a red light, you have to burst 15 missiles in on row. Keep it in mind that your activities in Fever Mode will not help you to get a red plane. War Plane can keep you engaged for a longer duration with its unique challenges. You have to use your mind to blast missiles strategically. The purpose of these missiles is to follow your plane. Players will try to handle tight turns to confuse rockets, but this move can go against you. It is not possible to predict the location of missiles. These will appear consistently from all directions so that you can win this game with free turns. Stay on a straight path or make moves to dodge missiles. In short, once you start playing this game, it will be difficult for you to quit. Install it now in your device and start playing. This game will be an excellent exercise for your brain.

name: ‎X-Plane Control Pad
description: For X-Plane Mac/Windows/Linux 11.00 and later: When the Pros fly their flight simulators for currency-checks, an instructor is hiding behind the scenes, setting location, weather, and inducing simulated aircraft failures during the flight test. The goal is to survive the flight… despite the impossible weather, aircraft weight and balance, and equipment failures that are being triggered by the devilish instructor cowering behind the pilot. Now, you can get this experience in X-Plane for Macintosh, Windows, and Linux personal computers by running this App on your iPad or iPhone (…with, of course, a willing tormentor to set all the various failures at the worst-possible time! Or just set them yourself.. the interface is clean and fast. Here is how it works: Simply fire up X-Plane on your Macintosh, Windows, or Linux personal computer and Control Pad on your iPhone or iPad. As long as they are all logged into the same WIFI network, they will see each other, and: Viola! You now have an Instructor Operator Station for X-Plane on your iPhone or iPad! Now, on your iPad, you can load aircraft, set location, set the weight and balance of the airplane you are flying, set the weather in X-Plane, see a map complete with plan and profile views to see how well you are flying your approaches, and even induce any of the aircraft equipment failures possible in X-Plane (currently, about 1,000 possible failures!) So, with this App, you can take X-Plane from a fun flight simulator up to a pro-level training experience.. assuming, of course, that you can handle the heat.
reviews: I can tolerate the lackluster UI. The thing that really annoys me is the fact that every time I turn it on, the plane I’m flying runs out of fuel. Turning on the app doesn’t change the plane’s location or the current weather so I can’t understand why the fuel level needs to change. Even if they can’t change that, they should at least leave some fuel in the tanks. If I want to change weather during a flight, I don’t want the plane to drop like a stone because the tanks empty.

reviews: This game is SO❤️addicting! I love ❤️ it! I play it every day. I am TOTALLY recommending this app to you! It’s legit the best app I’ve ever had and have right now! I love decorating dresses, but... one problem: whenever the person comes that asks if you want a new dye or pattern it always says ‘Ads are not ready yet’ and I keep clicking it but it just doesn’t work 😔. One more thing... when it asks if you want a new dress there’s NO point in watching the ad because once I clicked ‘Lose It’ and I still got the new dress without watching an ad because the next person that comes all ways asks for the new dress so it gives the new dress to you for free and not watching an ad, because if you don’t have the dress you can’t do the level so yet again it gives you the new dress for free.By the way I know it says ‘LaughingLiz’ at the bottom but really, my name is NOT Liz and I’m NOT laughing. I just thought it was a cool thing. But maybe this is better! ‘Holly ‘o Jolly!Thanks,LaughingLiz I mean, it’s an ok game. But there’s a lot of room for improvement. 1. The “masks” are really annoying. They’re usually not cute and when you “peel” them away, you just see the unfinished white dress underneath. It would be better if there could be a color underneath them. Not only that, but you can’t choose when or when not to use the masks, and you can’t choose which mask to use. Very annoying. 2. The “jewels” that just randomly appear in the dress at the finish and ruin your design because you didn’t know they were coming and didn’t plan to compliment them. 3. There is just so much that the game chooses for you, like the masks and jewels, etc. It would be better if it would let you choose that kind of stuff in a way that works coincide with the customer’s wishes. 4. The spray paint almost always turns out hideous. I paid to get rid of ads. But I still get 4x less reward for every round that I don’t watch an ad. I still have to watch ads for certain upgrades or unlocks. And VIP rounds can only be unlocked by ads. None of this is covered in that fee. It only covers the pop up ads between rounds.On top of that, the controls are awful. There’s several modes. They pick them in what seems like completely random order. They just go ahead and apply some things, like colors and decals randomly, with no input from you at all at all. You can’t rotate the dummy for most of the modes. I can’t reach the back of the shirt/dress in the spray paint round at all. You don’t get to choose the decal, ever. You can unlock the accents, but they’ll choose which to apply randomly and they’re always in a set pattern. The result is less “Yes Dress!” And more just a cacophony. I wanted a cute, quick, dress up sort of game. I’m usually embarrassed at what I end up with, not feeling like I made something cute.

name: ‎Yubi-Toko
description: “Yubi-Toko” is a touchpanel system in which users can walk in a snowy scene using their fingers and feel the difficulty in moving forward caused as generated by illusory haptic feedback. The user can walk on the virtual ground by scrolling the display. By changing the ratio between the displacement of the finger and the amount of scroll of the visual ground, we aim to provide users with illusory haptic feedback as the perception of difficulty in moving forward. You will feel illusory resistance when walking on new-fallen, deep snow area. In contrast, you can move forward on ice-encrusted or dirty snow ground. description: Zombie Gunship® Free is the fully-featured, free, ad-supported version of Zombie Gunship®. Zombie Gunship® puts you in the gunner seat of a heavily-armed AC-130 ground attack aircraft. reviews: I have played this game/app before and I found it boring in the beginning. But, now I see that some improvements have been made to the free version of this game and now that those improvements are now within this game it's much better that before. I welcome future improvements to better make this game more realistic and fun for anyone who plays it's and likes to destroy zombies. I hope that they keep both versions of this excellent game free for all the world to have and enjoy!! I have always loved the AC-130 Spectre gunship, so, naturally, I couldn't wait to try Zombie Gunship!  If you enjoy blowing up zombies (a nice way to vent without targeting people), this is a game to check out.  Love the nod to actual gunship tactics by only fighting nocturnally. Cool Infra-red night scope targeting images differentiate between zombies and the humans you are trying to save.  Lots of fun with several different scenarios that vary in tactical situation and difficulty to keep it interesting. Nothing like taking out a few zombies for breakfast with a C 31!  The night vision use is sweet the 40 mm to the 101 mm to mini gun pretty accurate aim then the different zones as well just great need new awards a little more kinks only cause a little limited cause you can kill so many lol other wise highly suggest loading this  sucker, I play with my I Pad comes all together

name: ‎Zombie Apocalypse Survival Kit
description: The Zombie Apocalypse is coming! What will you do when hordes of flesh eating undead overwhelm your city? Are you prepared to survive the onslaught? You have some choices to make: Shotgun or Chainsaw? Knife or Pistol? Or perhaps you dig in and lay low until the first onslaught dies down. In that case you'll need a Zombie Apocalypse Survival Kit! Get in now - this is the same kit approved by the CDC (Centers for Disease Control)! Well, sort of. I mean, we started with that list, and injected it with some tasty juice so it's not as dry as your Aunt's Thanksgiving turkey. Bonus materials included! Types of Zombies, Zombie History, Weapons, and most important - how to kill em' dead!
reviews: This is an ok read. The only draw back that is REALLY noticeable is most of the content looks rushed as there is so much missing on zombie killing. To be honest it reads like a 12 year old wrote the app with out a spell checker or their parents proof reading before published. It's been a long time since I've read so many words missing in the middle of a sentence. It also seems it was written using an iPhone considering the amount of words it seems has auto completed. (Think most articles you read on Yahoo) All in all its a good waste of time for about 5 minutes. With the amount of apps out I'd honestly pass this one up and just go for finding a few of your friends to repeatedly kick you in the balls as you will enjoy both just about as much! The programmer attempts to be funny on various topics and the guide itself is poorly written.  It claims that "cold hard cash" will be the only form of currency when society collapses because ATMs will no longer work..  I'm quite sure that pieces of paper will lose their value, but crops, animals, and clean water would replace them.  It also claims that a chainsaw is more effective than a gun because it doesn't need "ammo"; Chainsaws need GAS and OIL to start.  Which has the most finite supply of any other resources on the planet.  Get a better author and spellchecker!
keywords: Zombie Apocalypse Survival Kit, Anarchy Enterprises, Entertainment, Games, Action, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎ZDAY Survival Simulator
description: Excellent Player resources and help from the developers can be found on player forums: http://forums.mongadillo.com New Game Engine!  Greatly improved player controls, much better UI, enhanced gameplay puts more control of your items and survival party in your hands! This version is compatible with all iPad versions, and iPhone 3GS and later, and iPod touch 3G and 4G "For those of a certain age who loved adventure game books, it’s the perfect app to play and one that players will find themselves returning to. Not least because they’ll have to be pretty skilled to ‘win’!"  4 out of 5 stars - Jennifer Allen, 148 Apps.com "I've been having a blast with this since it's essentially gameifies what runs through my head whenever I read or watch a piece of zombie content, but it's also solid production-wise. I heartily recommend this to anyone that still has an itch for zombies, or even an appreciation of primarily text-based titles." ~ 4/5 stars - Brad Nicholson, Toucharcade "ZDAY is a 21st century text-based Simulator game that puts you the player in tough, real-world situations. The game play is easy and you can soon control it well." ~ 4/5 stars - Top10app.com "4/5 Stars" - Dan Zuccarelli, Gamezebo.com What better way to survive a full blown apocalypse than to PRACTICE? This is not a traditional shooter or an arcade style game where you poke buttons to shoot digital bullets at virtual zombies.  ZDAY is a 21st century text-based Simulator that puts you the player in tough, real-world situations and says "what would YOU do?". Created and Designed by Animator and Director Ed Anderson, and beautifully illustrated by renowned DC comics artist Matt Haley, ZDAY is an intelligent adventure game that starts you in a crowded suburb at ground zero of a full blown infection, and says "what would you do?". Faced with one scenario after another, the player has to make choices that will either lead him to escape the zombie-filled suburbs or perish like so many others. The sophisticated game engine keeps track of every decision that you make, and keeps a running tab on your survival probability based on the choices you make.  So keep your wits about you, and choose carefully, because one wrong move could have you facing a zombie horde or roving bands of trigger-happy looters.   The detailed results given after the player has completed the challenge provides very useful insight to what he may have done right and wrong. If the player wants to try again he can, and since the game engine reshuffles many of the exact events, ZDAY Survival Simulator is never exactly the same twice.
reviews: Still to this day I like this game no wait. I love this game just because it's a nice little zombie apocalypse roleplaying survival simulator that I don't quite see a game a lot like this I'd really enjoyed playing it that I kept replaying it to get different endings and do different choices in each time I play to see if I can get better results in the end. I definitely am addicted to this game and I recommend it if you are into zombie roleplaying games I know it's been a long time that the developers haven't made a single new update for this game in years and there is a bug were you can get stuck in a scenario were you run to escape from the police after a gun fight with them, the moment when the game tells you that you got injured no choices pops up and you can't do anything but to close down the app and start over and I don't think that the developers will ever fix this because like I said it's already a long time that this game didn't get a single new update, I can only hope that the developers can read this review and fix this problem. Overall this game is an underrated masterpiece the developers or anyone should definitely make more games like this we need more zombie roleplaying games such like this and I would pay good money to anyone that does make it. I rate this 4/5 stars as good. I understand the whole game system along with almost every people who downloaded this wonderful game. the only problem it lacked was the in depth tutorial about how much damage each weapon causes and battling issues: the battling issues are that we do not know, in depth, if we actually hit the target (zombies/bad guys). sometimes the first few battles requires more than 7 taps on the "fight " button. i couldn't kill the enemy in the end due to not knowing if the weapons or the characters aiming / hits / damage are inaccurate or weak. I am not sure about this game. there's still a lot of work to fix in the game via the battling and weaponry. This game was fun at first but quickly got boring. I explored, bought story packs, and made it to level 20 in less than a month but as time went on the problems began to become more obvious. First of all, there's no real way to contact the developers. Secondly, it hasn't been updated since 2014. Thirdly, my exploration with a vehicle still costs me food. And last but not least, crafting. There's no posted crafting guide. So here I have things like powdered milk, can openers, wood saw, and HAM radio with nothing to do to them. I was hoping to maybe contact a group with the ham radio. My generator doesn't do anything. And things like a GPS do nothing. So here's a wood to developers. Update Update Update!!! Things like a gas generator and a can of gas should make a working gas generator to make a source of electricity. From there and electric fence should be possible. It doesn't take 4 things to craft some materials. Some things can take more and some can take less. Put a hell of a lot more stories! We want them. Make cars dependent on gas. And one more idea, if I search a hospital, why would I find fishing line!? I should find a vitamin. Therefore, makes available resources location based. Like a police station can have body armor. A military armory, a weapon. A parking lot, a car or car parts. You can do so much more with this game, cars, weapons, crafting, and defenses. Update it already!!!
keywords: ZDAY Survival Simulator, Mongadillo Studios Inc., Games, Action, Simulation, Entertainment, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Zombie Motors
description: Protect the zombie apocalypse! Zombies have won! But their peaceful unliving is at risk of an imminent invasion! Time to dust off your brains and get to constructing the deadliest machines! Defend the zombie cities and fight off the hordes of enemies with nothing but your constructive genius and destructive tools! Challenge the creations of thousands of other players and prove that you are the best zombie engineer there is! FEATURES: - Gear up your car with over a hundred parts and weapons! - Thrilling PvP duels! - Tons of free bonuses and updates!
reviews: It’s creative, intuitive, and I haven’t played a game on my phone like this long (for hours) in many months just because I couldn’t really find anything that was working for me. So far this is really working for me.    The construction is surprisingly easy to manage. When I say intuitive I mean that it seems to work out if you’re  working on a single arm and decided it needs to be moved or just a section somewhere else there is minimal fumbling except when i sometimes choose an item toward the top of the screen and it pulls down my phone menu.   The battles are really fun to watch as your creation goes “battlebot” on the opponent in a physics based automaton.  A couple issues though. It can be difficult to level sometimes because you need fuel to fight the computer and you feel like your creation almost had them so you make minor tweaks and get closer but even if it’s a tie with more health you still loose gas (plus there is a smidge of luck involved because of the physics based combat) Also it would be nice if you could sell off some of your unused items for more resources.  I don’t know if the nuts are just for buying more gold or if there will be another use for them in future updates. I think maybe a shop of some kind to buy more items could be nice.  All in all it’s sandboxy and strategic and from someone hard to please mobile game wise), definitely worth a gander. Love the game play. Even paid $ for some of the upgrades; however game will crash and then fail to load. Tried to reinstall game and lost all progress. Put in a support ticket and went back to see if any progress was made and the game crashed and would not load again. Trying for the third time. Get your tech issues handled guys.Update- now reinstalled game a total of four times with same issue. After reinstall game will work for a couple of hours and then fail to load. Don’t waist your money or time. Still no word from tech support of any kind. About to report game to Apple
keywords: Zombie Motors, Candy Grill LLC, Games, Puzzle, Simulation, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

name: ‎Zaccaria Pinball Master Edition
description: ALL TABLES ARE PLAYABLE WITHOUT ANY LIMITATIONS BY FREE PLAY MODE! DISCOUNT PRICE INCLUDES 5 LICENSED ZACCARIA PINBALL TABLES (BLACKBELT, FARFALLA, HOT WHEELS, PINBALL CHAMP '82, TIME MACHINE)! Zaccaria was founded by three brothers (Marino, Franco, & Natale) and was the 3rd largest manufacturer of pinball machines in the world (behind Bally & Williams). They had created and produced more than 35 different pinball machines between 1974 and 1987. Zaccaria Pinball is a commemoration of this great pinball manufacturer. We will bring you almost all the pinball tables of Zaccaria one after the other. FEATURES - 5 pinball tables (Pinball Champ '82, Farfalla, Hot Wheels, Blackbelt, Time Machine) - Various fixed and customizable camera views  - Highly accurate physics and ball movements  - Original table rules, sound effects and vocals  - Breathtaking light and shadow effects  - Retina Display and iOS 6 support  - Customisable music themes PINBALL TABLES  - Blackbelt - Farfalla - Hot Wheels - Pinball Champ '82 - Time Machine PURCHASABLE PINBALL TABLES - Robot - Soccer Kings - Devil Riders - Locomotion - Shooting the Rapids - Star God - Magic Castle - Earth Wind Fire - Clown - Future World - Fire Mountain - Winter Sports - Space Shuttle - Zankor - Pool Champion - Mexico '86 - House of Diamonds - Mystic Star - Spooky - Star's Phoenix - Strike (SS) - Aerobatics (EM) - Circus (EM) - Combat (EM) SPECIAL TABLES FOR GOLD/SILVER MEMBERS: - Moon Flight (EM) - Lucky Fruit (EM) - Universe (EM) - Supersonic (EM) - Cine Star (EM) - Wood's Queen (EM) - Nautilus (EM) - Red Show (EM) IN-APPS BRONZE MEMBERSHIP - offers all the in-apps on a discount price  SILVER MEMBERSHIP - offers all Zaccaria pinball tables which have been released so far and will be release in the future, there will be 35 pinball tables in all  GOLD MEMBERSHIP - offers content of Bronze Membership and Silver Membership on a discount price (all in-apps and all pinball tables) BALL SIZE - includes option that can change size of the ball (small, normal, large)  USED TABLE - includes dirty textures, as well as an option that makes playfield dirtier and dirtier by the ball rolling  LIGHT/DARK ENVIRONMENT - includes a darker environment that brings more realistic look for pinball tables  + 2 BALLS - adds 2 balls, so you will have 5 balls to play  BALL PACK - includes 4 balls with different behavior  FLIPPER PACK - includes 4 colored flippers (a.k.a. original replacement flippers)  PREMIUM CAMERA EDITOR - adds 3 more customizable camera views and unlocks additional options to cam editor  PHYSICS TWEAKS - allows you to modify some major value of physics engine  GRAPHICS TWEAKS - allows you to change color and light settings CONTROLS  LAUNCH A BALL/START A GAME - tap the screen  LEFT AND RIGHT FLIPPERS - tap left lower and right lower side of the screen  PUSH THE TABLE - shake your device or swipe to left, right, up and down  SUPPORT  If you found any bug or issue please send us an e-mail to support@askhomework.hu or look for us on our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/askhomework! Thank you!
reviews: Though the tables might not be as well known as American pinball tables, Zaccaria pinball tables have been brought to life in stunning realism by ASK Homework. The tables are beautiful, challenging, and an absolute blast to play. The developers have updated the tables many times fixing and tweaking the tables, lighting, and layouts. I bought the complete table package, and I've more than got my monies' worth. The developers have gone above and beyond the call of duty making every table, sound, and lighting effect perfect. There are also lots of ways to customize your tables so you can play with and adjust all the settings you would like. You will be delighted with your purchase and you won't ever regret it. Stunningly awesome!! I’m making this post for those with whom the app currently crashes:Turn off your WiFi and data.This worked for me; hopefully it’ll work for you, too. At the moment the only downside is that this doesn’t allow for In App purchases and hence you’ll be stuck with those that you’ve already purchased (along with the included five).

name: ‎Z - HEAD
description: The first self contained portable pet that will never die due to neglect or abuse because its already dead! Every boy and girl will want their very own pet zombie head this holiday season. You and your family will enjoy its reanimated variety of company for generations. Tap the glass or use the integrated control panel to interact with the newest member of your family.  About:  As you are well aware, 3 years after the so called "zombie infection" took root it was eradicated. During BCS's extensive cleanup operation we discovered that many zombie's heads were left living after having been removed from their bodies. Some felt that it was wrong to destroy them in their incapacitated state so we halted incineration operations.  After a few days of research and analysis BCS determined that they would make perfect pets. After all, there is no dire need to care for them. They are actually quite hard to kill. They provide all the emotional benefit of a pet without the heartache when that pet inevitably dies. In focus testing we found that after the initial complete and utter horror, most children took to the zombie heads quite well.* Project Z-HEAD was born.  It is our goal to get a Z-HEAD within biting distance, so to speak, of every boy and girl.  Fear not, we have taken every precaution. We have developed a secure containment unit** that allows for easy viewing of your pet zombie. Of course, there is an access port at the top allowing your children to decorate their zombie*** and the interior of the containment unit to their hearts content.  Note: You may notice a few aggressive tendencies brought on by the hunger for human flesh and the strong smell of living brains found withiin the average household. YOUR PRODUCT IS NOT DEFECTIVE. After a period of time zombies become resigned to the fact that they are trapped and aggression subsides.****  Rot is natural: Keep the containment unit in a cool and dry environment to minimize the effects of this process.  * Trying to reintroduce a former member of the family as a Pet zombie tends to have negative results. This effect is exacerbated if the family member was turned into a zombie by a Z-HEAD.  ** 4 out of 5 Z-HEADs are not able to find a way to get out of the unit. "Taken every precaution" is just a figure of speech.  Rarely Z-HEADs are able to escape from their enclosure. Should this happen please seek the aide of an experienced zombie wrangler. Do not try to re-capture Z-HEAD yourself.  *** We recommend that all of our customers avoid decorating the mouth.  **** For the most part.  License agreement:  Users agree to release Bioscience and Chemical Solutions Inc. from any liability for bodily injury or accidental zombification of family, friends, coworkers and other pets. Please use Z-HEAD responsibly.  Caution: In case of escape, destroy brain.
